I wore a bunch of ways - as shown with jeans, but also over a red sequin column dress when I got chilly! Perfect, immaculate, well made are all understatements. Rent this (before I come back and buy it!)
Loved this jacket! It fit comfortably and was well made. So much fun!

This jacket is prettier IRL - but i'd say runs on the larger side. It was too big for me to want to wear out, so i'll be reordering in a smaller size. I'm normally a medium and i think i should have done a small or even xs. Really pretty/eye catching in a way the pictures dont do it justice

Very nice fabric. The pants are a heavy stretchy fabric. But the waste band is made of a fabric that doesn't stretch well. I could barely get it over my hips. The fabric didn't stay fitted very long. I felt my butt looked saggy.

I usually wear a 4 and the size small fit well. Material was thick and smooth. They fit snug at the waist and were also really high at the waist (I have a long torso). The legs were loose fitting. I wore with Y-3 Yohji Love Hoodie. Would probably rent again.

Love the material and the fit. The waist has very little give and can be a challenge if you have larger hips, but once up they fit beautifully and are very slimming. I'd buy them if they weren't so expensive.
Would not recommend for anyone with hips.

I am a 10-12 and got a large and I couldn't get it over my hips/butt. Now, I fully admit this "shelter in place" maybe have added a few pounds to those areas, but I don't think enough to make a large unwearable!
I wear an 8-10. The L fit perfect. Wore for everyday running around with UGGS and a white sweatshirt. Material is like polyester but thick. High waisted too.
Not good for my short waisted body type, fabulous fabric and styling. May run a bit big

These are fun pants but ran so big I could not them. Would have to roll the waist over to make them work and that wasn't possible. I wish they came in a smaller size. My daughter wore them once instead.
Did not look like model photo. Very baggy in legs. Very nicely made and expensive looking, just couldn't make it work.

links_reviews_title: Comfy for warm weather. Pockets needed ironing. It is cotton not silk as listed.
links_reviews_text: Not super flattering but it is super comfy. And let's be honest, pajama like clothing is what we all are in right now. Loved the neckline. Would be lovely for maternity as well.
This print is amazing. The dress is roomy, lightweight and comfortable. It unhooks into a nice v neck, which gives it a little more ease

links_reviews_title: Unique look from your normal plaid shirts
links_reviews_text: The fit was good, it was meant to be a bit boxier than slim fit. I liked the plaid mix, it was a stand out from traditional looks.
Definite cowgirl vibes with this! We went to a hoedown themed kids party and this was perfect with jeans, boots, and of course, a hat! Comfy and a bit oversized.
Great holiday-ish flannel, loved the mixed plaid. Well made and got a ton of compliments.
Great weekend wear! I could have sized down for a more fitted look, but i kept it open more like a jacket. Thick flannel and the patchwork make it a fun shirt to wear.
Loved this shirt. I sized up for an oversized look. It was so comfy it felt like wearing pajamas! The pattern was also really fun and festive for the holiday season. I was so tempted to buy it
This one is cute, but runs a bit large and swallowed me a bit, so I tied it up and rolled up the sleeves. Good casual Friday outfit. Love the pattern mix.
Love this shirt. Comfy and cute. Wore with leggings. Size down, oversized.

I like that baggy flannel shirt look, but if you want it more fitted, definitely size down. I'm a true medium/size 6 and this was basically like a tunic on me. Very cute and refreshing take on plaid though!

links_reviews_title: Very cute for everyday casual look
links_reviews_text: Loose fit by style, looked very cute with high waisted jeans

Oversized flannels for the win! Super comfy and cozy, but can still have zoom meetings in them without feeling under-dressed. Next time I rent, i'll probably go down a size for a more flattering fit, but for working from home, nobody will notice, and it'll feel like you're in PJ's all day!

links_reviews_title: A perfect plaid for cute & casual look
links_reviews_text: A comfortable, everyday top that is so soft and has cute color blocking detail. Easy to pair with some dark jeans, and I threw on some chunky necklaces and booties to dress it up a bit. It runs a bit large, so you should be okay to size down.

links_reviews_title: Love the fit of this plaid shirt. It's perfect for casual day at the office.
links_reviews_text: #comfy #perfectfit

links_reviews_title: If you are going for the homeless look
links_reviews_text: This shirt shouldn't have been sent out because of its quality... looks like it's been worn 10,000 times.

links_reviews_title: I like this shirt a lot!
links_reviews_text: I paired it with warm leggings, a vest, and booties. Worked perfectly. 4/5 stars!
Liked the colors, fit and style. I wore a turtleneck sweater under it and not too snug.
Material is so soft and the fit isn't bulky like other flannels. It's an awesome color scheme and felt dressy enough for work, casual Friday, and weekend activity!
Cozy and cute
LOVE! Fun, boxy, bf style top. Not sexy but extremely cute. Wore several times with skinny jeans and ankle boots. Perfect for being outside in crisp fall weather.
slim fit and long through the torso

links_reviews_title: loved this, really want to buy it.
links_reviews_text: fits great with my long arms which i like, and feels great buttoned all the way up
Loved the colors and look of the shirt. Great quality!
Was oversized and covered my bum. Great to lounge around in!
A bit oversized but I liked that. Soft flannel material. Fun bright colors. Good option for something casual for fall/winter
Didn't end up wearing - this runs a size or two too large and is boxy.
I'm between a medium and large and went with a medium because others said it was oversized. It is honestly just long and not fitted. It is very comfy and I wore quite a bit

I loved this shirt. I think it runs true to size (keep it mind this is supposed to be a boyfriend-style fit). I wore it open with a white t-shirt underneath and with a pair of ripped dark blue jeans and ankle boots and a bomber jacket. It's perfect for layering for Fall.

links_reviews_title: cozy and fun take on traditional plaid tops
links_reviews_text: It was large overall, I had to wear it tied or cinched with a belt. But so comfortable and cute pattern for fall!

links_reviews_title: Like the shirt, but the large fit like a large men's shirt.
links_reviews_text: The arms were swimming. Comfy to wear on the weekends to run errands

links_reviews_title: The button up looks and feels good. The colors make a statement, I felt great in it.
links_reviews_text: I have long arms, and the arm length was great. All Ralph Lauren runs on the larger side, so I would size down unless you have a bigger bust larger than a C.
Wore to work with a turtleneck dress under for warmth. Loved the plaid. Has pockets!! Wish it had a belt and had more room in the hips but overall it's a nice dress

links_reviews_title: Should have ordered my usual size
links_reviews_text: Lots of reviewers mentioned it ran large and was a thicker fabric - in my experience it runs true to size and is rather thin fabric. Pretty pattern though.

I am normally a 10/12 depending on the brand because my chest is 36E. But I really wanted to try this dress for Thanksgiving and my size wasn't available so I took a chance on the 8! Well, it fits all the way until my chest 😂 so I thought I'd try a cream color sweater over top. Turns out I like it- I'll probably be super hot in it but oh well, it will look cute in photos. If i had the correct size I'd probably think it was tooooo much plaid. And the fabric falls in a weird way. It's a fun dress

I was weary of renting this because of the previous comment, but I actually found it to be great! However it does not come with a belt like it seems from the picture. The fabric was thinner than I thought it would be... like a typical thin flannel shirt. I have bigger boobs so it pulled at the buttons around the chest a bit. But all in all it's super versatile and can be worn multiple different ways. My BF was obsessed with this look and said it was one of the best he's ever seen haha. I would've bought if it weren't so dang expensive.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love this so much
links_reviews_text: I was obsessed with this dress on the model. But it didn't look so great on me. The bulky pockets add weight to the hips and one button pulled across my bust. In all fairness I have a large bust but it could have used some hook and eye closures in between the top few. The fabric is amazing
A great dress for lunch with friends. Wore with boots but I can see wearing as a duster open over jeans and a white shirt. Will rent again.
This dress screams FALL. It is very long, and I am 5'8". Great excuse to wear my ostrich cowboy boots.

This dress is beautiful on the hanger but did not fit over my upper arms. It has no stretch, so you can't really squeeze into it. The pockets are also placed in an odd angle, so if you have big hips, they look extra wide.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pattern and cut. VERY long (almost to the floor on me at 5'9").
links_reviews_text: This is a gorgeous dress for fall. The top half is very form fitting and lovely if you are tiny on top. The bottom half is forgiving and flows beautifully. My one negative is possibly in the way I wore it for the cooler temps - if wearing tights the skirt clings and sticks as you walk. Think it would be better bare-legged if you have the fall temperatures for that.

links_reviews_title: looked great, but was way too small
links_reviews_text: I could button the dress, but it was not flattering. Size up!

links_reviews_title: I liked the style but it was too snug in the bustline and the pockets stuck out like wings.
links_reviews_text: I really liked the style and color however it was much too snug in the bustline . I usually wear a 10 or 12 in a dress and a 6 in jeans and pants so it is often hard to find a dress that fits well.
warm, beautiful, true to size

I wear a size C or D, so I am very conscious when I wear button down dresses. This one was spectacular. It was a bit tighter on top (due to my body) but the lower part of the dress was very comfortable. There is an extra clasp next to the button near the belly button, so it gives extra security to those conscious about their stomach area.
Wanted so badly to love this dress. Fit was awkward all over. Better with a belt but pockets still gaped, making my hips look wider than they actually are. Great fabric for fall/winter.

links_reviews_title: A nice patterned winter dress, though sort of shapeless
links_reviews_text: I like the pattern, though the material is both thinner and scratchier than one would hope for from plaid. The real issue I had with this pretty, interesting dress is that the fit was not great--it was sort of shapeless and loose in the waist without a belt and needed a slip to stop from clinging in odd places.
Loved everything about this dress except it was too tight across the bust and gapped when buttoned. Going to try the next size up and hope for the best.

The cut is impeccable. Even with pockets, my waist looks trim and tailored. Rented for a work conference and was able to comfortably wear all day. Size up if you are large Chester (or use a safety pin if you still want it to hug your curves everywhere else)
I underestimated that this dress is like fully wool and super heavy. I wanted it for a San Diego winter day and knew it would just be way too hot. It's gorgeous though!

links_reviews_title: Wearing RL makes me feel chic
links_reviews_text: Celebrating Ralph Lauren's 50th anniversary straight into the next year in style!

PROS: Great comfortable material. It is thinner than you would think though. But that is OK since we don't really have much of a winter here in Texas. I love that it HAS POCKETS! It is such a casual yet polished look. CONS: It is a bit long. I like long dresses, but even I would have liked the skirt to be a few inches shorter.
Big skirt but really right across the chest with gaping around the buttons
I love, love, love this dress! Chić and comfortable. Got a ton of compliments.

Love this dress! I most often wear a 10 but only the 12 was available. Glad I got the 12 because the 10 would have been too tight in the waist. And even the 12 was too tight in the bust to button without a gap. I ended up wearing a turtleneck under it. Actually looked great layered. The dress is super long! I wore it with a riding boot and it was just an inch or so off the floor. Fabric is soft flannel and gorgeous fall colors. I got so many compliments. This one will be tough to send back.

links_reviews_title: Perfect work dress for a conservative site visit on a pretty Fall day.
links_reviews_text: Was long at an inch or so off ground with a slight heel, but didn’t catch. Shifts and moves nicely. Light flannel material. Great having pockets; on someone with wide hips they might add to width. Gorgeous colors; lighter in person than picture. So comfortable and still dresses up the appearance. Hid my tummy well.

links_reviews_title: The dress is beautiful. The fabric is lightweight & could be wonderful.
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size, however it was unwearable due to the unbelievable amount of static cling. I don't know if it is because it is cold out and it came in the plastic cleaner bags. But either way I was hugely disappointed that I could not wear it to my grandson's christening.
The proportions were way off (I'm 5'5). The dress was too long, the pockets stuck out in a very unflattering way. The dress was the most unflattering fit imaginable. If you have curves, not for you.
Cute pattern but big in the hips and mid section. I'm a 34D -And the 8 fit good in the chest but was big everywhere else. Wore it once with cute boots but added a belt so I didn't look like a tent

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments at work
links_reviews_text: Perfect for fall weather. I am 5'11 and the 2R went all the way down to my ankles.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress. I'm a 10 so I am glad I went a size up.
links_reviews_text: Really cute for fall.

This is a lovely dress. Finely woven wool blend with full button front and button cuffs. I have to layer under wool due to my sensitivities and usually wear a size 8 so this was very roomy. It would benefit from being lined and is quite light. Loads of compliments, even from men. Might be tight in the chest area for some.

links_reviews_title: Like your favorite flannel shirt only a dress!
links_reviews_text: Love love love this! I am tall and the sleeves were long, dress was long and flared at the end for easy walking. A bit of wool in material, but no enough to be itchy, just enough to hold style. I would have purchased if could. Will rent as often as I can.
Definitely needed a belt to look right, but a great dress for fall.
This was very bulky heavy material. It runs large. The pockets hang out around hips. I wanted to love this. Big disappointment.

links_reviews_title: Love pockets in my maxi dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was comfortable, true to size, erring on the slightly big. I am 5'8" and the dress hit the top of my feet. Which I loved, but might not work for someone shorter. Loved this dress. Colors an plaid was on point.

links_reviews_title: Great wash and style but runs big in waist and legs
links_reviews_text: I wish I could get in a 27 but it's never available. 28 was way too big to wear with a crop top but I wore them once with a long sweater
The picture says it all. My booty looked awesome in these. Very flattering! I have long legs and the length was great - be careful short ladies.

These jeans were good for daytime. Felt a little too casual for night. They're comfortable and feel relaxed and on trend. I'm between a 25 and 26 and know reformation runs a little small so got the 26. They fit perfect, so I would size up.

links_reviews_title: Ultra High-Waisted and pinch in at the waist
links_reviews_text: These jeans are true high rise, they sit nicely at the natural waist instead of sitting lower and sagging down. These are stiff denim, so if you are curvy you may want to order a size up.
slightly loosens over time, great for every day
Loved these jeans but I had to return them since they ran super small. Definitely size up!
I'm usually a 26. Ordered a 27 based on the reviews. The waist fit perfectly but the thighs were an awkward fit. Overall, did not flatter my legs at all.
Loved these jeans. SO cozy and retained their shape after a full day of wear. They're more full-length than they appear in the photo

links_reviews_title: I would buy this if I could!
links_reviews_text: I love them for an every day mom fit style with sneakers and a blazer, You can dress it up or down and they are super comfortable. Get 1 size up, I'm a 28 and rented a 29 and it feels perfect!
Loved these jeans. They have little stretch, but fit true to size. I wore these 5+ times! Definitely renting again.

I loved these jeans- they were too small so I didn't get to wear them but that was my fault as I didn't check the size before ordering. I am usually a size 0-2 and got a 24R, I definitely needed a 25R. The jeans themselves were made beautifully and had a great look. I can't wait to order my correct size!

links_reviews_title: Great for people with no hips or butt
links_reviews_text: Fits sooo small. After I ordered these in a 28 (my usual size) I went to the store in NYC. I could barely button a size 30 and my thighs and butt we're about to bust out of the fabric! Reformation is not for people with curves.
Love it. Perfect for the office with a pair of jeans.

I loved this blazer both for its fit and its color. Colors are rich and versatile, the fit s great. I got tons of compliments and wore several times, thought about buying....but pretty expensive even with discount.

Great jacket for work and a nice dinner out after work. Stylish. Perfect for fall/winter as the material is heavier. Sleeves were long enough and jacket fit perfectly buttoned or unbuttoned. I would definitely rent again and would buy if it wasn't so expensive.
This blazer is amazing and fits perfectly. I highly recommend for everyday or work! Love the colors
Loved wearing this blazer. It's so comfortable, fit was perfect and colors were so rich. Will def rent again!
I received so many compliments on this blazer! Makes me wonder about how I dress every other day - but seriously this piece is gorgeous, cozy, and soft. Perfect for a casual Friday.
TTS and although it says blue, I couldn't tell if it was blue or black. Works well with jeans. Nice working pockets.

links_reviews_title: Runs slightly small if you're broader shouldered but very well made and stylish!
Too small to wear at work, but I can't submit a review without completing this section.
links_reviews_text: Too small to wear at work, but I can't submit a review without completing this section.

links_reviews_title: Super cute jeans with great hem and wash. Wore with blazers, blouses and sweaters.
links_reviews_text: Jeans fit true to size, are a bit less stretchy than some jeans but have a great updated style.

links_reviews_title: Well made and well cut blazer
links_reviews_text: This warm blazer is well made and flattering on my pear shape. The pink and blue overtop the black give the black blazer more interest.
I liked this a ton, but the sleeves were way longer than I expected. Was cute though, and got compliments.
SO CUTE. Great for someone petit. Want to buy. Great w/ a trendy outfit or for a more business casual look
It's just a well made blazer with a nice pattern but many people stopped me to compliment it whenever I wore it.
I absolutely loved this blazer. It's very classy and subtle but beautiful. I wore it when the weather was cold and was warm and happy.
The sleeves were a little long. Overall, nice fit and quality fabric.

links_reviews_title: I have long arms and sleeve length was too short.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful jacket with smart window pane wool--wish it would've fit.
Comfortable and looks nice
Fit was a little boxy and tight through the chest.

I love this jacket and will be holding onto it for a while (sorry!). It's hard to find jackets that look nice when you are a true hour glass. This doesn't have any fancy seeming- it's a true school boy blazer (my fav) but is cut for a woman's body. It's wool, great color purple without being in your face. Lined sleeves that look great if you roll them up. I love love love this jacket! The only reason I'm not purchasing is the high price. Highly recommend!
Got a lot of compliments with this beautiful jacket. Very comfortable to wear and well designed to go with jeans or pants of any kind.

Loved this - the details on the pockets and the colors (a little pop of pink) are great. I got a ton of compliments and loved how this looked. My only complaint is that i found it to be a little itchy - I wore a shell and so my arms were bare under the jacket. It was lined but I still found it a little itchy. No big deal though.
cozy and cute, dress it up or down. wore it with light jeans like the pic!
True to size - perfect fall blazer. Can be dressed up or down

This is probably the piece I would buy if I had the money. I love it! It's perfect for everyday wear. I wish it was a little heavier for the winter time but, winter has been pretty warm this year. I recommend wearing it in like 40/50 degree weather, if not it might be too chilly. I do prefer clothes to form fit to my body, I might size down if you prefer that as well. I love this piece, the color is amazing.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely did not want to return this gorgeous coat. Best coat I've rented so far.
links_reviews_text: Runs a tad large but it belts nicely. Fabric is so soft and warm but not too hot. Fit well over sweaters too.

links_reviews_title: Stock photo does NOTHING for this piece...
links_reviews_text: TOTALLY ordered this coat by default. Was trying to find outerwear to match a green turtleneck that I wanted wear. This was not at the top of my list but based on the reviews I said why not. DID NOT DISAPPOINT! It's VERY under assuming...Now it's not the heaviest but it runs so big that you can definitely layer up. But the contrasting patterns is what puts it over the top. I sized down knowing I didn't want it really big. Perfect length & color. The green is lighter than expected but who cares!

I would have kept this longer if it was warmer. The print was a nice hunter green plaid. I'm 5'2 and it was pretty long on me. Came about mid calf. It was missing the belt but I wore it with a brown leather one and like it better actually! But note this is more of a sweater than a coat, it's not lined as it appears but rather a double sided knit which looks great (my friend said I gave her Jo March from Little Women vibes) but is not for cold weather. Runs large.
I was quite cold in this even with my chunky sweater under. Cute though, fun with the mixed patterns.

This coat was AMAZING. I loved it and kept it for several weeks, even on the Unlimited plan (which encourages lots of swaps) because I didn't want to give it up!!! Beautiful hunter green color/plaid pattern (with a visible contrasting plaid liner for a little kick), and nice and warm in 40-50 degree weather. I was complimented on it every time I wore it out, it was so fun!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and interesting coat for mild weather
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments on this one. The contrasting patterns were fun to wear.

This particular coat smells like some random lady's perfume, which is strange and off-putting! However, it is otherwise ideal: soft, comfortable, long, pretty color. Runs large, but good for a bit of an oversized look since you can tie it at the waist. If you don't want that look, size down. Easy to fit a nice big sweater underneath, and the sleeves are actually long.

Oh my god, this is enormous. I knew this was meant to be an oversized look, but it is HUGE. I typically wear a 0 or 2, and I'm definitely petite at 5'2", but this coat entirely overwhelmed me, as you can see from my try-on photo. You can't even see my hands because the sleeves are so long! The fabric is really gorgeous - the green plaid is rich and unique and it looks beautiful. But if you're on the small side, I don't think this will work for you.

This coat is a stunner. The color is a rich emerald and really versatile. I'm 5'3" so it hit me a bit above the ankle. It made every outfit I paired it with. Sleeves were a little long on my T-Rex arms but they look great rolled up. It feels expensive and luxurious and I don't want to part with it!

True to size coat (I sized up and shouldn't have) whose most strikingly quality is the bright green plaid. It's gorgeous and unique. The brown check interior is a clever and stylish feature. Fairly warm, too. I'd recommend for a crisp fall day.

links_reviews_title: Loved the mixed prints-got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Good for layering over sweaters. Light, so not great for super cold weather
Seriously go down at least two sizes.
love the colors on this, but it was too oversized and felt more like a fancy bathrobe than a nice winter coat. would consider renting again for a long flight.

links_reviews_title: Fits nice but was a little small for me
links_reviews_text: They are true to size but next time I will order a slightly larger size bc I like to have extra room.
These jeans were so comfortable and flattering to my figure. Made my butt look amazing. Wish they were maybe a little higher in the waist but still would wear or rent again

These jeans are so comfortable and cute. I wore them like 10 times. The length was just SLIGHTLY too short on my legs, so I usually rolled them up to be cropped length (which worked perfectly since I like that look anyway!).

These are, hands down, the most comfortable jeans I have ever worn bar none. They're like wearing butter, super stretchy and hit in the just the right spot at the ankle. If they weren't a size or two too big for me, I never would've let them go.
not a lot of stretch, but comfortable
These jeans have just the right amount of give, have kept that true deep black color, and look great.

links_reviews_title: The most comfy jeans I've ever worn
links_reviews_text: I'm About two Months post partum and wanted to rent jeans to fit my post-baby body for an event. This pair of jeans was so unbelievably comfortable, I could literally sleep in them. They fit perfectly giving a skinny look without being constricting. I'll definitely be renting more of this brand in the future!

links_reviews_title: I wished they had a higher waist, but otherwise cute if you aren't self conscious of mid section.
I have skinny legs and it was super baggy on my legs
links_reviews_text: Great color! Its stretchy but baggy if you have thin legs
Very comfortable jeans with soft , stretchy material. Waist kept slipping down, so I had to wear with a belt. Zipper kept opening, which was a little annoying, but overall great Jeans.

links_reviews_title: Great jeans, would buy except for button
links_reviews_text: Really love these jeans, great fit and super comfortable. Ankle length was perfect for me, I'm 5' 4". 26 size was great, left a little room which was perfect for holiday time. I'm about 120 lbs. the only thing that stopped me from purchasing was the placement of the button. The zipper showed through even when totally zipped up and buttoned.
Comfy but too thin for me. I like a heavier denim.
Fit well. I'm 5'6" so they would have been a little too short for an ankle boot if you are much taller.

These jeans fit great. I'm 5'2 and the ankle length was perfect full length on me. They're comfortable and flattering with lots of stretch so you can go down a size (I did). I think regular size would still fit, but might start to bag out by the end of the day. However, if you prefer a high rise, I'd skip these. I'm so used to rises that come above navel that these felt really low (they aren't...they hit me right below navel). If you like mid-rise though, these are for you.
stretched a lot throughout the day. Zipper flapped out. These have been rented a lot

links_reviews_title: Loved these! Have kept for a week so far
links_reviews_text: The size and fit was perfect. These have a lot of stretch so I went down 1 usual size and it was PERFECT!! My husband loved these on me.0
Loved the fit, very flattering and wore them for work, the weekend and an evening out.
Really liked these. Fit was great!
These jeans fit true to size for me! They are buttery soft and stretchy but don't lose their shape. My only complaint would be that they're quite cropped for me- 5'7.
Hard to send these back. I will definitely reorder when I have an open slot in my closet.
Everything was just right.
These jeans are made well. They're just not the right fit for my body type.

links_reviews_title: Just like my others, but shorter
links_reviews_text: Not exactly ankle length, more mid calf if you have longer legs. Very comfy, but definitely size down or you'll be pulling up your britches all day!
Great fit. Easy and chic.

links_reviews_title: These pants felt like butter! So Soft and comfy!
links_reviews_text: The pants fit perfectly. It was very hard to send them back. I will most likely rent these again for a night out with friends. I rented the 30 R but next time I would rent a size down as I am normally a size 8.
Not what I expected. They are basically leggings and I was not thrilled with the quality. Would not recommend if you prefer more structured pants.

I didn't realize this this had a belt until after I took the photo. It's unique. I didn't wear it, because it juuust fit, which is not why I wear jumpsuits. I like them to be roomy and comfortable. My hips are maybe 39" and the medium was snug.
It was a interesting design that fit very well. A lot of compliments!
Pros: adorable, flattering, comfortable, easy to get on and off, compliments all day Cons: runs small-DO size up! Takeaway- thick fabric makes this a fantastic spring jumpsuit!

LOVE the idea of this jumpsuit, it's so adorable. But not sure if sizing up would've helped with the occurring problem of the lower buttons unsnapping right under my belly as id sit down or bend over. I found the midsection to be fitted and the rest was roomy (chest, arm & leg). I'd stick to your true size and ladies with a little extra in the stomach maybe try going up one size and see if that helps.
I've got a long body and short legs, and this jumpsuit just barely fit. I wish it was a couple inches longer. Even so, it was super fun to wear.
Super trendy adorable jumpsuit. Arms are a bit large, but overall fits well. Like the snap buttons because easy to take on and off for the bathroom (some jumpsuits take forever to get off!)

I wore this in 60 degree weather and that was perfect given how warm this piece keeps you. It was not the most flattering but made up in terms of "funk factor. I am average height but with a longer torso so this barely was long enough on my torso.

Serious fan of this jumpsuit - is very easy to wear without a lot of fuss. I like that the ruffle adds a feminine detail to what feels like a utility look. Length was great, I'm 5'6 - but might be long on a shorter gal.

Weird sleeves and long pants. Weak seams. Made it work. I liked the concept but had to cuff the sleeves and legs. The sleeves bell out really big and the pants are super long. Even with a belt, not very flattering. I wore with a long scarf to break up all the denim and actually got a lot of compliments.

I have a long torso and this jumpsuit isn't cut long enough for me to be able to wear it. I have tried one other jumpsuit from this brand, Sea and also had to return it for the same reason. If you are long waisted then this probably isn't for you either. Otherwise, it's a really cute design, and the denim is a nice medium weight.

links_reviews_title: I loved it I am 113 lbs and size A in my bust
links_reviews_text: It's just perfect

links_reviews_title: Too heavy fabric for this time of year.
links_reviews_text: This denim is stiff and heavy. to much for August in New England. Sleeves also huge. Arrived new with tags.
The fit on the waist is fantastic and the wide legs are so comfortable. However needs a better cuff. This is a staple work pant.
I loved these - a staple piece for the work day. A mid/high rise, a little long (I am between 5'4-5'5). I paired with a simple black bodysuit. Comfortable, effortless and chic.

I wore these several times and still have not returned them. I love them and may look into purchasing them. Great fit, great quality, the only problem I would say is when they arrived in the bag, they were wrinkled. And they were kind of difficult to iron.

Normally pants I rent are way too long but these fit! I wasn't tripping on them and they weren't dragging. I wish they were high waisted- then they would have been the perfect pant. Kept them an extra week so I can decide if I want to buy them!
Didn't find the pants all that flattering- seemed to hug hips a bit tightly . The cuffs are a little odd also.
The fabric and cut of this pant are so chic. The waist is just a bit big but fit me well through hips and thighs which are sometimes problematic for me.
The details of the cut are flattering. Thicker pant. I have a thick back side and felt like they flatter that. Will west again!

These were slightly big in the waist and too low in terms of rise. The cuffs on the bottom looked sloppy as they weren't sewn at the top of the cuff. I wore them once with heels and they were ok but nothing special.
They fit perfectly, very flattering if you have a bum. Fabric is very nice, well made.
Pant cuff flips around and is too sloppy to wear. Do not rent. It's a wonder these pants are included in the collection. These pants need a tailor to be wearable.
I loved these pants and will rent again - very comfortable and polished, I got a ton of compliments
Would totally buy these but I think the price is too much for what they are. They fit great and I love the wide legs. They were longer on me than what is in the photo which I was happy about.

Love the fit and quality of these pants. I'm not really familiar with the sizing scheme. I'm usually between an 8 and 10 in pants, and these fit really nicely, but seemed slightly large in the waist (I'm trending closer to an 8 right now).

links_reviews_title: Cuff falls in front and back...can't believe you sent this out!
links_reviews_text: Cuff falls in front and back...pants cannot be worn. I am surprised you didn't see that before including in collection.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear this as it was far too big.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this as it was far too big.

I LOVE wide leg pants - especially for work. These were perfect to look pulled together while still being incredibly comfortable. I had to use some double stick tape for the cuff at the bottom so they didn't drop too much. I also almost killed myself (3 times, but I'm clumsy) on the stairs when my heel caught itself on the cuff. Still loved them. Still will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Great slacks that were so comfortable and dressy.
links_reviews_text: I thought these were the perfect! I wore them for a Christmas party with a sparkly top. Loved the width of the leg and they were lined perfectly. Great for a curvy figure. But, unfortunately, I ordered a size too big. Wore them anyways but a bit too big.

links_reviews_title: It is too big for me- would need a smaller size
links_reviews_text: It was cute- I wish it had fit
A little long and I am 5'7" and wearing heels...

links_reviews_title: Epitome of Professional Look with Remote Comfort
links_reviews_text: This fit was pretty amazing. The only issue I encountered was that they were a little long and the cuff became a slight walking hazard. Overall I would wear again, but I would have starched the cuff so that it would not be open for my heel to catch on while walking. I loved them soo much (outside of almost face-planting) that I will be looking up other pants from this designer.

I have rented these pants for the second time and I love them! They are great! Super comfortable. If you are on the shorter side, I definitely recommend wearing heels so the bottoms don't drag on the floor.
Good pants

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear. Had to put too much work into the cuffs.
links_reviews_text: Held on to them because the fabric is amazing and they potentially could be very flattering. Cuffs needed to be tacked up and I never found the time to make them wearable. If I did I may have purchased them. Will try again another time.
Great fit, and flair at the bottom
Great fabric . Great fit
I'm 5,5 and these pants dragged with flats. I had to wear 3 inch heels for them not to get caught. Very comfortable overall fit

These pants were super comfortable and fit like a glove. However, I totally agree with the other reviews, the cuff on these pants need several additional tacks/a full seam because they do flop around and caused me to constantly readjust them.
I liked the flowy material of these pants, but they were just too short. Had to wear ballet slippers with them, and it still didn't look right.

links_reviews_title: large and can't wear a belt with them
links_reviews_text: they were too big. too long (even with heels) and they kept falling off me. you can't wear a belt either because no belt loops. i ended up going home from work early to finish the day from home because they were too unwearable.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to wear these to work, but the size was too big and the cuffs made it look unprofessional.
links_reviews_text: The cuffs are hilariously large and make the pants look silly.
pants were a little big but i had ordered the wrong size- fit is great flow is great- material is great

links_reviews_title: Great work slacks, but short length
links_reviews_text: These pants were extremely comfortable and fit very well. However, the length seemed to be a bit short so wore flats. Perfect for the office!
these are the best trousers i've ever worn. considering buying them as they work for every occasion. i wore them to a wedding, a birthday party and a client meeting.

links_reviews_title: Cound not wear it - too smal in waist, too long
links_reviews_text: nice fabric
The cuffs just flop down and look sloppy. Extremely unflattering.

*** Not for website*** I wore these for work because I wanted to use something from the order I was sent. The cuffs on the pants were flapping all over the place and nearly caused me to fall over a few times. They need to be tacked back on by a seamstress. It was a bit of a sloppy look because they weren't staying in place.
These were great, well-fitting pants. My only issue was that the cuff looked sloppy, but not a deal breaker. I'm on the large size of 10 and they were perfect.
Too big. Wouldve been cute if it fit.
Love length but waist ran atleast 2 sizes small
You can't go wrong with animal print top! Size down, it runs big!

links_reviews_title: Decent shirt for work but nothing spectacular
links_reviews_text: This fit a little tight across my broad shoulders. The print was good for work or a night out, and I wore it multiple times. However I wouldn't buy it...the fabric felt cheaper than the price tag would imply 6 thin...and compared to other work blouses I got in same order, the seams were constructed in a cheaper method (just serged together as opposed to enclosed French seams, etc.). I would rent again for a versatile work blouse but would not buy...that's what RTR Unlimited is for!!!
Wore twice - the other time with a leather skirt
This was an OK top. It was fun to wear and I liked the zebra print. The back is slightly longer than the front and I felt like it was too large and blousy to leave untucked. I wouldn't rent again.

This blouse is lovely. It's in the softest fabric that gently hugs my curves. The zebra print is bold while still being neutral, allowing me to style the shirt with *anything* - even the rainbow snakeskin skirt. Definitely worth renting.
Fits perfect. Goes great with black pants. Love the flow and feel. Would rent again.
I got so many compliments on this top in my office. It's so comfortable and stylish! The fit is perfect and I'm already planning on wearing it again to an upcoming networking event! Highly recommend.

There is a plethora of leopard prints out there and this animal print is more conservative which makes it easy to wear to work and then maybe a HH after work. Sleeves are long, the fabric feels good on the skin. Will rent it again!
The print is fun to rent because it makes a splash and is memorable! It is warm due to fabric and drapes nicely!

links_reviews_title: Fun print in a beautiful silk.
links_reviews_text: This is a lovely silk blouse in a classic cut. What makes this top pop is the fun print, which still manages to be work appropriate. This top would also be great to wear with jeans and booties for a funkier vibe. I would rent this again but would go down a size.

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments wearing this shirt!
links_reviews_text: I will rent again but not in xl. I'll try a large as the xl was too big.
I liked the fit - it was a nice blouse for work. The skits on the side made it difficult to wear tucked in.

links_reviews_title: Slits on the sides show skin, needed to cover with a blazer
Fortunately it ran large because the only size available was 4. usually wear 6
links_reviews_text: fine
A beautiful blouse with an on-trend pattern! I love the fit and the fact that the shirt tail is easy to tuck in without adding much bulk.

links_reviews_title: A great blouse for work or a party!
links_reviews_text: It's a big big on me, but I have a jacket on, so it's fine. Very cute!
Loved the look but will have to size up. Couldn't zip them. Will rent again up a size!
I loved the style of the pants but they were so small I couldn't get them zipped. I usually wear a size 2 and occasionally a 0.

links_reviews_title: These came with Tags on... I loved them!!
links_reviews_text: I had a hard time with zip closure in back ;) other than that loved these!!
Great fit!

I wore this top to dinner with my family but would also be great for work. It needs to be tucked in, otherwise the silhouette is a little frumpy. The ties at the wrist stayed put which was nice. I loved the covered buttons and the fabric was really high quality. I'm usually an 8/medium and this fit true to size. Would recommend!
Liked but didn't love. Fit wasn't as blousey as you might expect with a style like this. Ties on sleeves and buttons at front were pretty details!

links_reviews_title: Luxe blouse perfect for summer/fall transition!
links_reviews_text: Loved this top. Got tons of compliments and felt extra fancy because the fabric is silky and has this almost embossed pattern that is gorgeous in person. I wish I could keep it! A tiny bit small around the hips, but I wore it slightly pulled up towards my natural waist.

I got lots of complements on this shirt. The print is cute and fit well. I only wish the cuffs and cuff ties weren't stitched. I couldn't make them tighter so they slid over my hands last which was annoying.
This shirt is not meant for glad with larger busts! I couldn't even get it over my chest.
This silky shirt felt luxe. The little bows at the sleeves were a fun touch. I loved that the buttons were close together and didn't gape at all (I'm a 34G).

Runs small and there is no give in the fabric. The knitted sleeves don't untie, they are stitched in place so you can't wear this under something else without making it look like you have giant wrist lumps under your sweater/blazer. Not a good choice in the winter at all. The fabric and color are nice at least.
Beautiful fabric, would have loved to wear it.

I thought the pattern would be more like leopard print so I was a little disappointed when it had more of an 80s/90s pattern, more for mature women. However, it was a nice, flattering color and cut. Also liked the material. Office-appropriate blouse.
Absolutely beautiful, well made, classy, and soft. Would work well with any figure. Fits well over large boobs.
Fit great and looked super cute.
Great design, great to wear to work. Comfortable and stylist, what's not to love??

I was worried that the shirt was see through or thin, but it's neither! The ends of the sleeves and the buttons are perfect detailed touches. You can button it as high or low as you want. Great piece!!
love the fabric and the style details. The only negative is to watch the sleeve ties when you're washing your hands. I kept getting mine wet. Great blouse for casual or a little more dressy look.
Tight in the bust, perfect otherwise.
Super comfy and true to size, definitely a baggier look.

The sleeves were wide set. It fit nice in the chest and through the middle, but unless I was going to tuck it in, it wasn't wide enough along the bottom seam, so I would have had to wear it tucked in to hide it being tight around my hips. I do have wider hips, but would suggest sizing up if you aren't planning on tucking it in.

links_reviews_title: Didn't love the blows at the end of the sleeves. Made it hard to function
links_reviews_text: Comfy
Very nice top!! Would rent again, got lots of compliments
true to size

I liked the material, color, and shape. Very easy to wear but not a show stopper by any means. The ties on the sleeve were annoying though because they kept dragging over papers on my desk and they would get wet when I washed my hands.

Was hoping for more of a "silken" look but the material was a cheap polyester that literally arrived so wrinkled it couldn't be worn. Probably because the material isn't that great- it's a shame it looked lovely online. Didn't wear.
Great fall floral shirt with fun arm bow for the extra pop.

So many compliments on this coat. Was stopped on the street multiple times... a bit long on me but overall incredible. I'm torn between purchasing it and sending it back... it's that good! Really comfy, warmer than it looks and great pockets. Overall obsessed.

links_reviews_title: Always made every outfit "pulled together." Loved it.
links_reviews_text: Comfy fit, flattering.
I was looking for a long, high quality winter coat. This one did not disappoint. I pair this with a black cashmere scarf and black leather gloves. Will probably hold on to this one for awhile.
Fun for winter vacation in Nashville. Runs a little big but love the plaid and pockets
Loved the pattern, the pockets, the make! She was dressy and could be dressed down. Warm for 40 degree weather.
Not thin but not super thick. Good in between coat.
Had to return right away since there was hole in the back.

Rented this coat for my Christmas trip to Paris and it was the perfect mix of warm and chic! Definitely a boxy fit in the shoulders/waist and admittedly it looked better open but I still felt cute even bundled up. Plenty of room in the underarm for layering. I'm a wimp when it comes to the cold and this kept me reasonably warm in 40 degree weather with just a long sleeve shirt underneath.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Jacket to add a little something extra
links_reviews_text: This is the perfect jacket to wear outside or even keep it on! I love it and got so many compliments on it. Super versatile and easy to style.
I love this jacket. The collar is mine but i dressed it up. I've worn it everyday even though it's freezing outside, I'm in New York, but i like it so much that I tough it out. The bag is RTR too
This is my favorite coat I have ever worn and I have worn a lifetime of coats. It reminded me of my mom's 90's outerwear.

It was nice to spice up my outerwear. Being the typical NYer I am in black, gray, leather, and Canada Goose. I got lots of compliments. It was have been even better with a big chunky knit scarf. I have really long arms and usually have to size up for jackets but this size was perf.

links_reviews_title: Compliments from strangers on the street
links_reviews_text: This coat needed its own catwalk I've never been stopped so often by strangers complimenting an item of clothing. Super chic. Has an element of 90's vibe going on which is very current. I usually wore it open. Was a bit fitted over my bottom if I wore it buttoned up which I didn't like.

LOVE this coat! Such a great piece that I kept it for two weeks and had so many compliments! The coat was lined very well, I underestimated how warm it would keep me during the LA cold. I did order a 42 which is equivalent to a 6 because of availability but was fine because I wore sweaters under comfortably. If I were to purchase I would want it in the 40 but 42 is manageable. Highly recommend!
Wore this coat on a weekend trip to DC. It was perfect and very warm. Definitely a big, over sized coat, but loved that look!

links_reviews_title: Had a very hard time returning this. Super warm and stylish. Felt fancy in it. Lots of compliments.
Love this coat. I have received compliments from people and many people have asked where I got it.
links_reviews_text: this is definitely a larger fitting coat but I think its supposed to be that way! Looks cute with jeans and sneakers but also looks great with slacks and heels for work!

links_reviews_title: Love this coat. Perfect fit and great quality. Very professional.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful Coat. Would love to keep.
This is a great winter coat for taller girls. I kept it for the one week it gets cold where I live, and it was perfect.
Very warm and heavy...great for cold weather.
I loved this coat. It was super flattering and definitely turned heads. I got so many compliments on it. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: WARM! High quality! Not your traditional black- stand out in the crowd :)
links_reviews_text: Definitely runs large, but that's also the look.... super warm, perfect for December in Boston. My favorite look in this coat was when I paired it with cuffed boyfriend jeans, ankle length 2 in heel Prada booties, Maison de Papillon Breton strip sweater (also from RTR), and long gold oversized vintage Chanel necklace. Felt super casually stylish, put together, warm, and comfy for a long day walking around the city. Also- I got laid off this day, so kind of an emotionally tough day- BUT this outfit literally warmed my heart. Seriously.
I normally wear size 6 in dresses and the 38 fit me perfectly. Style statement coat for sure!

links_reviews_title: surprisingly warm and great for everyday.
links_reviews_text: The pattern makes it a standout piece but can still be worn with tons of outfits.

links_reviews_title: Great coat that's easy and versatile and WARM
links_reviews_text: I live in DC and wore this coat to walk around a sculpture garden in January. I was really surprised at how warm it was. I felt chic and while it's not wild, it's a step above my basic black coats in my closet. I typically wear a 4 and got the coat in size 40 and was very happy with how it fit (long and boxy).
Rented for trip to Chicago. Easy and warm enough. Got multiple compliments!
Love the construction and the fit. It was remarked upon everywhere I went! Would purchase if I could afford it!

The coat has a nice mix of colors and has a houndstooth pattern. It is decently warm in mid-Jan in NYC but you definitely need to wear a sweater underneath. The one thing I didn't like though is that there is only 1 button that is set lower, so you need a scarf or a warm sweater underneath or it's too open.

I personally thought that colors on this jacket were a little harsh and made the jacket look cheap so I returned it. Other than that, the fit was nice and it even had a thicker quilted lining so can definitely be worn in cold weather.
Boxy fit, in a perfect way. So many compliments. Dressed up for a holiday party and down for more casual date night dinner. Would absolutely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Cute coat - wish it was a bit more tailored
links_reviews_text: Coat is warm, probably too warm for most days in San Francisco. Wool is a bit scratchy. Plaid is sharp and length is nice. Body is a bit less structured than I hoped so it does not look as smart on. It was more nice than wow.
Great statement coat I get compliments every time I wear, its functional, warm, beautifully crafted. I will keep for a while. TTS
Though it runs big the fit is nice and great for fall layering. Wore it casual and dressed up with heels.

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this coat. Super cozy without being too warm, and made everyday outfits look chic.
links_reviews_text: Cozy and cute with a true to size fit. The buttons were a little loose and could use a refresh. The pockets were also a bit shallow. Overall the fir was accurate and it was so cute !
Oversized without being overwhelming. It has quilting inside too so it's very warm.

links_reviews_title: High quality, but large and dated
links_reviews_text: I rented my normal size, even though I'm 8 months pregnant because everything seems to be so oversized this season. This coat fit with plenty of room, so I'd recommend sizing down. The quality is noticeable and the color scheme paired well with a lot of my fall wardrobe. But overall I felt the look was a little dated, or maybe it would seem more appropriate for someone older. I noticed everyone who commented on the coat was a lot older than me.
Did not fit well over my chest. Really nice but runs small.

links_reviews_title: Just OK Wore it to Alabama football game bc of the houndstooth. Just OK.
links_reviews_text: Maybe I order a size too big. Might have liked it better if it fit me better.
Very trendy. Nice oversized fit

I loved the idea and design but the fit was a little challenging for me. Only wore it once (intended to get the matching trouser for an event that got canceled) and it wasn't super flattering on me but I still liked it. Sized down due to the oversized design but wasn't crazy about to boxy it was.
While the stripes are cute the fit is too boxy. Even if I had taken one size down, the jacket would still have been 3 sizes too big.
Terrible fit on me. I was swimming in it. Hated the strange width at the hips.
Love this dress. Sleeves will be short if you are tall.
A little too conservative for my taste and was a little big for my frame but worked ok for a work trip.
Saddle gold stripe, make it dressy but not over the top, very flattering
Wore this on a plane, super comfy and chick for a business mtg., but not flattering on photos! I'm 5'6, 121 lbs and it made me look heavy

Really love this, I will def keep for a while! It's super comfy and stretchy (so if you're typically a M you could probably go S). There's a nice hidden zipper in the back which I loved because it prevented my from getting makeup all over it. I rented for a work conference and it was perfect - just dressy enough but still casual, and chic enough for an impromptu dressy dinner. 10/10 recommend!!

This dress made me light up like a Christmas tree when I wore it through the screening at TSA. I think this dress was too big for me and it just wasn't very flattering. It was heavy weight which is fine, but the top of the zipper was super scratchy and it drove me nuts the whole day. The length was great for work.
Great material
Cute but not snug. Short on the arms. I ended up folding the sleeves, still cute. Tons of compliments.

Incredibly comfy dress, fabric is thick so great option for winter. TTS and goes to the knees and appropriate for any occasion, though I found the sparkle to be a surprise. While the dress has limited stretch I didn't find it too Bodycon- there was still a good bit of room around the tummy and hips area. Love the turtleneck detailing and the vertical stripes are flattering. Probably wouldn't rent again because it's not really my style but no complaints!
Fits great and looks great given the stretchy parts. Got a bunch of compliments. True to size

links_reviews_title: Cute but heavy and very form fitting
links_reviews_text: This is very pretty and would be super flattering on an hourglass figure. I found it very unforgiving in the waist and therefore won’t be wearing it. The material is quite heavy, so would be too warm to wear in spring or summer; it is also a bit stiff — personally (as someone who is sensitive to itchy material and values comfort over trendiness) I don’t think I’d be comfortable in this for a whole day, but would probably be okay for a few hours at a party.
It fit perfectly and had good stretch to it. Absolutely loved it!

links_reviews_title: Cute! But a lot of fabric
links_reviews_text: The dress is cute. I probably could have sized down to a medium. The fabric was a little overwhelming, and I am not a small person. Overall it was a good dress. Very forgiving.

links_reviews_title: Great detail and fabric. Great fit.
links_reviews_text: The vertical stripes are very flattering and the shimmer in the gold stripe adds detail. I would consider buying this dress.
Wore for a work event with tights and booties. Easy and professional. There is a bit of sparkle to the stripes which wasn't my favorite, but it worked.

My daughter opened the RTR bag before I got home from work and sent me a photo of her holding the dress up -- her face said everything. What looked mod and fun in the photo just seems weird and awkward IRL. Also really heavy and also very itchy. Returning same day.
Fits great! 5 mo post partum so it wasnt too fitted.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but sizing is a bit off.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and comfy for work. I loved the collar. My only compliant is the sleeve length. It's so awkwardly short. Not 3/4 length, but not long. It drove me nuts all day. This may be specific to my fit, but just something to note. I am 5'4 - 0/2 and the XS was the right choice.

links_reviews_title: Had to wear this as a top...
links_reviews_text: ...instead of a dress because it would not have been SFW as a dress. It was a very cute too. The elastic waistband was a little constricting when I sat down, but overall I enjoyed this rental.
Wow did I love this dress!! The fabric pattern is so fun!

links_reviews_title: One of my absolute favorites!! Wish I could keep it!
links_reviews_text: The fit and flare of this dress is so gorgeous!! The skirt is everything! I love the pattern. The material is on the thin side so be mindful of weather/season. I paired this with heels for work and gray booties for fun.
Very fun and flirty. Adjustable waistband allows you to pull this up and make it as short and flirty as you want! Def recommend for a party
This is a fun print and flattering. I only wore it for a couple hours, but got a really nice compliment and felt good in it! I would rent it again.
I made it a bit more conservative by adding tights. Super comfortable.
Loved it

So so comfortable. A tad short and the material is thin so I suggest black tights (unless you have amazing legs). Wore mien with booties and tights for a dinner, waist is elastic and comfortable, flowy but flattering. Cute print. Dress is primarily navy but black tights still worked.

links_reviews_title: Great fit but too short for me
links_reviews_text: The dress looked great but it was very short. I'm only 5 ft tall and it was way above the knee. I tried it with leggings but I didn't like the look.
Pretty dress, perfect for a date or party, a little too short for work IMO.
Lovely light fabric. Runs very big...I'm a size 6 and wore an xs and it was still loose..,

This wasn’t bad, but it wasn’t super flattering on me. I felt like it was too big (especially in the bust) but it also a bit too short for me to wear to work. I normally love these easy-to-wear, throw it on and go types of dresses, so this one was a disappointment.

I rented this with my unlimited. It fits nicely and the print is very fun but it is so short. I am only 5'1" and it was mid thigh on me. Not appropriate for the conservative event I rented it for so I sent it back. Would be a nice choice for someone less concerned about length.
This jacket was sooo warm! I have longer arms, so I personally wish I would've done a medium, but no complaints. Loved wearing it and got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: So cute, especially with crop tops
links_reviews_text: I loved this jacket for my vacation to big bend national park! It kept me warm and looked cute!
I love this jacket! Honestly so cute and comfy and non stop compliments!
Nice casual athlesiure lewk
Couldn't wear this - it ran way too large. The proportions are off - it is cropped yet wide.

links_reviews_title: Was way too tiny but comfy and nice looking
links_reviews_text: Wish I could have worn this because it was so comfortable and soft. But it was just really short which didn't go well with the puffiness of it.

I saw this on the RTR Instagram account & had to rent it! This jacket was amazing--warm, great print & so many people asked me about it. This was hard to return. I really hope RTR sells this soon, because I'm ready for it!
I absolutely love this jacket and don't know why I don't buy it. Definitely going to rent again. Keeps you warm and super stylish good for petites
...but a bit short in the arms for me
I wore this in 50 degree weather with a wool sweater and it was perfect. I don't think it would be good for anything colder, but it looks nice and I would rent again.

So sporty chic for my Super Bowl party. Love the varsity stripe and animal print combo. It felt like this sweater was literally made for the occasion! Not too cropped, I had on high waist jeans and the sweater was long enough! The sleeves were a bit long but I usually push my sleeves up anyhow. I'm usually an XL and figured I would be my usual size in a "cropped" sweater but this size was perfect. Don't hesitate to rent it.
Soft, comfortable and stylish! Loved the print!
Great pattern and fit, super soft

links_reviews_title: This sweater was not only cute it was so soft and comfortable! Can definitely be dressed up or down!

links_reviews_text: Wore this as a comfy combo for working from home. I felt comfy and like I made an effort to be dressed well for the day! Sleeves were nice and long but not too long. More minty green colored than I expected , but I liked that too.

links_reviews_title: Fun sweater for casual weekend look.
links_reviews_text: I love that this sweater has a different take on the animal print trend. The color makes it stand out from every other leopard print sweater. Relaxed fit. Oversized fit and cropped but not too short. Looks best with jeans.
Really cute and comfortable. Perfect for weekend or casual wear.
This is a cute option for jeans in the "cold" LA winters!
One of my friends hated this sweater but I loved it and got so many compliments. Would definitely rent again, and now I am obsessed with the brand
Pros: Comfy sweater, cute print. Nice, soft color. Cons: Bit large, size down.

This sweater is sooo soft and the fit is amazing. It's slightly cropped, with fun sleeves. I would of purchased this sweater, but the particular one I received is so very worn and had too much piling. Other than that, It's great.
Got this for everyday wear to work and around, got so many compliments! Unique piece that I would definitely rent again or buy.

Got this to wear around the house during the holidays and it was perfect. Also wore it out to brunch. So comfy and cute. Not a show stopped, but a comfortable, cute, warm sweater for bundling on cold days.

links_reviews_title: Love that this is a twist on a leopard print
links_reviews_text: Love that this is a twist on the print and the color I feel like it is a mix of camo with teh green and the animal print.

links_reviews_title: On trend sweater, comfortable and casual
links_reviews_text: Warm, comfortable sweater. Fits great, soft colors, trendy.
Oversized fit. Slightly cropped. Color is true to photos.
I sized up for an oversized look. Very comfortable, not itchy at all!
sleeves long but pushed up was fine. comfortable

This sweater is very soft and cozy and the colors are just lovely! However, I highly recommend sizing down at least one size. I am typically a 4/6 in tops and wore this in a small, and there was room for at least one more of me in here! The sleeves are also quite long...I am 5'7" with long arms and I had to cuff the sleeves. If you're looking for a fitted garment, this is not it. But if you want a comfy oversized look, this sweater is for you!

links_reviews_title: So soft and comfortable, I love this brand now!
links_reviews_text: So soft and comfortable, I debated getting an x-small, I am usually a small so would of liked it more fitted but still looked great!
Perfect fit, classic but sexy.
I like everything about this dress! The waist is phenomenal and accentuates the hips wonderfully. Also love the way the buttons run from hem to collar; makes the whole look so chic.

links_reviews_title: Hi, I'm here to rock this meeting.
links_reviews_text: Flattering details, simple dress that you can easily take day to night

This dress was nice. It was a little past my knees so maybe a bit frumpy? The back cinch with the belt is strange. The fabric is too thick to go through the belt loop so the excess fabric just hangs down. It is completely button from top to bottom in the front. There was a little gaping when I sat down. It is formal, but also tight enough to show of the body. I think this would probably be a good funeral/wake dress as well. I paired it with some black wedges.
Fit is great, very flattering on waist, doesn't wrinkle!, goes well to fall with animal print pumps

links_reviews_title: I loved this, but the buttons didn't work for me.
links_reviews_text: Such a cute, simple, streamlined dress for work! It was great when I was standing up. Unfortunately when I sat down the buttons gapped and the little teeny snap in the middle didn't cut it. Great dress - guess I just need to shrink my belly!

This was easy to wear and had a lot of smart details. There were some hook and eye closures where the dress would typically pull, and the horizontal pleating at the waist was also a flattering touch. The length shows some knee even though it's a midi. I would definitely rent again.

This dress is perfect! It is figure flattering, but in no way overly provocative for work. I love the extra waist definition, and smart details like a small hook and eye hidden closure at the waist to prevent any skin peek thru. I might have to purchase this one!!

Great dress to throw on for work! The cinching at the waist is very figure flattering. I would have given it more stars but the buttons tended to gap a bit and in the wrong position you could see to skin.
I usually wear a 12/14 and the 16 fit just right so I think it runs small. It was a great fit, though. Lightweight and good for warm days.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Can wear it for multiple occasions.
links_reviews_text: Great dress- fit my body good and the buttons gave it an extra touch. Would rent again.
I liked the shape of the dress, but it's fairly plain. The buttons are tortoise shell-looking which made it feel like more of a summer dress.
Tailored perfectly. Subtle glamour. Will rent again.

I love this dress! It gives great shape because it has adjustable cinching in the back to define your waist. It also has these wonderful clasps in between some buttons to ensure that things stay nice and closed. As a nursing mom I had very ample room in the bust with this dress (32DD).
I'm not an hourglass body type but this made my waist look great! I also rented this in a 10 in the print because that was available. Both were flattering because of the back tie.

links_reviews_title: Can be worn at work or a night out. versatile
links_reviews_text: If you are tall and narrow it might feel a little baggy. Might fit better on someone with a larger bust. But I still loved it!!!
Midi isn't always a great length for larger sizes but the proportions and quality make this dress a winner!
The fit was great. I liked the semi-belt in the back that helped cinch the dress across the waist. The detailing help complement your curves.

The dress was very professional -- it was tight enough to be flattering and loose enough not to be provocative. I wore the dress with black flats to a conference. I really enjoyed this dress. I especially loved the line of large buttons in the front. My only criticism -- the buckle for the belt around the waist for the is made of beige plastic and looks/feels cheap. Fortunately, the buckle is in the back of the dress and not the front.
Got a few compliments. Dug the dress and fit.

The fit was flattering (cute conch at waist) but style overall was too matronly - something about the combo of the length, the buttons, the shoulders/chest design. The other print may be cuter than the black

links_reviews_title: Classic look, awesome fit! Would rent again.
links_reviews_text: Soft fabric, with detailed buttons down the front. Sexy, but not too sexy for work. Could easily be worn for after hours party.
Fit is TTS, with lightweight fabric. Cinching gives nice waist. Fabric is light, but not sheer. I did not experience gaping like other users.

links_reviews_title: I was nicely surprised at how great this fits!
links_reviews_text: it fits and looks better in person. Everyone complimented me on this dress, truly beautiful!!

links_reviews_title: Classic dress, but didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: I love the simplicity of a black shirt dress, but the fit was off for me. I'm a true size 4, 5'6", short-waisted with a small bust (32 B). Because of my short waist, when the cinched part is at my natural waist, I have a ton of extra fabric on the top part of the dress that I don't fill out. A size down would have helped out on top, but probably would have been too small around my hips since the bottom half is a slim fit. I wanted to love this, and it looks beautiful in other's photos, but wasn't for me. :(
This was a great dress for work and it was so comfortable! I liked it so much I wore it again to the airport while traveling. True to size. Was a great fit.
I rented this dress for work but it was too long and I rented one to two size too big.

links_reviews_title: Would be nicer if not polyester
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were a little long and the fabric too cheap for this to be as classic-chic as I'd hoped. It seemed rather plain. It fit pretty well. It seemed to wrinkle easily but I don't think the wrinkles were noticeable, perhaps due to the dark color.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic work dress with flattering fit
links_reviews_text: Great polished dress in a flattering cut. I am a TTS 16 and found the 16 in this dress to have a comfortable fit, not baggy and no buttons pulling. Will definitely rent again!
It's such a flattering shirt dress that accentuates the waist. Loved it!
Midi length but you can unbutton the bottom button for a flash of knee and easy walking. There are hook and eyes on the top between buttons to keep everything secure.

links_reviews_title: Simple and Elegant with a tricky belt
links_reviews_text: Great for work. The belt cinches the waist in beautifully but the belt is super tricky. It took two of us to get through the buckle.
Chic, great for work
Really love this dress, understated but very slimming. If you have a bit of a tummy, the gathering at the waist does a fantastic job hiding it!

I rented this for a summer business dinner where I wanted to look smart & well heeled, but low key- not like I was trying too hard. The dress was okay- it was nice. The length was gorgeous, and the fit very slimming- I loved how a little leg showed when I walked. But the belt thing in the back was awkward... I tried it on the front, but would have been twisted or backward, so I put a thin belt slung loosely over my natural waste to add a little style. Also the top was kind of weird- no real structure to the collar (which would have taken this dress to a next level couture look), too much room in the chest, and I kind of felt like I was missing a name patch sewn on over my heart. Still, I got plenty of compliments, and was definitely comfortable all day. Bottom line? The dress was fine... It's just missing an it factor.
I sized up but probably didn't need too. This dress allows you to tighten the waist from the back which I loved!
Loved the fabric, buttons and fit. Gorgeous if you want to accentuate your waist. The rushing helps too even if you don't have a flat stomach. I would have kept this as a go-to LBD.
Very cute, very professional

links_reviews_title: Surprised by this long black dress
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4" and feared this would overwhelm. Hits me mid-calf but works because it's slim. Love that there are two hook and eye closures at the waist in addition to buttons, ensuring no peek-a-boo tummy when you sit! One star deducted because the back is a little strange with the puckered fabric. Overall a really great dress for the office that's comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Very professional and chic. I loved this dress for work/interview.
links_reviews_text: Synches the waist making the dress very chic and professional.

This was a little snug on the hips. Glad I sized up. Great quality. The print is amazing and the front peep hole adds an element of sexy without exposing too much. I could wear this to work...if I wasn't on Covid-19 lockdown! I'll definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Le sigh - rented for work but we're all at home due to Coronavirus. Wore in my room alone! :)

links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments on this dress! People even came up to me the next day to tell me how much they liked it. Fit was amazing and fabric was unique and cool.

links_reviews_title: Fun print, conservative style but good shape
links_reviews_text: Wasn't sure at first, but turned out to love this! Makes me feel less boring at work and is really flattering in the shoulders and hips. I'm a 4 mostly, sometimes 6 and went with the 6 for this - I can see it scrunching up in the belly if I went smaller so definitely go to the bigger size if you have hips or are ever between sizes!

Loved the high quality material, unique cut, and trendy animal print with fun alternating neutral colorway. Sophisticated and sexy for a date night, but I wouldn’t have been able to wear to work as the neckline slit came too low and gaped. Minus one star because of the fit which was slightly too large for me, but it would probably do well for most 0’s.
Most comfortable and professional dress ever!

links_reviews_title: Everyone is waiting for this for a reason
links_reviews_text: Great dress. I did size up based on reviews and it for well throughout the dress. Love the pattern and the length is great for your favorite booties.

This dress is a head turner! very high quality fabric and a great fit. I sized up from my normal 2 and it still felt slightly snug but I think it worked. My only complaint is the neckline slit was too long, too much cleavage so I couldn't wear it to work. Other than that this is a great date or party dress!

Wore this to church with thin black belt and black boots. Fit was perfect, even length of sleeves on my very long arms! Pros: Unique, neat design. Fit well. Cons: Material was not lined, not as thick as I expected. Not wild about the puff at top of sleeve.
max coverage pairs perfectly with a slim fit and peeking neckline. mix-matched zebra prints for a funky spin on the animal print trend. high quality material won't wrinkle.
Fits beautifully. Gorgeous material and coloring. Slightly uncomfortable to sit down in but other than that it was great.
A lot of dress going on here, but it's so good. A great flattering cut and a more conservative fit, making a mixed zebra print work appropriate.

This dress looks better in person than on the model photo. I was concerned that the print would be overwhelming but the subtle changes in color were lovely and made for a high fashion look. The cut is flattering but runs a bit small in the hips. I would size up if I were to rent it again. Material is high quality.
For being a short person, this dress didn't seem too long. Loved the fit! Rented it for work but ended up wearing it to a holiday party and it was perfect! Will probably rent again!

I loved this dress. The silk is so smooth and the design is beautiful. The sleeves are perfect for my petite figure. I'm smaller on top then bottom so it was a little tight by the tummy. I wore spanx. I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Animal print done right! Size up!
links_reviews_text: I am not a big animal print person but this dress is amazing. It has so many cool details like the vertical opening at the neckline and the very subtle color shift from one side of the dress to the other. This dress is somehow sexy and extremely covered up simultaneously. I normally wear a size 6 but I first tried the 8 because others had indicated it runs small. The 8 was very unflattering and particularly tight in the hips and belly. I liked it so much that I tried again with the 10 and it was perfect! I am looking forward to wearing this one again during the holiday season.
The peek a boo slot was revealing in a 36d

links_reviews_title: Fit was great, perfect dress to wear day to night!

links_reviews_text: I found this fit very tight, there is a large slit in the front that made it feel slightly inappropriate for work so I had to wear a cardigan to cover
This dress looked like it was custom made for me. It hugged all the right places. Perfect for an hourglass figure. It's a head turner for sure!
This dress was very form fitting. Surprisingly sexy - like - (queue music) Brick House... it was fun to wear, but if you are going for a more conservative work look maybe size up.

Loved this dress! I normally wear a size 8 but the 10 fit perfectly. I paired it with a belt to add a little something extra and it looked great. Got a lot of compliments and it's great for a lot of different occasions.
TTS and super easy to wear! Another winner from ALC. the dress has some stretch to it, didn't want to send back!

The lining on the skirt is definitely cut more snuggly than the overlay fabric. The good news is there's no need for spanks the bad news is if you have full hips- it could be a little restrictive. I added the belt just emphasize my waist but it looks nice without it too.

links_reviews_title: I owned every room I walked in to
links_reviews_text: This dress stopped traffic. I styled it with striped shoes and went all monochrome. Had a big family brunch and everyone I met said I liked like a model.

Loved this dressed! Much more flattering in person. I pinned the opening at the chest to make it a bit more work appropriate. Fit well. Maybe a little loose fitting but I don't think it would have looked as nice tighter. Compliments all day on it!
Gorgeous dress. Usually wear size 4 but it was a little tight in the hips.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rentals yet!
links_reviews_text: I loved this 100% silk ALC dress and would definitely rent it again! Received compliments, but also just felt like a boss all day wearing this. The cool kind of boss. Like, if this dress was in a movie, it wouldn't be the sidekick wearing it. I said true to size because it's true to ALC size. I'm a 14 in ALC, but a 10 in Lululemon. Ha. 10/10 would recommend.

links_reviews_title: loved this dress!! just the right sophistication for sunday brunch
