links_reviews_text: fit was close and form fitting which was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Go a size up, so beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I was getting so many compliments with this dress. Definitely go a size up. The fabric is light and feels nice to the touch and the print is really lovely. The cut of it looks really nice on an hourglass shape. This is a dress I plan to buy!

links_reviews_title: Not for large breasted women, unless you're wanting to show all your goods....
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful and slit down the front nice but only if you have a small chest and no cleavage. Otherwise it looks like your dress split in the middle similar to when pants are too tight and split down your behind... the slit is way too low, beneath braw strap.
Fun, flattering, forgiving dress. Sized up and it fit perfect.

Great print. Material was soft and comfortable. I probably should have gotten a 6R. The hips were a little snug on me. I am petite and the length was still ok. The only negative was the slit at the top of the chest. It gapped a little on me. I am small busted.

Fits true to size. Lightweight fabric has a little stretch which makes it very comfortable to wear. I rented a 12 but probably could have used a 10. Wore dress to cocktail event at golf club and received lots of compliments. As usual, I tell them its RTR then spend the next 15 minutes showing them the app and answering questions about how RTR works. EVERYONE is excited about using RTR!

links_reviews_title: Great dress but very form fitted
links_reviews_text: Good for a date.

links_reviews_title: Surprised by how much I loved this
links_reviews_text: I went up a size and I'm glad I did because the arms and chest is on the smaller side. Still very cute and flattering. Lots of compliments.

Normally wear a 2-4 and got a 6 based on reviews. It fit perfectly. It has no give whatsoever and the seam at the ribs was perfect so definitely size up. Beautiful style, fabric, everything! Loved this and will definitely rent again. Keyhole is a bit cheeky but nothing too crazy.
fit to a tee...wore it to work and for evenings

Loved this dress. The fabric is beautiful and feels so silky. I would say it's a little small in the shoulders but not terrible… mostly because the fabric doesn't stretch. Forgiving in the waist but a little tight around the lower hip/saddlebag area but could still wear and stayed true to my normal size.
Fits nicely through waist. Hit mid-calf. Beautiful silk.

links_reviews_title: Fun twist on a white spring dress
links_reviews_text: I loved the textured fabric and thought the romper was a nice twist on a classic white spring dress. Loved the tortoise shell buttons. I was planning to wear it with a denim jacket but alas it was too short in the torso (not enough fabric between shoulder and shorts to be comfortable). I was sort of surprised, because most of my height is in my legs and I don't think of myself as having a particularly long torso.
Runs big but falls nicely. This dress was only fine for me.

I rented this for a presentation and felt comfortable and confident. I'll rent it again! I'm tall and appreciated the conservative fit. If you are short or young, you may think this is matronly looking. I loved it. Fabric was high quality with some subtle stretch. Received new with tags!

I would rent again! PROS -Let's step into fall together with this lovely burnt orange. -I love a dress easy to slip on. -The details of this split, work-appropriate. -I loved the color and the style of this. A lot of room to breathe and still look cute. CONS -None-

links_reviews_title: Great dress doe casual day at work.
links_reviews_text: Form fitting, but flattering.

links_reviews_title: Stand out in a sea of black and navy suits in this professional dress
links_reviews_text: Wore to a regional meeting during which I was a presenter. With gold jewelry and and ivory pashmina, to keep the chill out the chill. I’m 5’5”, and this was mid calf length on me, very flattering cut and color. I got tons of compliments. It skimmed my curves, however I noticed by the end of the day it had really stretched out in the back from sitting, so I would not have been able to wear out for dinner that night.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color, not for curvy girls
links_reviews_text: This dress was cut very boxy and was HUGE on me through the midsection. I'm between a 4 and 6 and the 4 was at least three inches too big in the waist. Could be very flattery for Apple/pear shape women though as it would definitely not hug the waist and tummy

links_reviews_title: Great color and perfect for the office
links_reviews_text: This dress is well made and is an attention grabbing color but even though I sometimes wear an 8 I was swimming in the 6. Size down.
The fit was too loose and the fabric looked old and dingy

links_reviews_title: Got tons of compliments on it - LOVED this dress
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, fits very well. Like the seam that is diagonal down the front

This was beautiful and well made, but I should have sized down because it was loose everywhere. Also I am 5'3" so it was too long on me. I wore it, and received compliments, but did not look at all like the model in the photo.
I'm between a 4 and 6 and went with the 4 and still too big. Definitely needed a 2.
I like it.
Easy kind of loose dress perfect for work. The slit up the legs adds a little pizzazz.
Wore it for my birthday and received alot of compliments.
This dress could be worn a size smaller, it looked good but the fit was too roomy.

I didn't get to wear this because it was AT LEAST one size too big. I am almost always a 6 and this dress gaped on me. I would side down at least one if not two sizes. I wish I could have worn it because it was very well made and had some interesting sealing on it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress which fit very well. Worked well for the holidays.
links_reviews_text: A little long for my 5'4" body.
Needed the next size. It has Lycra however it's slim fit. Overall nice red dress office to dinner appropriate!
The dress is as comfortable as pajamas. Runs large. Doesn't wrinkle easy. The slit is much more subtle than the photos show.
Runs a little big - I'm usually a size 4, but the size 2 fits beautifully. It's a thick stretchy jersey fabric so not super-business-formal.

links_reviews_title: Runs large, has a lot of give, but the color is lovely
links_reviews_text: I have wool pieces from this brand that are a bit better of a fit for me in a size 2. This dress seemed to run large, and because it is ponte it does have a lot of give. I'm usually either a 0 or 2 depending on the brand (0 at J. Crew, 2 at Theory). This was just enormous. Too long, so that the waist fell far too low on me (and I have a long torso), and just baggy all around otherwise. Couldn't make it work with a belt. Maybe I'll try a smaller size, because it is pretty.
Loved the color and the longer length in the back! It was very well made and perfect for Texas "winter".
Great with jeans and booties for a winter/fall look

The poncho is cozy and comfortable. I wore it 4 times and received compliments every time. Can be worn in warm or cool weather - super versatile. I will definitely rent again. It runs large, so I recommend sizing down.
Color is like pistachio meets mustard yellow- unique and cute with white jeans for a casual visit to Phoenix in winter
It's comfy, it's funky, and it's a great bright color! I would definitely rent again or even buy it!
I wore this to a baby shower and got lots of compliments. Super comfortable and runs pretty true to size. I'd wear it again.

This sweater was all about the color for me- it was a beautiful chartreuse. I wore it for a casual birthday dinner with my family. I got lots of compliments at work. My only complaint is the pilling. I would think that a high-quality sweater wouldn't pill as much on the surface. *sorry I didn't take a better photo

Got so many compliments on this one! It was really big but also listed as a poncho. Super comfortable but stood out from normal sweaters. Did start to pill after 2-3 wears which is why I only gave 4 stars.

links_reviews_title: Such a fun unique colored poncho!
links_reviews_text: Can wear with leggings because it's longer in the back! Great for everyday use
I didn't realize how green this sweater is! I personally didn't love the color. The back is much longer than the front. Overall, it was a fine rental, but there are better sweaters out there IMO!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable, does run large- but that's also the style
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable. Runs pretty large. I would rent the sm/med next time. Even tho the style is meant to be oversized, it was a bit too oversized for my height. Still wore it anyway, and liked it.

links_reviews_title: This could have been a keeper...
links_reviews_text: ...if it had arrived in pristine condition. Gorgeous color. Smart neckline. Interesting pattern. Heavy-enough wool. But it wasn't. So back it went.
Unique color and great for spring/fall. Warm but shortsleeve. Good detail and looks cute with black jeans/leggings. Showing wear but not terrible.
Comfy and roomy but not too big. It was my go-to the entire time I had it
High quality, soft & sophisticated. I paired it with black leggings, pointy flats and turquoise earrings. Will be wearing this again before I mail it back. <3
Such a fun and cute piece!!!

links_reviews_title: High quality knit with eye catching color pop!
links_reviews_text: Super cute poncho that offers a great color pop for work or play. Warm enough to take the place of a jacket if you pair it with a turtleneck. Works with black pants, jeans or leggings. Kept it an extra month I loved it so much!
The color in person was brighter than I was expecting. This was easy to wear with faux leather leggings and booties. It definitely covers your butt.

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater! Got a ton of compliments. Looks super chic, while you're actually comfy cozy.
links_reviews_text: It's an oversize fit that looked great with black leather leggings
The color is more of a dark yellow. It's not for every skin tone. However, very comfortable. Oversized!
I was swimming in this sweater! I couldn't wear bc it looked like I was a child wearing a large adult sweater. The color and fabric were nice!

links_reviews_title: Kept for a week, wanted to wear it every day
links_reviews_text: Beautiful poncho great with a thin layer underneath. Super warm and cozy. I wore this to church, to my sister's day of wedding dress shopping, and to a work event. Received compliments galore! Great with jeans or tights, covers your bum well. My only complaint is this is one of my most "loved" items to date. This is a thick sweater material that was pretty heavily pilled when I received it, but I was comfortable wearing it as is.
Such a great sweater
Loved this! Roomy without being frumpy. Not at all itchy.

links_reviews_title: Love it! Great color and easy to wear! Textured print adds a little drama!
links_reviews_text: Overall easy!
Loved it! Very comfy oversized sweater shirt
This poncho is adorable, but I was disappointed because it's a lot more green than it appears in this photograph. It is comfy, but it sheds a lot.
really couldn't decide on this one. walks the line between comfy and clown-y. but an easy throw-on basic if you're into volume.

This dress is the frumpiest thing I have ever tried on, go down like 2 sizes if you want to order this. I had to belt it to even want to wear it WFH... also the button in the back is IMPOSSIBLE to work. It took me 10 minutes to get this dress on. Would not recommend.

links_reviews_title: I'm not sure what the story is here.
links_reviews_text: This looked like something David Byrne would have worn in the 1980s. I love man-repeller dresses, I'm way into the big volume thing, but this was crazy even by those standards. Nope.
This has been my most favorite item to date. It is super comfy, flattering, and easy to dress up or make casual. This one might be staying with me!

Bought this top for work and love it. Super professional-looking and cute at the same time. I paired it with black jeans, but would also be cute with a skirt. Usually wear an 8, but opted for a 6 as it was the last size left and still fit pretty well.

The fit was on point but the material was very different than I expected. I was imagining more of a knit and it was actually very spandexy. It was good for work but I probably wouldn't rent again. Just average for me.

The fabric is spandex-y, but not too tight. It keeps a beautiful shape and is very comfortable. It is slightly boat neck, revealing more collarbone than typical work blouses, which gives it a subtle sexiness.
Great for work or going out. Comfortable fit
Love love this top! It is a stretchy material and fitted. I worn it for the first time today and had so many compliments!
This top is so flattering and unique, and added height to my petite frame. I got tons of compliments!
I wasn't sure about the material at first but it grew on me. I wore it twice before sending it back!
This top was such a pleasant surprise!! I loved it. I don't know what I was expecting but it exceeded my expectation! This is a must rent or buy! Wish I could have kept it!!
Came to me with the tags on, so the fact I was the first the flaunt this shirt was empowering. I feel so professional in this shirt. Will be wearing again to a work event.

It's a nice top, but I was surprised by the scuba material. I actually like neoprene but it should be more fitted. This is too loose in the waist for my liking. Also the neckline makes it hard to wear to work. Arrived new with tags, I'll be returning it unworn.

I wore this with black jeans to work on a Friday for a look that was technically casual but still felt professional, since I knew I'd be meeting with one of my firm's partners for the first time. It arrived NWT and wasn't quite as tight as other items I've ordered from this designer (possibly because it was so new). I'm a 2 or a 4 depending on the brand, and I usually order a IT 40 (US 4) in this designer. I opted for a strapless bra because of the neckline. Could have probably gone braless

links_reviews_title: A flattering top but size down
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work. It's a great too and very comfortable. I wished I had sized down because it was a bit large and loose around my arm pits. Also, I needed a strapless bra in order for my straps to not show. Just something to note

links_reviews_title: Awkward fit but lovely fabric and pattern
links_reviews_text: The neck is somewhere between a boat neck style and a wide scoop-which then looks cowl neck in the middle if not stretched out at the shoulders. The chest looked too wide on me and I'm 34c. I really wanted to like this but didn't look good on.

Fit was great except for the sleeves. They were a tad tight on my forearms. The sleeves are 3/4 in length. Fabric was amazing! Feel was great. Loved the boatneck style. Wouldn't definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: It is beautiful. Runs true to size and fits perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Such a classy top and it fits perfectly. Highly recommend.
Tons of compliments! Unique shape, pretty but classic pattern, and comfortable fabric! Loved this top!
I'm 5'1 and weigh about 110 pounds. This shirt fit pretty well. However, it made my chest look larger than it is which i dont personally like to accentuate. The material is comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Love this!! Comfortable, stretchy, flattering and doesn't wrinkle. Versatile piece!!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, stretchy, flattering and doesn't wrinkle. Versatile piece that goes with satin pants, pencil skirt, jeans etc. Received a lot of compliments
Great fit, waist was high
Great fit and I received a ton of compliments on it.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, but large in the waist- if you're an hourglass, size down!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely gorgeous like everything else by this designer. Always made to fit and flatter a curvy woman, I appreciate the attention to detail & high quality fabric choice. Only word of advice is size down, I was swimming in this top and ultimately decided not to wear it because of the sizing.... can't wait to order it a size down! Size note: I'm a very consistent size 14 (5 ft. 9 195 lbs), rented a 50, and will go down to 48 next time.

links_reviews_title: I would have never picked this up, but...
links_reviews_text: Super flattering. The fabric is a little thicker so smooths everything. It's totally not something I would usually consider but trying to get away from basics here. So glad I did; will rent again
Looks like wool but is actually similar to a neoprene. Cute cut. If you are large chested, they look even larger because of the high neck.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pattern, flattering cut, and comfy fabric - perfect for the office
links_reviews_text: I really liked this top! I wore it twice. The shape is very flattering, and I liked the stretchy fabric. It was thick enough to be flattering, but thin enough to be comfortable. The tweed-y pattern is cute and great for the office. The boat neckline is also flattering, but does require either a strapless bra or adjusting the straps on a regular bra (which I didn't mind and is pretty much always the case with this type of neckline). I would definitely recommend this. I think it's an especially nice transitional-weather piece because it does feel breathable while still providing coverage.
Great for work-to-drinks. Tight, stretchy material but still work appropriate. Cinches the waist but also hides belly fat. Great shirt.
This fit perfectly and slimmed me down quite a bit. I got a lot of compliments. I don’t want to return it!!
I loved this top. The picture looks exactly how it fits. It is very flattering to the waist and I loved the stretch fabric. I wore it several times.

links_reviews_title: I got 3 compliments in one day! Perfect silhouette with an edgy, yet professional style.
links_reviews_text: Fitted on top, with enough comfort and give around the belly for all-day wear.
Comfortable and great for work

Like all their designs, this is made from stretchy wetsuit-like material. I loved wearing it (very flattering shape on an hourglass figure), but it isn't the most breathable fabric so got a bit warm with the office heating system. Would still rent again!
beautiful but way too big

Pros: Professional yet trendy style for work. Worn with black pants and heels. Cons: It is NOT wool! Its a polyester, stretchy type material that comes off somewhat cheap. If it was wool, I would seriously consider buying it. But the cheap material is fine for a one time rental.
Great fit very tts, great fit super flattering not thick or too thin, great timmy hider too
This top runs large. It is a fun style, but would have looked better one size smaller.
A very cute top. I ended up wearing it out for dinner, and dressed it up with a pretty necklace
Just not my style. The extra fabric at the peplum added bulk to my waist and hips, which I don't really have. If you are looking to camouflage these areas this shirt would be a good choice.
This runs a little small but cute top.

links_reviews_title: If you are tall like me, it may be trickier to wear this top, too short
links_reviews_text: Nicely fitted, but short
Pants are a great material. They hold their shape well, super comfortable. The cut is a little plain Jane, but, works a base piece.
Good quality but high waisted so if you don't like that, these aren't for you. True to size

links_reviews_title: Very comfy but chic work pant
links_reviews_text: Loved the material. Wrinkle resistant, thick, and high quality, but had a lot of stretch so they were super comfortable. I seriously wish all my work pants were made from this textile. I generally size up from my dress size of 4 to a 6 in pants. These fit true to size, which means on an hour glass figure like mine these were great in the legs and hips but loose on my waist. Only giving a 4 because the cut is a little wider at the ankles than I expected, making a bit of a flare.
Loved the look, can pair up with several tops for work or play.

These were nice looking tailored work pants. These are high waisted though and tight in the waistband, so if you have even a little bit of a belly, you might want to size up. They are good length, I can't wear anything ankle or cropped for work which is hard to find with the current trends. material was good quality, and they don't stretch out too much throughout the day.

links_reviews_title: It was good fit, basic black pants
links_reviews_text: High waisted
I don't know what size I received. Not indicated on garment. Fit and quality were great. It was just too small in the waist. Would rent again in a larger size.

links_reviews_title: I loved these pants! They fit me perfectly everywhere except for the length.
links_reviews_text: I loved these pants! They fit me perfectly everywhere except for the length, they were way too long for me. I am 5'4-5'5 and wore them with 2-3 inch heels, and still had to cuff them slightly underneath because they were too long. But, that aside, I still loved these pants -- I just wish they had a shorter option.
#workflow Fit was absolutely perfect!!!
These pants are made of such a wonderful luxe material. Overall, a pretty standard slim leg, high-waisted black pant, but the material does take it up a notch. Very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Classic black pants, with a great fit!!
links_reviews_text: A pant we all should own! Loved the high waste, full length and slight stretch! Throw in the TTS fit, and you've got the perfect pant, which you can easily dress up or down. Seriously considered purchasing, and with more discount, would've bought. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: The fabric and fit are divine!
links_reviews_text: I rented these pants for an every day look & to try some different brands I mean I normally go to. These Emporio Armani pants are perfect for so many things could be dressed up or down – I wore to work with a silver sheath and a gray sweater and looked spectacular! Very professional. Plus little black booties of course. The fit and tailoring of these pants is wonderful – they really fit my body and I appreciate it! Try these out!

links_reviews_title: Loved them- perfect tailored fit and perfect for work.
links_reviews_text: These were perfect for work and a work party, paired with a sleeveless printed top.
Great fitting pant. They fit perfect and gave a bit throughout the work day. Had I wanted them for a party, I'd have wanted to try the next size down. But for work the additional room was fine!
These pants fit beautifully and had belt loops. Best of the basics imho.
The pants fit perfectly. Although a little long, I loved the fit!
Very flattering fit. My legs looked and felt longer!

links_reviews_title: Favorite pants to date! So comfortable and slimming.
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit. And very comfortable.
These are the black work pants of my dreams. Perfectly tapered in the leg, excellent combination of stretch and structure, perfect length. Might have to hold onto these for a while!
Beautiful quality but no give on the waist so I recommend maybe sizing up.

I absolutely loved this top. I'm usually a size small but extra small was all that was available so I got that. Extra small ended up fitting perfectly and still had a lot of baggage area around my waist so I talked it into my high waist pants to give it more shape. It has a lot of silver sparkle going through it. I felt like a pretty snow princess.

Fit perfect like a glove - love the 80s vibe and puff sleeve. The sparkle fabric is nice touch and not over the touch. A complete stranger commented on my sweater coming out the mall. Love this and want to purchase.

links_reviews_title: Great for work or an evening out!
links_reviews_text: Loved this top.. sleeves felt a little short.
This was a fun top to wear. I usually wear a small, but read the comments so I sized up and it fit perfect.

links_reviews_title: Love the sparkle and puff sleeve
links_reviews_text: This was great, super cute and got lots of compliments at work. It was a tad short in the arms but not enough for anyone else to notice

links_reviews_title: Eye catching and different. The slight sparkle adds to the interest.
links_reviews_text: It is a little short in the torso, but minimally.

The fabric is nice and beefy, stretch material. Puff sleeves are cute. Sparkly but not itchy, smooth inside of fabric. Stretch knit, but it looks tailored & polished. Cute, comfortable and warm top to wear out on date night.
I love this sweater. It is shimmery, a bit cropped so I wore with high waist jeans. The arms/shoulders brought the drama - love, love, love!

links_reviews_title: The shirt fit well after I sized up.
links_reviews_text: The shirt was pretty. I couldn’t tell on the while it was on the hanger, but there was a hold the size of my pinky in the back of my shirt. I had several coworkers point it out :( very disappointing
it is a little sparkly for every day wear
Fits well and adds a little sparkle to a date night or dinner with friends

This is so adorable. The sleeves were a little short but other than that, I loved it and would rent it again. The sparkles in the fabric and puffed sleeves set this one apart and it's super comfortable.
fine

I'm almost 5'9 so it might be my height, but this shirt came up so short on me. The material is also much more metallic than I expected - good for Christmastime or a night out but not for work or daytime.

links_reviews_title: Sparkle Pizzaz and can be worn up and down
links_reviews_text: This shirt is gorgeous. Its sparkles and can be dressed up or dressed down. It was form fitting with room.
Great fit, love the shoulder detail. Fabric was comfy. Would have preferred more color options.
Rent this! You won't regret it. It truly looks far better in person than on the RTR app. I received so many compliments on this piece and I felt like a million bucks!
Fit is true to size and looked great! Can tuck into pants/skirt but also has great structure left out. I felt great in it and lots of compliments. Will rent again for sure
Loved the color and style, but top runs small.
Overall this top runs small everywhere. The sleeves were especially short, so I pushed them up like the model has done. The sparkle in the fabric elevates the top so you can dress it up more.

links_reviews_title: Fabric is great, it is a fun top with the sparkles and poofy sleeves.
links_reviews_text: I'm usually between a small and medium in tops and I'm glad I got the medium. I wore with jeans and a leather jacket and it was perfect.
was a nice fit
I love this sweater. I didn't get to wear it because it is very WARM - great if it's super cold. Still a beautiful shirt I'd recommend.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments with this top. Wore it to a party and felt comfortable and beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Great fit and lots of compliments.
Form fitted and a beautiful fabric. It's quite beautiful on. Will definitely rent again. Due to the zipper, be sure you check sizing. The size I got for me perfectly.

Fits like a dream and adds the perfect flair to any outfit. I wore mine with jeans but you could easily dress it up to look a bit fancier. Also, surprisingly comfortable given that it has that glittery material on the outside. Would rent again!
Didn't end up wearing bc the sleeves were huge and it was glittery.

links_reviews_title: Better for an occasion than for daytime
links_reviews_text: This was a really cute sweater but I failed to realize it had a silver, shimmery thread in the weave. I ordered it for work, so I didn’t wear it. I would order it again for a night out.

links_reviews_title: So cute, but better for an evening occasion
links_reviews_text: It's hard to tell from the photo but there is silver thread running through this, which made it too formal for my business casual work environment. Also, I am typically a M-L in RTR designer tops and the XL in this top fit perfectly. Will rent again for a different occasion!
Ran a bit too large and the sparkles were more than I bargained for.
This was literally so sparkly - not at all like the photo! The fit was flattering but I couldn't wear to work so returned.
Not what I expected. I rented this for work thinking it was a heathered blue with subtle puffed sleeves. Instead, it's a very shimmery, very bold sweater. Had to send back without wearing.

Loved this fun, lightweight sweater. It's super comfortable, the colors are nice pastels, and it fit perfectly. Despite the crochet like material, it's not really see through much at all. I would definitely rent this again.
Cute and comfortable, can dress up or down!

links_reviews_title: Cute & Comfy but way too short
links_reviews_text: The stripes are super cute and the sweater itself is comfortable, but it's way too short. If it were 2 inches longer I would give it 5 stars. I still wore it, but felt a little uncomfortable with the cropped length.

It's shorter in length, but not crop. Must wear something underneath as the holes are large. I wore a tank top and it's a good sweater to wear before really cold temps hit. Well made and like the colors and pattern.

I've rented this 2+ times now, and the first time I think I wore for 4 straight days. It's SO comfy and smelled really good when it was delivered! In addition to feeling like pajamas it's a really cute sweater that you can dress up or down. The only thing to be weary of is that it runs slightly large- I was surprised when RTR recommended the XS, but am so glad I listened!
I wore this to a concert and for traveling. It's lightweight and since it has holes, it can be very breezy. I wouldn't recommend it for super cold weather. A cute transitional piece.
Love the print and fit of this style. The material is perforated so great lightweight sweater for a warmer day.
I loved the colors and fabric. I got a lot of compliments!
Wore this multiple times since being stuck at home. Paired with both regular jeans and white jeans. Would have bought, but the sleeves were too long and a bit baggy.
I got several compliments on this. If you're inbetween sizes I suggest going up. It's almost a little too short to front tuck but certainly not a crop. That's where I would suggest to size up
would have loved this sweater if it was just a little longer - after 2 kids i CANNOT pull off any kind of crop top look.
This is a casual, lightweight spring/summer sweater. It's also slightly cropped.
easy to wear and casual. the body was a little short

links_reviews_title: It was just OK. Nothing special
links_reviews_text: Average fit. Long arms

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater! I wore it with jeans and just with leggings. Was perfect everyday wear!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size

links_reviews_title: Wore to a brewery with friends - not my typical color scheme but looked great!
links_reviews_text: Cut sweater with a crop cut! Not too short, but wore with high waisted jeans.
Easy to wear. Easy to layer. Wore it like 5 times!
Slightly boxy fit but overall cozy, knit sweater

links_reviews_title: Such a nice lightweight sweater in a fun pattern
links_reviews_text: I loved this for everyday! It's got a lot of holes so you probably need a tee or tank under it, but that makes it nice and lightweight. I loved the color, which was nice and vibrant.
I LOVED this sweater. It's perfect for "just a little cool" days or if the AC is cranking in the office. A great layering piece!
I received so many genuine compliments on this sweater--the colors are great! Comfy & cozy.

links_reviews_title: This sweater is the ultimate summer essential.
links_reviews_text: I wore it multiple times over the course of labor day weekend and got so many compliments each time. The colors are so pretty - punchy but subtle enough. It's so versatile for summer weather. I wore it with jean shorts on a breezy morning and out at night with white jeans to a laid back bar.

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear but cute!
links_reviews_text: It's a little heavy. Was hopeful I'd be able to wear it one evening but still way too hot in Texas. A little boxy I'm not much shape but could've made it work.

links_reviews_title: This sweater was easy to throw on for a cool summer night
links_reviews_text: Loved the weight of this sweater! Super cute!!
So disappointed, this sweater is like a crop top. Hit above my belly button and I'm 5 6'. This is not shown in the pictures at all. Sent back immediately.

I'm so glad this finally became available in black. I rented the navy version of this back in December to complete a few navy/white/black outfits. I had sized up one to accommodate sweaters - which made sense at the time, because the sleeves are initially quite tight along the shoulders and upper arms. despite a very loose fit in the torso. In renting the new black iteration for this season, I had both the XL and L shipped to me just in case the sizing was a little too tight in the shoulders/arms again. After trying both on, I was swimming in the XL vs. the perfect silhouette of the L. Also bears remembering that leather stretches with wear; so, if you're between sizes, choose the smaller size in this.

This dress is super cute, but it is ONLY lace on the top! I got thinking it was white underneath and you would have to wear it as a cover up or with some kind of slip underneath. That said, it did fit my 38w pregnant belly. It's cute but didn't work for me.

Great dress for work, conservative but with a fun touch per the tie neck. Gorgeous color and great lines, very flattering! I only took off one star because the material does wrinkle fairly easy (as seen in photo taken 2 hours in to work day). Still will probably rent again!

links_reviews_title: Dress was okay. Loved keyhole. Tie around the neck was short and awkward. Made it into choker.
links_reviews_text: True to size. Professional look. Material not my favorite, almost polyester/cotton. Nice length.

I liked this dress, and got lots of compliments. Nicely form fitting. I tried on the XS and couldn't even get it zipped, but the small fit great without being too tight. Only downside is it wrinkles easily even with just sitting down. See picture.

links_reviews_title: Cute work dress but wish it was lined
links_reviews_text: Would like this better if lined.

links_reviews_title: Sunday night at the opera house
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size and the plum color of this dress is beautiful but I thought the quality was lacking. Fabric is quite thin and dress is unlined. The tie neck was fun, but this dress would have benefited from more attention to detail.

This is one of my favorite pieces I've gotten from RTR. The dress was so slimming and flattering and the neck bow gave it some pop. For me, I have pretty broad shoulders/arms so while a size down would've worked in the sides/stomach region, there's no way it would've fit my upper body. Similarly, I think bustier women might struggle with this dress because the material does not give at all.

links_reviews_title: The color, fabric & style of this dress is beautiful. However, this dress is very large.
links_reviews_text: I didn't even try this dress on because when I opened the bag, I immediately knew that it was too large for me. The dress is even more beautiful in person because of the color and fabric. It's unfortunately too big.
Unique dress great color!

I loved this dress but wish it had been a half size larger on the top half. I'm small chested and the dress was very tight on top. Also, showed bra rolls which normally are not an issue for me. Would probably size up next time.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and lightweight fabric, but did not work on curvy frame. L too small on size 12.
links_reviews_text: Couldn't zip up upper back, normally wear a size 12, 36DD bust. Maybe just not a good fit for someone with curves.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but overall fit runs big.
links_reviews_text: Not a good option for petite girls. Was baggy all over and too long.
Wanted to love this dress but I knew it was right before zipping up. Chest area is fine but it's tight around the stomach and butt. Definitely size up if you want to order this dress.
A little thin, but very flattering. I wore it with tights to work. The length was great, given that I am 5'9".

links_reviews_title: great looking dress but a little tight in the hips for me. Wish I could have worn it!
links_reviews_text: Tight in hips and back. Great length, fit, loved it.
This dress would not zip on the top, its probably best for someone with a smaller ribcage and chest proportions and a pear shape!
Nice fabric, but order at minimum two sizes up. The tie at the neck is very awkward to style. Sticks to every bump and lump; shaper is an absolute must!
Went one size up and it was still small on me. Fabric is too clingy for me. Wasn't able to wear the item.
Nice and classic color and cut. It's slightly on the larger size, but I think that it made it even more flattering.
Love the cut and style but the material is not a high quality. It's thin and doesn't look as elegant as I'd hoped.
This is a great sweater to throw on with jeans and boots. I love the soft material!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it because way too boxy and unflattering.
links_reviews_text: If sweater was longer, boxy fit would have been more stylish, but it was too wide and short and frumpy. The sleeves were also too short. Not recommended.

Perfect for a chilly day! This sweater is "oversized," but the sleeve length is true to size and the 2 was perfect for me. Wore it to work and to just bum around the house and run errands. So comfortable and cuddly soft.

This was really comfy as it's an oversized sweater. I have a longer torso and the length was great with jeans. Wore dressed down with sneakers and then also with heeled booties. The head detail was very cute and I received a lot of compliments

links_reviews_title: I had to return this sweater before I wore it.
links_reviews_text: This sweater feels dreamy and is super cute. Unfortunately, the one I rented arrived with a giant blue pen stain on the front. I am surprised no one noticed this during the cleaning and sending process. Really unfortunate as I was timing the arrival for a vacation. Let's see how fast they will ship me a new one!
I needed the size 2, but it was not available. I took a chance and ordered the size 3. I ended up loving the oversized look. Warm, cuddly, soft.
Perfect oversized casual sweater! Very soft and super comfortable, looked great with black skinny jeans and sneakers!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear because item was damaged
links_reviews_text: Shrunken and over dry cleaned, could not wear
Comfortable, top quality
Super easy to wear. It come up in the front and lower in the back. It is an oversized baggy sweeter. Super soft and easy to throw on with jeans or shorts.
Great for work and weekends. I wore it with leather leggings and boots, ton of compliments. Really loved it.

cozy sweater, i ordered the S and it was pretty wide. the length was good, if i had sized down to the XS i think it would have been more cropped than i typically like. the material is amazingly warm though!
It was a cozy sweater that kept me warm all day.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and flattering with leggings, skinny jeans, etc.
links_reviews_text: Loved the simplicity with a touch of small detail.
This sweater is really comfortable and looks cute on, but does run a bit large. I wore when 39 weeks pregnant, so was perfect, but would have been a bit too bulky if I was not pregnant.
Really cute oversized soft sweater. Love the style and fit, but know that it is big. Shorter in front and a little longer in back. Cute with jeans or camo pants or sweats. Really cozy!!
Really cozy! A bit bulkier than I expected but overall a great fit.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it.
links_reviews_text: It's supposed to be oversized so I should have sized down. It just felt too long and too big.
Cozy, warm, and perfect for a casual day. Loved it!
Very unflattering...couldn't wear
Adorable fit and color and style
It's a cute sweater but it is very boxy so it's not flattering at all. Comfy and warm though.

links_reviews_title: Cozy and really warm. I wore it without a jacket.
links_reviews_text: It was a littttle oversized for me but most people would be a perfect fit.
Very nice drape despite loose fit goes well with cropped jeans and booties for cool edgy look.fabric is soft cozy not itchy or irritating on the skin
It isn't super flattering... but I wanted to live in this cozy sweater and leggings. I wore it to/ from yoga and brunch with friends. And rented it twice!
I loved wearing this sweater! It was super soft and comfortable. Very oversized but cute -- I love the red heart embroidered at the bottom. I wore this with super skinny jeans and booties.
Casual and comfortable! It can be dressed up or down for a fun look.

links_reviews_title: Too large to wear. Awkward fit
links_reviews_text: This was huge. But besides being huge I thought something was off with the cut of the arms. I couldn't wear it.
Really liked this sweater. Cute heart detail and trim. Fun oversized fit. Cozy. Super soft knit.
Very oversized and really cute with skinny jeans or leggings. Casual and a cross btwn a sweater and sweatshirt.
It was an odd combination of oversized meets crop top. Length was good but the width was too much
This sweater is oversized and so cozy. I personally love the way it hung right over my hips and was oversized. It's soft, warm, and the heart detail is so cute. Love the pop of color!
The sweater, as described, is oversized, but it was a bit boxier than I expected. The material is extremely soft and comfortable. The sweater looked cute with jeans styled for everyday wear.

This sweater is just so warm - it’s almost like it’s heated on the inside or something. Really cozy. I loved the fit, a nice oversized drape. The neck was a little larger (maybe stretched out?) than was ideal. Heart detail is very cute. More of a casual look but super high quality.
Very comfortable
I'll be returning without wearing. The material is nice and the print is cute; but it's fits very oversized and the thickness of the material doesn't hang well leaving a less than flattering shape.
Love this sweater. I wore it for a lazy weekend with leggings and it was perfect! It was cozy. It is a bit oversized, but I didn't mind! Worked perfect with leggings
I'm down for an oversized sweater but this one was weird - too fluffy not cute

links_reviews_title: I love a big sweater that being said - unless you have small boobs this will make you feel chunky.
links_reviews_text: The sweater is chunky and hip flares just enough to make you feel bulky. It's super cute but the heart tends to hide in the folds so its hard to see.
This is a super cute and comfy sweater. A really cozy winter sweater...
I decided to pair with a white collar shirt to wear at a work event.
Very cute, a bit snug up top but not too bad. Can wear with a shirt underneath or not depending on the season. Would definitely rent again to wear with no top on underneath!
If you're between sizes, size up. Fabric has stretch but for the buttons to stay closed it has to fit exactly right! Can be worn with a strapless bra/no bra. Easy to dress up or down!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: What a great dress! Fits true to size. Can be dressed up with some wedges or down with some sneakers. Looking forward to layering over a button down when the weather gets cooler!
GREAT wardrobe piece. Unique and so flattering around curves. I had this rented for almost a month... you can dress it up and down. 10/10 recommend!

I liked this a lot, but the fit is a bit weird. I sized up since I was afraid it wouldn't button at the chest at my normal size. It was snug at the chest, but too big in others. Like others have said, the straps are long and I looked weirdly bulky in the middle. Nonetheless, I got tons of compliments and generally enjoyed wearing it to work.
Fit true to size, typically I am 0-2, but went with a 2 on this one and am happy. I received so many compliments, it's perfect for any day outing! Would definitely rent again.
This dress is simple but so flattering and so comfy! It fit me perfectly and felt super modern and fun without being too much... can't recommend enough!

Absolutely loved this Jean dress. I was worried that it was out of my comfort zone and the reviews had me thinking it would be baggy. But this little number hugged my curves in all of the right places. Plus it has just the right amount of stretch to give it that curve hugging fit. It gave me that little bit of sex appeal while still looking like I wasn't trying.
My first pick denim dress wasn't available so I picked this one instead and I'm so glad I did! Very flattering, I wore it all weekend. I will absolutely rent again.
Loved this! Super easy summer dress. Pro tip: always size down in Madewell! (1-2 sizes)

I don't typically rent basic dresses like this from a brand like Madewell because I prefer to rent statement prices from $$ brands, but I chose it because I wanted something to wear several times on a low key vacation with my family. It's great for travel because it's comfortable, yet polished (and I got a ton of compliments). My advice: buy it so that you can use one of your slots to rent something more expensive ;)
It was okay, fit was great but really...nothing about it had a "wow factor"

This dress fit true to size. I am 5'9" and wear size 6 or 8 in dresses. The 8 was the right size for me but the fit was odd. The straps were a little long and the chest was snug. The length hit right at the knee. If paired with jacket, cardigan or shrug It would be fine for work.
Only con was the straps were a little longer than I would have liked but did not affect the dress at all

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but runs a bit large
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a weekend birthday party. I have never tried Madewell, so I wasn't sure of the sizing. I got the 12 because I figured a full jean dress would be binding, but this was fairly large on me. Also, it seemed to stretch out throughout the day. I paired this with some cognac flats and bag. Threw the downtown field jacket from jcrew (the green one that every other woman has) over it because it was a rainy, chilly day. You have to unbutton the buttons to get it on. It was very slimming (at least before it stretched). I got this new, with tags. It made me want to try some more things from Madewell, now that it's on RTR.

links_reviews_title: So effortless- yet felt a little Jenny from the block!
links_reviews_text: I LOVE that jean is back- especially jean dresses with stretch. Super comfy, could wear vans and a sweater or hoops and heels and a belt and have a completely different vibe. It did stretch out (probably because I wore it 10x in a row) could have kept a 10 or probably sized down (if you wear nude shorts or bra it keeps the button holes from seeing your goods if it buckles a bit. Love. Love. Love.

Wore this more than I expected. It wraps nicely around my smaller chest and waist, but also allowing me to wear and t-shirt or turtle next underneath which was super cute. However, the knee-high length of the dress is a bit harder to pair shoes with but that's just because of my height.
This dress fit like a glove and was comfortable all day!

links_reviews_title: Very well made, just not for me.
links_reviews_text: Super cute denim dress, if I was just a little less curvy this would probably look better on me! It fit perfectly, but my large chest and hips made the buttons gape a little. This would be great for a petite girl, or someone without much natural curves.
Comfortable and cute but runs small. I will probably order again just a size up. I'm a true 6 and this squeezed me.

I didn't end up wearing this, but had to leave a review bc it was a great dress and looked so good on me. The denim has stretch, so it hugs you in all the right places. Madewell tends to run big, so I recommend sizing down if you want it to be fitted, and up if you want it looser.

links_reviews_title: the fit is perfect and very comfotable
links_reviews_text: I love the length have fun with the buttons in terms of length and style it up with jacket or such to carry in into a fall day
A bit big!
This dress looks so cute on the hanger, but again, I have a closet stuffed full of size 8/10s - even a few 6s that fit well - and this 12 was way too tight to even get the buttons done up.

This dress has a young, sexy look that feels fresh without making me feel ridiculous or overexposed (I'm 42). As with most Madewell styles, it runs a little large and it has some stretch. When in doubt, size down.

links_reviews_title: Easy to pack/wear for long weekend get-away.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, although a more curve hugging fit in chest and thighs (purposeful). Comfy, easy to put/on off, and stylish. I got so many compliments!
Beautiful dress, need to keep this one!
I almost kept it and got a lot of compliments

links_reviews_title: Got a lot of use out this dress over the summer
links_reviews_text: Could have sized down as this denim will stretch a little. Cute dress that I got a lot of wear out of over the summer.
Fit was perfect. Can dress up with heels or casual sandals. Loved it
Just didn't add anything, looked smock-y while being too long on the top
Great fit. I opted to dress this down and found it cute and comfortable. I am usually a 2 or 4 and the 2 was the right fit.
Fit through the waist but would not close in chest area. Size up if you have a bust larger than A cup.
Loved the fit and it was great for a summer date.

links_reviews_title: loved it so much i bought it
links_reviews_text: it is well made, fit well - and a classic for years to come.
The buttons were very tight around the ribs! I was able to get into it but it didn't look great with the buttons pulling. Ended up not wearing it. Great quality, though.

I got compliments each time I wore it. Paired with chunky heels for the evening. Wore with sneakers during the day. I would have actually bought it because it fit so well if the length weren't off. I'm 5'2" and it definitely could have been five inches shorter. The fabric is stretchy and forgiving.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, but too big for petite girls
links_reviews_text: The dress itself was very cute and I wish it came in a smaller size because the straps were too long on the shoulders and there was no way to adjust it. If you're petite with a smaller chest, this dress will be too big on you.
Fun dress, the top part is pretty tight so if you have larger breasts it may be too tight.

What more could you want in a blouse? It has so many fun details - hot pink stripes, bright geo print, snaps, neck bow and little Coach horse and buggies throughout. 80s vibe but updated. I could have sized down so it would be more fitted in the neck and shoulders.

Fits true to size. Paired with jeans for the work from home look. The fabric is soft and silky. I love the hot pink accent stripe running down each sleeve. Perfect for all of your Zoom meetings! Highly recommended.
This was so cute and could go with a number of things. I would buy it if the price were right! Fit great and was very comfortable.
This jacket fit very nicely and was well-made. It has an internal zipper which creates an odd shape to the jacket when zipped up, but this was not an issue because I kept it open!

links_reviews_title: The sweater material is amazing, and the fit is really nice for petite women.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is thick and very winter-y feeling. I loved the dress and blazer together, I wore it for work and it went really nice with black tights and black heels. I'm very petite in the shoulders so this fit perfect.

I really liked this jacket in the photos and it did not disappoint in real life. It was a nice weight for cold weather. I wore it without fastening the button; it would've looked to snug on me that way. The fit through the shoulders was great though. I will wear a few more times before I return this piece.

The material is heavy and very pretty. It is fully lined which also makes it feel elegant. I got a bunch of compliments. I wore it with black pants for work meetings with important clients, and with jeans and a white tshirt for a casual shopping day. Will rent again!
Flattering cut, stylish, wore it a ton. So many compliments.
Perfect jacket for work. I get tired of boring suits and this helped me mix it up. It was a bit tight, but I'm 19 weeks pregnant, so that was to be expected.

I found the fit a bit boxy, but I don't think I could have sized down, as it may have been too tight in the shoulders. I didn't mind the shoulder pads but I would have preferred if the jacket were narrower through the waist Still a nice jacket though. Glad I could rent it for the day!

links_reviews_title: Not a wow but solid choice for customer meeting
links_reviews_text: Thick, textured material. Nice button detail at sleeve and interesting angle cut on the front. Good rental

Loved this jacket! Winter weight material, I wouldn't wear in summer. Very nice flattering cut. Slightly longer in front than back. Slight shoulder pads if I recall. Very comfortable to wear to work all day. Will rent again.

I'm normally a size 6 in blazers, but I probably could've gone up to a size 8. I always wanted a VB blazer, but they're pretty expensive, so I didn't ever buy one. They have a zipper inside so you can use a Dickey, but unfortunately one was not included. The fabric is stunningly gorgeous and the cut is perfect for an hourglass figure.

links_reviews_title: Fancy, fancy- lovely for a dressy workplace
links_reviews_text: Wore this to make a presentation to executive leadership, the jacket hit the right note of formality but not stiff or old fashioned. Would absolutely wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Nice blazer to dress up a plain dress
links_reviews_text: The bottom of the jacket was spaced pretty widely--probably great for someone at the end of the 2nd trimester, but looked a little funny on me at the time (16 weeks)
Perfect for work however definitely size up.
Nicely fitted blazer. Tailored look.

links_reviews_title: Pretty jacket but fit not right for me
links_reviews_text: Fit too small - snug in arms
Great Versatile piece that can be dressed up or dressed down. Flattering tailoring and very comfy - easy to move in it. Would work well with jeans or with black pants.

links_reviews_title: Such a great staple blazer. It goes with everything.
links_reviews_text: fits well in back and length. I'm 5"3" and it's not too long. But I gave it a 4 because the front hangs open too loose.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering for my slightly par shape figure.
links_reviews_text: I wore it with black top and black skinny jeans, and it was very flattering. I never zipped it ; it looked way better open.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly! Received a ton of compliments
links_reviews_text: Beautiful jacket
Good for work and dinner out. Really liked it

I wanted to like this blazer more than I did. Maybe it's just because it has been worn a few times prior, but I found the fringe to be a little roughed up. Overall, cute style and wished that I would have ordered the matching dress to go with it.
Fits perfect and was so comfortable and easy to wear.

My favorite blazer ever. I have not been able to send it back and it's been 2 months. Works with everything. Super flattering. It's been perfect for Summer and t's a good weight so it should work well into Fall.
Fit was great. My office is freezing in the summer so it was nice to have a summer-colored blazer that was a heavier weight.
I loved this jacket and found new ways to wear it all week. The 10 fit me perfectly. I dress down for casual, and wore with matching VB dress to work. A great all around jacket, no issues.
Very broad in shoulders and the cutaway at the yummy isn't flattering. Nothing to balance out the shoulders
Wore a bunch of times, got lots of compliments.

This jacket is pretty heavy, but is so comfortable and professional. I work in a more casual environment, so I paired it with jeans. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was because of the bulkiness. It is definitely a fall/cool weather price. I will be renting again!
A little tight on the arms.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work, but need cooler weather & the matching dress!
links_reviews_text: I live in Las Vegas and rented this in June - not sure what I was thinking. It is not the typical length of a blazer (a little shorter) so I think this will look best with the matching dress. I'm sending this baby back and will try again in the fall or early spring and try to pair it as pictured. It fits TTS although the sleeves are a tad bit long for me.

links_reviews_title: could not wear the jacket - was bulky and not form flattering
links_reviews_text: returned this item without wearing.
Cute, but runs a little small. Barely fit over my chest. Had to leave it open - buttoning it would have looked super awkward. Otherwise, was great for work.
fit beautifully and really well made.
Fits great. Very flattering.
I wore it, but felt uncomfortable the whole time. It arrived with the cuffs turned up, but I soon realized that's because it is more of a big, boxy jacket than one meant for curvy figures.

links_reviews_title: Stylish, fits well, dressed up any outfit.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for work. Dresses up any outfit
This is a solid, hourglass-flattering blazer. The fabric is a bit bulky, but the shape of the jacket keeps it from being boxy.
Very heavy material and shoulder pads made me look like a football player. I did not wear.
This was a flattering and comfortable dress. The material was quality and the silhouette was both flattering and forgiving.
Made my shoulders look even broader. I had hoped the tie in the middle would look slimming, but it wasn't flattering.
I enjoyed this dress.. it was flattering and easy to wear for work.. I styled with booties, or high heeled boots. Great choice for fall and winter.
Wore this for Christmas and it was so flattering and comfortable. Got lots of compliments. This dress can be worn for a lot of occasions. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for fall or warm winter days!
links_reviews_text: Flattering shape with the tie detail at the waist. The fabric is very thin, so choose undergarments with care. Wrinkles came out easily by just hanging it in the bathroom while I showered. Cute with slides or sneakers for a weekend look or with loafers or heels for work.
One of my favorite ever rentals. Classic with the fun bow detail that elevates it. Super comfy and flattering. Material is thin, so you will need a coat in cold weather.
Got tons of compliments. Effortless style, very comfortable and adjustable. Green color makes green eyes pop. Loved it and could wear other settings besides work. Great dress. Ran a little big.
i loved the feel of the fabric-- wool with just enough tightness. the neckline was very pretty and so was the different patch of fabric in the arm. the only downside was that it made a lot of lints.
Cropped, and tighter fit.
This sweater is very pretty and flattering. However it runs small. I am wearing a large and it fits snug, but still comfortable. Also it is a little shorter than I expected.
This sweater was warm and comfy but it is pretty short in the torso.

This sweater has some interesting details (the black stripes are slightly metallic and sheer) that make it fun to wear. It is small though and definitely not for super busty women. I'm a 34C and it was fitted to my chest--not tight, but I imagine larger women would have an issue. Overall a good rental.
I wore this out with my two kids. The crop top was longer then most so still keep me warm. Love everything about this sweater!

Loved this sweater! It was super comfortable for sightseeing in fall weather. I normally wear a small in tops, but rented and wore a medium in this. It fit well if not slightly snug, so I would recommend sizing up!

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing it after trying it on.
links_reviews_text: The item was really small for a small, more like kid-size L, and the boat-neck was very stretched out.

links_reviews_title: Pairing it with the Silver Jacket, great combo.
links_reviews_text: Paired it with the Alpha Industries Silver Jacket, perfect for a weekend getaway hiking by the ocean. It was a little too short in the torso for me, I like my sweaters a little longer.
No stretch so size up one! It's adorable on, comfortable.
fits as it looks online

Love this sweater! Most definitely size up for this one - typically, I wear between a S and XS and I ordered up to a medium for this sweater. The fit was still a bit snug but I think that's the style of the sweater. Great for everyday wear or date night. I would've bought this sweater if it weren't so pricey!
Loved the texture and feel but was disappointed that it was so small.

links_reviews_title: It was a cute and fun sweater for winter.
links_reviews_text: Very tight fit, cute with high rise jeans.
I sized up to a Large and it fit except still way too short for my liking. Returned unworn. Would have worn if longer as nice quality.
This sweater was cute but kind of ridiculously small. I am usually a large in pretty much everything and the XL was skin tight.
Definitely size up- I sized up two sizes and it fit nice and slightly snug but comfortably
Ordered a medium and I'm usually a small in sweaters. This M fit like an XS! Super tight in the arms, bust, and very short
I am usually a small and based on other reviews I got an XL - this basically fit like an XS. It's super short and feels tight. It was just an "eh" sweater.
Size up! And prepare to wear with high-waisted pants. Very soft yarn, good for sensitive skin.
I ordered L because it was reported to be small in fit, but should have ordered M. It looked great anyway!
Order at least two sizes up.
I was not able to wear it. It was too small.
The XL fit more like a small/medium. Too bad - the knit was very soft. Definitely size up one or two sizes.

love the colors & detail in this sweater. the black stripe is somewhat see through but not so much that you can't wear it to the office. the sweater is soft and cozy. true to size but slightly on the narrow side. large chest or wide shoulders, size up. i got an XS (i'm right in between sizes) and wish i sized up for comfort. great with cropped jeans and sneakers or dress pants and loafers for the office!

links_reviews_title: Cute but small and a little itchy
links_reviews_text: Very cute sweater and very warm - the knit was thicker than I thought it would be. But, it runs a little small and is very cropped. Sizing up would make it more comfortable but it still is really short. There's a black stripe that's made out of a ticker fabric and it ended up being itchy and kind of uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Perfect casual dress with cute sleeves
links_reviews_text: Great Madewell dress, nice fabric, not too thick, not too thin. 5.7, 145 lbs and the medium fits perfect. Great burgundy color. Perfect for date, going out with friends. My favorite part of this dress are the sleeves, flattering, not too long

links_reviews_title: Cute for Work and Winery Visit
links_reviews_text: The fit is perfect. It was a nice length right above the knees. The color looks brown in photos but in person it's more of a burgundy color. I wore it to work then a paint and sip (same day) and then wore it to a winery. A nice dress for work and going out.

I think this dress looks better in person than in photos - the material has a slight texture to it that adds visual interest. Fit really well - skimmed my body but wasn't clingy at all. Great for bigger chests - I actually wonder if it might fit a bit large in the chest for smaller chested gals.
Great fabric and fit! Perfect length for desk to dinner. Great detailing with the cut, buttons, elastic on the sleeve. Ill probably rent again.
Great material. If you're in between sizes you should size down.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for my engagement photos!
links_reviews_text: Fit really well in the bust and waist; definitely true to size. Loved the flowy sleeves.

links_reviews_title: It fit well! I wore it out to dinner! It's comfy!

links_reviews_text: Great for cute vaca or casual cute for work. Comfy. Flattering. Buttons hide your stomach
nice dress
This is an adorable dress. I loved the feminine sleeves and neckline. Great for date nights and casual parties, but a little too lowcut for me to wear to work.
Comfortable, easy to style, and great quality. I would definitely rent again but might consider going with a medium. The large fit more like a size 12
The dress is exactly as it seems in the pictures. It's a nice burgundy color for the fall and the puffy sleeves makes the dress somewhat interesting.
I went with a medium which was comfy & roomy. Could have gone with the small too for a more fitted look.
It ran very large but it was really cute and comfortable
Loved the color, fit and length. Didn't have the right shoes to wear with it so I need to plan ahead better next time.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a thanksgiving dinner with family, where I was the Host.
links_reviews_text: It was true to an actual XXL size.

This dress was very comfortable to wear to my family's Thanksgiving celebration. Easy to sit in, not constricting at all. Did snag on things easily, but loved the color and the details of the buttons. Loved it with knee high brown boots!

Usually when I wear tops or dresses with buttons, I go up a size so the buttons don't gap-- with this dress, that was a mistake, and a size large would've fit a lot better. That said, the fabric is really high quality, and it's a great length for every day, work, or a date. I love the color and the buttons. The only problem is that the sleeve hits at a kind of weird spot, and the elastic on the sleeve is uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful tweed jacket but runs small!
links_reviews_text: This was my first Iro jacket and it was absolutely gorgeous but it definitely runs small! I'm a true small and sometimes an extra small but these arms were VERY tight and got uncomfortable after a few hours. I would recommend sizing up.
Super comfortable and flattering. Received lots of compliments.

The photo doesn't do the jacket justice. The colors are beautiful and it's a high quality. It is a bit boxy but very professional looking. I wore it with black pants, black shell, and a scarf. Received many compliments ... including comparisons to Chanel!
Navy and pink striped jacket. Went well with a navy skirt and white blouse. I got lots of compliments.
Wore this jacket 3 times all for different occasions. Twice for work and once for a baby shower. It is professional with fun colors.
Absolutely loved this tweed! Was the perfect fit, length, color, and fabric to wear to work. Dressed up with black block heels & opal accessories. Would definitely rent again! So many compliments!

very nice - I'm 5'8" and am used to jackets being too short.. still wear them but on all black so it's not as obvious. This is very nice, though would have been more flattering with some kind of button or hook to accentuate the waist line (in contrast to hips).
Perfect for a petite fit.
Professional but unique.

links_reviews_title: Nice jacket for work, brighter colors than shown in stock photos
links_reviews_text: I've rented several blazers from Iro and really like their fit. This jacket, like all Iro jackets I've tried, is tailored for a close fit, which looks quite professional. My own slight quibble with this one was that the sleeves were a bit short, falling a bit above my wrists. The colors were brighter than I was expecting, but it made for a nice pop of color. It's not lined, but I wore it over a sleeveless top and was comfortable all day. The material is thick and jacquarded.
This jacket is stylish, comfortable, and work appropriate. The fit was great and it can be worn for many different occasions!

Such a cute jacket! The coloring detail is very pretty and fun. I wore this to a family party but it works for work as well. It was a big snug but I wore it open and wasn't an issue. I may size up if I rent it again. Overall really enjoyed wearing this!

links_reviews_title: Cute jacket, runs a bit small
links_reviews_text: Nice colors and style. Unlined. A bit small but comfortable.

At first o wasn't sure about this jacket but once I paired it with some things on my closet I loved it! Very unique and comfortable. Has deep zipper side pockets which were convenient for business cards and my phone as o worked at a trade show. At first arms were a little itchy but it really was fine. Great jacket!
Very bright colors on this jacket. Hung well. I wore it with a white tank and dark grey pants. Looks better on than how it looked on the hangar.

This is the second tweed blazer I've gotten from Iro and I'm obsessed! So great for the office and can be paired with jeans for going out after. True to size, nice material, not itchy and not overly warm if you're sitting in the office all day. Fit nicely under a winter coat as well. Highly recommend!

I wore this jacket with all black, but I think the darkest color is navy. It worked though. I was able to size up two sizes and I think it fit nice. It still feels a bit tight across the back but manageable. It was in great condition. I agree with another reviewer that the colors make this great for Easter.

links_reviews_title: Interesting and colorful tweed jacket with cream, blue, and bubblegum pink.
links_reviews_text: I felt the jacket runs a little small, but still wearable. There is no zipper or button closure, but there are zippered pockets on the sides. There are small shoulder pads. Sleeve length is nice. Not too bulky of the material or itchy. Don't love the plaid and the colors. Might be nice for Easter.
Great jacket. Arms are a little stiff.

I wore this jacket to work. My day started with a women's networking breakfast. I got compliments the second I arrived. Loved this jacket and felt super confident. True to size but not itchy like other Iro tweed jackets. I wore it over a sleeveless black dress.

links_reviews_title: It was not a good piece, worn & faded
links_reviews_text: This was a total miss, sleeves were too short, sizing runs small. Did not wear it, do not recommend.
This jacket is lovely and I'll rent it again in a 36 the arms were too tight.
This jacket really leveled up a pair of jeans and heels. Many compliments. The colors are unique and look great with black and blue and white.
Really pretty jacket but was too small in the arms and back to wear.

links_reviews_title: This jacket runs very small, especially in the arms. I usually wear a 4 and this was far too tight.

links_reviews_text: It's a great jacket with the fun fringe edges for an appropriate amount of work flair. For my January rental I wore it over black slacks / black cami and it gave a nice upbeat color to my mid-winter outfit. I would definitely rent again in the spring when the colors are more seasonal and have fun with it then again styled differently. The jacket was slightly tight across the arms/shoulders for me -- it stretched out some during the day. The length worked well on my short torso, 5'5' frame.
I wanted to wear this but it was too small

links_reviews_title: Great, fun and sophisticated work blazer.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a big working meeting and felt like a million bucks. The colors are fun and the blazer sophisticated--made me feel like I could hold my own in a big board room. The sleeves were a little tight, but the overall blazer ran true to size.
Arms and shoulders were very tight! Recommend sizing up
Nice lightweight jacket. Easy to wear. I paired with jeans and a huge t shirt and it was perfect for my semi casual office. Will definitely rent again.
runs very small in the arms and I have slender arms. could not wear it.
Pink and blue in plaid is quite pastel-y. Fine jacket, but not over the moon about it.

links_reviews_title: Lovely everyday work blazer - I received compliments on this every day.
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly, has great pockets.
Probably my fault for renting a Size 4, but even then way too small. I do have broad shoulders and normally wear a 6, but can make a 4 work in most tops

links_reviews_title: easy way to dress up otherwise casual clothes (cami/tee, jeans). great look.
links_reviews_text: tight in the arms and shoulders, but manageable. quality material and very stylish.
Great jacket...good fit and nice color
It was slightly small on the shoulder and short on the sleeves.
Great blazer with a bright color tweed. Only issue for me was the arms being snug but I wore it anyway and got tons of compliments.
Perfect for a casual summer office day

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this jacket. I wore it everywhere.
links_reviews_text: Great for smaller frames and fits perfectly.
I love this print - rented the blue one a few months ago and like that one better but I still had fun with this style. Very unique.

I really love this top and it is super comfy and stretchy. I would say that if you are truly a large there's a chance it won't fit. It does tend to pill across the chest so not sure it's the best to purchase but it's a cute casual work look for me

links_reviews_title: Love this and would buy it if it wasn't so expensive. The print is really unique.
links_reviews_text: So soft yet flattering.

links_reviews_title: LOVED the tie dye print, non stop compliments. However, fit a little snug so size up.
links_reviews_text: Fit a little snug but tucks in well with high waited jeans, so size up!
super comfy material! normally wear a small or XS but got a medium! definitely would size up and it is still tight fitting.
would prefer a different neckline

links_reviews_title: This was the first thing I tried on from my first order and I couldn't take it off!
links_reviews_text: So comfy but chic with a perfect fit!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to work and on my trip to LA
links_reviews_text: The fabric is so soft and it's kind of stretchy so it's really comfortable!
Sleeves are not quite long sleeves, it still works though!
While I didn't get compliments on it, i was ok with that since it is a nice basic. Very nice and classy top. I felt great in it. I will rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Great cut, modern and feminine with a bit of an edge
links_reviews_text: If you've got a long torso or high waist/low hip you may want to size up just for the length. I wish I had done the 54 rather than the 52 for that reason.

This top was a pleasant surprise! It couldn't have fit better. I'm bigger in the busy and it was low cut enough to give it some edge, but not low enough to be inappropriate for work. The sleeves are fun too. I plan on keeping it and wearing it over the weekend with white denim.
Flattering and comfortable, considering buying it. Very cute.
The cut of this top is very flattering. Love the longer sleeves and v neck. Great way to elevate casual denim.
This top looks weird on the hanger, but great on your bod. Got lots of compliments and can be styled up or down
Loved this blouse for a work meeting. RTR suggested the size for me and it fit well - it draped nicely and gave me good cleavage coverage. Wore it with basic black pants and flats - so easy!

I love this shirt. I wore it to work with the RTR Theory navy pencil skirt and then again to a museum event with high waisted jeans. So cute for both! It is a bit boxy but not bad, and I wore it tucked in for both events. Feels Japanese to me.
Loved this blouse. Gorgeous colors and falls beautifully just below waist.

links_reviews_title: Great shirt, fits a little weird
links_reviews_text: Very flowy and light. The fit is just a little bit weird. It doesn't hang quite right to leave it untucked, but it still looks a little odd tucked in. Maybe I should've ordered a smaller size. But in terms of comfort, A+!
loose fit, covered cleavage, lovely fit
I'm not classy so Italian sizes are new to me. I probably could have stood a 48. The top was super blousey but the bottom was tight around the hips. Overall it was cute but I wouldn't rent again.
This is not a shirt I would normally wear because it's shape is pretty unique. But it was light/airy and also left me feeling covered and stylish for my summertime air conditioned office.
This top has such a basic shape but looks really incredible on and is so comfortable. I wore it a bunch of times and had a hard time sending it back.
I really loved this shirt! Super lightweight and cute for a summer day! And looks professional enough to wear to work :)

I love this shirt and probably would rent again, except it was weirdly tightaround the waist and loose around the breasts (and I am a 40e) I'm definitely going to order the dress version because this fabric is gorgeous and soft!
Runs smaller than the dress in the same style. Nice easy shirt for work.
Would rent again!
Loved this unique, colorful blouse! The boxy fit looked nicely tucked into high waisted jeans. I got compliments from co-workers. I would rent again!

Fit great! Flattering and drapey. The 40 fit good, but I think I could have even sized down one. I'll rent again for sure and try the smaller size next time, but the 40 was good also. Fun and on trend top. I wore with jeans and flat and also with heels. Also wore to child's soccer game with denim cut offs. Very versatile top!
I loved this top so much I bought it. It's polyester so the fabric isn't the best but the cut and print are gorgeous.
I agree with the other reviews that said this has a flattering fit despite looking boxy on a hanger. It can be work to work or dressed down with jeans. The fabric and shape were also comfortable.

I don't know what it was about this cut but it was absolutely perfect for me. Loved everything about it esp the dolman sleeves as my arms a chubby right now so anything that is not right in arms wins for me now. Looked great tucked into dark jeans.

links_reviews_title: Thin, silky blouse with a modern silhouette
links_reviews_text: Light as air and paired nicely with black culottes at work. I felt very modern and, most importantly, comfortable!
Fit was really slimming in an oversized drapey way. I loved this shirt and ordered the size down for my next shipment.
The sleeves and print on this top made it a fun work piece. I wasn't expecting to love it as much as I did! I felt confident and cool in it.
This blouse flatters the bust and sits nicely on the waist. The sleeves are a little billowy and ket the piece on the whimsical side.

links_reviews_title: Great fit for a French tuck
links_reviews_text: Loved how it looked with some high rise jeans and heel. Nice balance between flowy and fitted
great color
I really love this blouse. Great style and got a ton of compliments.
Beautiful shirt. Fits true to size. Thin top, so better for warmer weather.
I loved this top. I was concerned that it would be boxy from looking at it on the hanger but it was beautiful. So many compliments.
The pattern gives this shirt kind of a retro neon vibe. The cut was sexy but not cheap looking on a busty figure. I felt confident in this top.
This top was cute--flowy but not so long/boxy that it can't be worn by someone who is short!
