Just ok- I wore to work and it served its purpose but I wouldn't have purchased. As described, just a bit boxy, and for me, not the most flattering.
Good for work, Asian style too

Although other reviews commented on the waist being tight, I found it helped give the top shape. I loved the sleeves; nice for hot weather but still keeping you cool with airflow. Got compliments all day! TTS

I wore this shirt with a curly pony to the office, and I got so many compliments! it has a great style going on with the sleeves and looked awesome tucked into black pants. Will be renting again. The material was high quality.
I adore this shirt. I feel great in it. It is a little snug at the waist, but likely runs true to size. The colors are gorgeous. It is attractive and chic.
Cute fit, high quality fabric, great condition, considered buying

This slit was borderline in je when I sat down and I'm short! But standing up was fine. Still it's a pretty dress and the cut at the bottom makes it interesting so I liked it. Generally fitted but not skin tight

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite from Black Halo
links_reviews_text: Black Halo normally fits great on me, but not this time. The shoulders felt a little tight. The slit in the middle kept opening up, so had to tug this dress down multiple times to avoid it from showing my crotch. Loved the bright blue color. Wish it fit better.
Simple fit. Great color. Longer than expected However nice slit details.
I really wanted to love this piece more because the color is amazing but it's a bit snug and slit comes too high. Went great with tights

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but not as conservative as it looks
links_reviews_text: Beautiful bright colored dress! However, the slit was too high to wear to the work place, and to church (which unfortunately I wore anyway and had to wear my coat to hide that when I sat the lace from my thigh highs showed). Maybe it would have been different if I sized up. However the dress is beautiful but wear with full panty hose and on a date or out with friends.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color but a little revealing
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for work. I love black halo dresses. The color was beautiful and the fit was true to size. However, I did find the slit a little too revealing when sitting down. I am 5'9" with extremely long legs.

links_reviews_title: Great color and fun, but conservative, design!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. It's conservative enough to wear to work and the front slit adds just enough "edge" to transition to an after work event (which is what I was renting it for). It's a great color. Definitely need to wear Spanx, even though the material isn't too thin, and seems to be of good quality, you can see my abs poking through. So definitely needed to wear something to smooth things out.
Wore this for a political event, my husband thought I looked really good in it so that's a plus! I did size up one size as this brand runs small.

links_reviews_title: Hard to sit down in...slit went up way too high. Not work wear.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color.
Dress is difficult to zip if you are somewhat curvy. Very tight in the chest and stomach area. Beautiful blue color.
Runs small, and when it's tight the skirt flaps splay open to be a bit to high, but if I had sized up it would've been perfect
Listen ladies, if you have any sort of hips or bust, you're gonna need a size up. Pretty color, gorgeous structure. Just get a size up. I'm a size 6 woman and I should've gotten a size 8.
I am 5'7" and the slit sat at crotch level, but the dress itself is super cute and well made so if you are on the shorter side, this one's for you.

links_reviews_title: Slit is huge and too high!
links_reviews_text: DO NOT get this for work or any professional events. The slit in the front (which looks appropriate on the model pictured) is actually VERY LARGE & HIGH on the leg)! I couldn't even wear the dress.
Ordered in a 16, which ran very small. Material has no give, so definitely size up if available. Nice color and material.

Nice fit but to tight around the bust. I am size 14 38 c cup. 5'2 185 pounds. I was hoping the slit on the bottom was sewn shut but it is not. The color is amazing. A great dress maybe if I ordered a bigger size it may have worked but I would have been worried about the slit all day. Never worn sent back.
Loved everything about this dress. Wore it to a baby shower and to work and got lots of compliments. It runs slightly large so you can go one size down. True size would be okay too though.
Such a cute dress! True to size, easy to wear, comfortable and an eye catcher. Lots of compliments and transitioned from day to night seamlessly with a change of shoes. Total winner!
Loved this dress. It's really comfortable and the print makes it super unique. No gaping at the chest.

feels pretty true to size, though a comfortable fit. on the casual side, but can be dressed up or down. would be ok for work. plan on wearing it for a casual dinner with a denim jacket. material and cut feels quality, love the pockets!

First off, so many compliments! It's very on trend and with a very generous cut, I would say it runs large. Pockets are awesome ! Print is interesting… I was hoping it was a little more abstract but it definitely looks like faces all over your body. But I wore it a ton all month!
This is what RTR is all about! Such a fun and comfortable piece! Wish it came in other colors

i received SO many compliments when i wore this. the print is so chic!* the material is thick but very light and airy. theres a good amount of arm room. the only tiny con is the material has no stretch which for me as a DD flattened my chest. i had to use a pin to keep from having peep holes in between the buttons. other than that i truly loved this and would definitely wear it again. dress this up with heels for a party or boots for lunch. theres no way to go wrong in this dress.

This dress will make you feel so cool! I will say there is a lot of fabric and it's quite long -- the XS felt almost too big for me. However, it was warm even on a very cold day. And I still just felt so cool. You should rent this dress!!!!!
Loved the laid back feel, pockets and unique print. High waisted, loose fitting. Looked great with leather boots. Recommend.
Felt very cool and on trend with this look. This is a very loosely cut dress, so i pretty much sized for the shoulders and arms. Size medium was good for a 6/8. Dress didn't get staticky!

links_reviews_title: Amazing print, effortless style, perfect dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun! Comfortable and effortless but extremely stylish. The pattern was amazing and the material was thick and perfect for winter. I received so many compliments. And it has pockets! I wore my usual size but because it’s made to be a roomy fit you could easily size down if you’re smaller in the chest for a more fitted look.

LOVE this dress. I honestly was on the fence about returning it before the holidays, and kinda regret it! the top can be buttoned up to the top, or left open, and the bottom of the dress is a try flattery a line. I was really pleased with the length of the sleeves, which came just to my wrists (I'm tall, and sleeves are usually too short for me). The unique pattern and fabric was my favorite part! The material felt a little rustic - like a prairie muslin, and was so chic with a pair of boots!

links_reviews_title: Easy dress to throw on that recurved many compliments
links_reviews_text: Great easy dress to wear. Received many compliments.

Hip print, empowering and just plain comfy. Not incredibly flattering, maybe not at all actually. But I felt trendy and it was perfect for working from home. PS - it has pockets for all you pocket lovers out there!
I wanted to be cool enough for this dress, but I just couldn't pull it off.

This dress was so cool. The fit was very sweet and slightly oversized. I wore with a black tight and low boot to dinner then drinks. I received lots of compliments. It was a very easy look and I would absolutely rent again
Very cute but the waist is baggy. Ends up looming like a nightgown. Didn't wear
Got tons of compliments. This was so comfy, simple and stylish. Would've bought if it wasn't so expensive. Will rent again for sure!

Wore this to work for headshots and on a cold winter day. The dress was super comfy and warm, and it has pockets!! The headshot photographer actually complimented the dress and said it looked great on camera!
Loved this dress and plan to rent again but in a small. Fit well except it was tight in the bust. Larger busted ladies, size up!

links_reviews_title: Wish I had gone a size up.
links_reviews_text: This dress looks like a no brainer but if you have a big chest you should size up, the fabric is cut too narrow around the ribs compared to the rest of the dress. will try again a size up!

links_reviews_title: This print is a conversation starter
links_reviews_text: Bold print that got a lot of likes! The cut isn't particularly flattering but it works well with the fabric. Fun piece to layer with other accessories and a wool coat.

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments at work wearing this dress, and then again when I wore it out for the day!
links_reviews_text: This runs a little large, but it was so comfortable!
Cool vibe, very soft

links_reviews_title: High quality, gorgeous leather and style! Capacious interior. Considering buying :-D
links_reviews_text: Wow I love this bag! Style and quality are exceptional. It's spacious inside and can fit wallet, keys, sunglasses case, phone + random shiz we all carry. There's a chain to carry it on my shoulder or you can carry as a (large) clutch. Only con is that if you overload the bag it gets heavy and chain can dig into your shoulder. This goes with everything. I've been carrying nonstop for a few weeks. Tons of compliments + Bottega Veneta inspired style.

Wore this dress to a Christmas party, and it fit so nicely! The stretch hugged everything just the way I wanted, the bottom was not clingy, and the dress was extremely comfortable. The length was also appropriate for a family event, and the colors were perfect. Dress does run a little large, but would rent again in a heartbeat!
So adorable and flattering and comfortable. Would consider buying.
Great rental for work. On the shorter side (and I am short), so tights work best. A little loose in the waist but still flattering; great material (stretchy) and colors.

This was a cute dress, nothing special. I liked that the sleeves were loose since I have larger arms and usually have issues with right sleeves. This is just a pull on, comfy dress which would be cute for rental around Christmas because of the cute plaid.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable. Fits like a glove. Good for a casual Friday at work.
links_reviews_text: Cute style, very comfortable.
Very comfortable!

I got a lot of compliments on this dress - I think the pleats and the plaid make it stand out in a sea of sleek black in NYC - but overall this wasn't the most flattering dress on my given my bust size and my chubby knees. It just wasn't for me but it is a high quality garment.

The material was really comfortable and stretchy but also quite thin so the little bulge by my tights on my waist did show when I sat. I size up to L even though I have other Ms in this brand because of the bust and waist but did find the arm holes a little too big. Very cute for a day at the office near the holidays, though

links_reviews_title: I love this dress it was so comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable I didn't want to take it off! I am kind of in between sizes so I went with an extra large but probably could have gone with a large. I received so many compliments on this dress. I really want to buy one now!

links_reviews_title: Wore it 3 times over a 4 day rental!!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It was so festive and comfy and got lots of compliments. I wore it to two parties back to back and then again to work before I had to ship it back.

links_reviews_title: Great pattern, comfortable, runs a tad big on top
links_reviews_text: Dress was super cure and fun for a fall transition piece to work. The A line shape is flattering but had a bit of extra space on the top. I'm 5'9 and usually wear a size 6. I ordered the small which was a perfect length and fit for work. By the end of the day the dress stretched a bit more. Would definitely rent again however. Ton of compliments

OK so first off--this dress is navy, not black. I must not have looked closely enough when I rented it so I scrambled to get some navy tights to match. Thought I'd save someone else the stress up top :) Other than that snafu, this dress was perfect. I wore it for a friend's rehearsal dinner for a December wedding with tights and it was a great, versatile dress that fit in regardless of who I was standing next to. I'm short with a large chest and the dress had enough stretch to end up sitting on my natural waist and coming above my knees. The compliments rolled in! Highly recommend!

Dress was too big all around-sleeves were over half a foot away from my arms, the bust area have no definition to my bust (surprising since I'm a 36G) and the waist of the dress was closer to my hips than my actual waist. Looked more like a plaid sack than a dress

The length seems ok, but because I'm pear shaped and hold most my weight on my lower half my legs stood out too much for my liking. The dress isn't a heavy sweater material either so I felt like it would flounce around when I walked making it too short for me. I could have worn dark tights but it's been warmer this week and didn't want to. Instead I returned for something else. I think this is better suited for a slimmer frame than mine.
Wish it was a littl bit longer but otherwise great dress.
Great fit. Adorable dress!
I loved this dress but the size was too big for my 4'10" frame. I think a size small would have fit better. It just hung oddly in the size medium on my body.
The fit is true to size and comfortable. The dress is easy to wear and flattering design. I wore it with gold accessories and pointy toe navy heels with a bow.

links_reviews_title: Fit well (super cute) and very comfortable! Got compliments from strangers.
links_reviews_text: The dress was comfortable and easy to wear. I will rent this one again!
Easy fit and great length. I got a lot of compliments on this dress. I paired it with tan boots and a red sweater. I felt great in it!
I sized up per reviews which was good but it was a little loose in the waist. Nice overall paired with riding boots.

links_reviews_title: Really cute but too short for me at 6ft
links_reviews_text: Cute and flattering dress but too short for me to wear comfortably, even with tights.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, a lot of room on top. Would definitely wear again.
links_reviews_text: Big on top which is nice for bigger bust sizes Length is also terrific for shorter sizes, might run short if you are taller. I am 5’2 and it hit above my knee.

links_reviews_title: Really nice professional outfit that can be used for work or just around the house.
links_reviews_text: Fit well.
I rented for causal holiday event at work. Cute dress. Very comfortable .

I love this dress. It's comfortable and fits like a glove. My order arrived early so I wore the larger size on Thanksgiving and my actual size for my party. Both dress were very comfortable and flattering. I will keep this dress on the top of my shortlist.

Literally, everyone who saw me today complimented me. I love the dress. It's very f oh attending and stylish. The only complaint I have is that I probably could have worn a L instead of XL as the sweater knit fabric has lots of give. The sleeve openings are pretty generous. I'm busty and there was plenty of room. But regardless of size, great dress!
Super cute balloon sweater. Perfect for the NYC cold. I'm always freezing in my office at work and this was so cozy and warm

I really loved this sweater! It's my first rental and it fit beautifully, falling right at my hip. I wore with patterned pants to dress it up a bit for work, but will be wearing with cuffed jeans later this week for a day out on the town. The color is gorgeous. Perfect for cold weather. I paired with a thrifted wool coat as well for added warmth, and got quite a few compliments IRL and online!
This was my go to sweater for the month - airports, work, parties! I loved it! It is oversized and worked really well with skirts, pants and over dresses.
I liked the shape of this sweater and thought it was really flattering and it kept me warm. But the material is rough and itchy. Prob wouldn't rent again just because it was uncomfy
True to size, the sleeves were very large and you definitely need an oversized jacket to fit the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Ok if you like that linebacker look.
links_reviews_text: The fabric feels like wool that got washed at warm. It's VERY thick and dense, and doesn't have much movement to it. Be prepared to roast if you will be spending time inside, I recommend a cami underneath so you can take it off when you overheat. As it's also oversized it gives you that square shoulder linebacker look. I got it in a size smaller hoping it would be more fitted, but the fabric is just too thick. I'm disappointed as I REALLY wanted this to work with some cute high waist jeans and booties.

links_reviews_title: Looks super cute on. Thicker material makes it great for the cooler nights.

links_reviews_text: So the sleeves are a bit puffier than the photos give off. I liked this sweater a lot I only gave four stars because its a bit itchy.

CRAZY ITCHY. And because it has a bit of a high neck, you'll have to wear a turtle neck or something full coverage underneath. Couldn't make it 20 minutes wearing this before I had to change. Just absurdly itchy.

links_reviews_title: Thick, warm and a little extra flare. It will def show your midriff
Cute but not a great look for me
links_reviews_text: I liked the fit of the body and the length but the sleeves are pretty voluminous and just weren't flattering on me! I think if was either bigger on top or more straight it would have been cute. It's also rather thick knit and sturdy.

This was super poofy in the arms and suuuuper short (and I usually don't have a problem with torso length). Plus a bit itchy. Bummer because I loved the color and style, but I didn't end up wearing. :(

links_reviews_title: I love how quickly everything arrived.
links_reviews_text: The sweater is cute, but the material was rough and itchy so I did not wear it.
Loved it! Tight on the waist and bigger up top. Perfect for my body type. Material is a little itchy but I barely noticed.
Color is great and the crop fit is cute. Very scratchy though!

links_reviews_title: I liked the style and fit. Colorway was nice as well.
links_reviews_text: Mostly liked this item. However, I am picky with sweaters and this one was slightly itchy for me. Not terrible, just not my ideal texture.
I loved everything about this. The color, the style and its comfortable. I got so many compliments!
This was an uncomfortable sweater and bulky. I wanted to like it but didn't wear it!

The material of this sweater is quite scratchy, so it's not comfortable when worn without an extra layer to protect your skin. The material is very thick and warm. This means the sweater is only suitable for very cold weather or freezing offices.

Okay, this sweater is so cute but boy was it itchy. I am a lot more sensitive to fabric textures than most. I would give it a shot if you can handle warm wool textures. The color is so on-trend and would look amazing with a printed camel color skirt.
It was very warm, but the wool was kind of itchy which i guess is to be expected. The sleeves are a bit poofy

links_reviews_title: Love this blazer! Comfy and a great way to dress up jeans!
links_reviews_text: This blazer fits perfectly and makes a jeans outfit feel more polished for work. It's comfortable and cozy but not heavy where I'm overheating. I prefer it open but you could wear it buttoned up. I'd definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Trendy update to your average blazer

links_reviews_text: Loved the blazer! It was a leeeetle snug on the shoulders but the rest of the fit was great so I wouldn't size up. Comfortable and kept me warm in my chilly office.
Loved this jacket!
Great fit, not as oversized as I thought but still really cool fit and long sleek look

links_reviews_title: Like a teenager at their first job interview.
links_reviews_text: This is oversized, sizing down doesn't help. It may look good on some body types (I'm guessing super thin and tall gals), but it risks looking boxy. But I LOVED the material and the fit in the shoulders was nice.
I rented this blazer to wear to a couple of casual work meetings. The fit is oversized which I liked. Fits true to size.

I've been wanting to try a loose plaid blazer for fall and winter. This one is perfect! It's a great length for me, even in the sleeves, and I'm only 5'3". I got so many compliments on it at work. It's a casual environment, so I wore it with jeans and a t-shirt (I switched to black booties at work,too). I was able to find it on sale in a nearby dept store so I ended up buying it.

This is an oversized look, but still flattering. It's very versatile, with greys, blues and blacks all working well with it. I wore it with jeans (I have a casual work environment) and felt put together and confident. Love it!
Amazing fall blazer. Shape is fun, slightly oversized fit. It's warm but not smoldering! The colors are beautiful. Got lots of compliments

I wore this blazer to fashion week and was just a happy camper. The fit was really comfortable (not to tight in the arms) and the color is very appealing to me. It also feels very well made. It's a beautiful blazer!
Really liked this blazer! Material is a little itchy around the neck but not too noticeable. Easy to throw on and dress up an outfit
Great fit! Easy to style
Great fit, great quality
Comfortable blazer. Has a nice lining inside so not scratchy despite being wool. Wore this multiple times as goes well with pants/ jeans.

This blazer is the coat of my dreams. I wish I could keep it forever, but instead I will rent it again and again. The fit was true to size, colors were very nice, and it wasn't too long. It was a little boxy but I like that style. I was able to layer a thin turtleneck shirt under it but wouldn't have been able to do a chunky sweater.
I loved everything about this blazer. Paired it with a cami and black pants for work and then a t-shirt and jeans for dinner out. Perfection.
Loved the look of the blazer! Perfect for work and drinks afterwards.

This is a fantastic blazer and I received so many compliments. Wore to a work event and for a work photo shoot. It's warm without being bulky and just generally fits super well. Perfectly oversized but didn't overwhelm my short body. Highly recommend.

This blazer was everything I had hoped it to be and more. The sleeves are perfect length (I rolled them up in photo). The blazer is perfect length, the colors make it easy to pair with everything. I wore it over a graphic tee and a pair of denim jeans and loved it!

I'm usually a S/M and the XS was an oversized fit. Exactly how it's pictured on the model. Loved the look with the sleeves pushed up. I wore it to the office on a casual day with a beige mock neck sweater and out with a white t-shirt, heels and crop straight jeans. Will definitely rent again in the fall.

links_reviews_title: Being able to wear this piece with multiple outfits
links_reviews_text: Great blazer, warm and works will many outfits

links_reviews_title: Nothing special, but a fun change of pace for work
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little boxy. Overall, it was a fun/different item for me to wear to work, but I probably wouldn't rent it again.
Oversized blazer with great pattern and cut. I wore it to a job interview and it helped me feel very professional!
The blazer has a beautiful light fabric that is perfect for fall weather. Pair it with jeans and boots/sneakers and you'll get a super chic casual look! The form does run a little long.

I was told I looked like "Blake Lively in Gossip Girl" when I wore this jacket so I think that means it automatically gets 5 stars. Great fall blazer that can be worn to work or out and about. If you are going for a more fitted look I would rent it, but if you like the over-sized blazer look this is a perfect jacket. I paired it with jeans, a white t shirt and a mustard headband. I may even keep it for the whole fall!
I may never give this blazer back. I wore it on vacation, to the office, on the plane. It's the perfect cool blazer

I absolutely love this blazer, it's warm but not too warm. The fit is amazing, and the length is perfect. It spiced up my basic jeans and white tee. I found it slightly tight in the arms, but I also have larger arms, so if you want to fit a sweater under it, I would size up. Im usually a MD/LG, 8/10, and I would purchase the Medium! I have a large across-back, and this didn't pull which is almost impossible to find these days. So i love this blazer!!
I loved this. It's high quality, not too heavy and maintains a great shape. It's a little wide and probably would have looked better one size smaller, but it didn't bother me.

I really liked this sweater, but it was not meant for someone my height. There was just too much fabric, so I didn't love how it looked on me. The sleeves were really long too. The fabric was a great material and the colors were great- especially the vibrant pink at the neck. Wore partially ticked in with skinny jeans. Of the proportions were different, I would have worn it with a pleated skirt and booties, but I would have looked swallowed up by fabric.
Great color and material. I found this sweater to be very body and not overly flattering
Very comfy sweater, also high quality fabric. It kept me warm all day in my tundra of a workplace.

This sweater did not disappoint. It was fabulous to dress up or down and the lightweight wool made it a great spring transitional piece. The sweater is a little boxy and the sleeves seemed to get longer the more I wore it, but I loved wearing this and I will definitely rent it again!
Really cute, size down. I wear a medium and should have got a small. It's a boxier, shorter shirt. Needed to roll sleeves up. Cute even when a size too big!
Gorgeous sweater. Nice weight. Beautiful colors, very flattering. Will rent again.
I felt expensive and comfortable all at the same time.

links_reviews_title: Great quality but a little short
links_reviews_text: The colors and quality of the sweater are great, but I found the length of the sweater a bit short for someone my height (5'7). I would have rented a size S or M instead of XS. Really warm and comfortable otherwise.
I loved this sweater. It fits wide, but very flattering. The colors are classic and look very pretty. Not too thick.
The pink and white trim just adds so much fun to this laidback look. I loved wearing it. It brings out a playful feminine energy. Will definitely rent this one again.
This sweater really grew on me. I wore it with jeans and it looked okay, but it was just so warm and cozy, I wore it to work later in the week. Cropped one boxy, but not overly so.
Beautiful cut and color. I recommend sizing down if you want a fitted look. Lots of compliments. Nice fabric weight and quality.
This is a great sweater if you are looking for something understated that isn't boring. The sleeves run long and the body is meant to be boxy. You should be able to take a normal size.

links_reviews_title: This was really a great fall color. I wore it to thanksgiving lunch.
links_reviews_text: This ran a little large but was still cute it has a boxy cut
This was so cute but it's legit a crop top which I didn't expect. Didn't wear.
I loved this sweater so much. It was very warm and looked very polish. It's not itchy at all for being wool! Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Neutral and a pop of color
links_reviews_text: Great sweater!

links_reviews_title: Great basic sweater to wear around on the weekend or for work.
links_reviews_text: Fit is good for an oversized sweater appearance. This could work for high rise pants and regular rise pants. I'm long torsoed and still fit appropriately.

Returned this for a small. Waiting on it once it arrives I'll resubmit my thoughts. But on looks only: this is a quality made sweater and the contrasting colors of fuschia and camel are beautiful. It adds a fun touch on an otherwise basic sweater. I am in between sizes (M & L) bases on the reviews I options for a medium. The medium was to wide. It is a boxy cut so I'm hoping the small will be the better option for me. Another thing the medium I received seemed to have been stretched too much along the fuschia, that's where it was most noticeable.
Love the colors but the sweater was very short as someone with a long torso.

links_reviews_title: This is a fun casual sweater with a pop of color!
links_reviews_text: It is very roomy and boxy.
I got a ton of compliments on this sweater! I had to roll the sleeves, but that was style preference. It runs a little big, but I prefer my sweaters baggier.
Comfy, soft and beautiful colors
Preppy and stylish for work
I mean the quality is just so high on the pink neckline and the finished edges. Wore to work with dark jeans and booties, lots of compliments. Not too booby.

I had fun wearing this one! It's very boxy but I knew that going in. I wore it on a quick trip to Switzerland and it kept me warm under my jacket and was comfortable to wear all day. The pop of color was fun!

links_reviews_title: Incredibly cute paired with white jeans and nude flats.
links_reviews_text: Very warm. Sleeves were a little long and I had to roll them up. The V neck was a perfect depth.
Well made, tight knit, soft, warm and fashionable. Really thought about buying it but spring is around the corner so...
This fits a bit oversized, but the length is really nice. I'm tall and it was nice to get something that was long enough in the sleeves. The colors are just beautiful and I got a million compliments.

links_reviews_title: Unique and high quality, I kept it for a month!
links_reviews_text: Really love this unique piece, the neckline is a bit too wide, pair it with turtle neck or scarf. I'm normal size 8, the M is a bit too large on me, may get an S next time.
The midsection is very boxy and not very flattering

links_reviews_title: Tory knows how to do sweaters
links_reviews_text: Super thick and expensive feeling sweater. Felt like a million bucks in it. Loved the hot pink! Wore once to dinner and over the weekend during the day.

I was hesitant to rent this sweater because of the light camel color. But it's actually a rich color with a cute fucsia trim around the next. The V neck was the perfect depth, not too low, and conservative enough for work. I wore it with navy trousers, and it looked great together. The wool is itchy, as wool is, but not too badly. It is a little boxy, too, but worked well with my body.

links_reviews_title: Cute colors and warm but poor fit
links_reviews_text: Really oddly wide at the waist but very warm.

I sized down to an XS (typically S/M) per the advice of other reviewers and am glad I did. This sweater is cut boxy but that is the style of it and by sizing down, it gave me more of a "shape." Loved it. Great solid fabric, construction. Kept me warm but did not feel heavy. That pop of pink at the neckline kept it fresh, modern, and worked to brighten up my face. Thumbs up.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work and to a cabin weekend with friends.
links_reviews_text: I love the fit, the camel and pink color combination, and the material has a nice thick but sleek feel.
It falls very awkwardly around the front

links_reviews_title: Rented this for everyday wear, girls weekend in Nashville.
links_reviews_text: I returned without wearing. It was itchy and boxy.

links_reviews_title: I love wearing fresh looks daily
links_reviews_text: A little short but fit was great
Maybe I should have rented the medium as this top was very billowy when left untucked. Nice pattern and easy to wear - just not particularly flattering
I wore this top to work. I'm usually an 8/medium in tops and this fit great. The blue is vibrant and the tie at the neck was a fun detail. Would recommend!

I wore this blouse for meeting my entire work division in person for the first time. I wanted to communicate that I am cool, sleek, sophisticated and professional, and this blouse did all of that and more. It drapes nicely when tucked into a pencil skirt- it might be too blousy and big if untucked. The color is vibrant yet subtle. I got many compliments and I felt like a million bucks all day long. Highly Recommend!!
Decent work blouse, somewhat shapeless, but was fine tucked in. The sleeve button fell off while I was wearing it so I had to roll the sleeves. Pretty colors
Blouse is just ok. A little sheer and nothing special. Fits true to size.
I got many compliments on this blouse. I wish I had gotten a size smaller, but otherwise, it was very comfortable to wear.
I loved the colors in this top. It was perfect for work and then transitioning to a casual dinner. A great blouse.
This is a great work top to pair with black pants. Comfortable construction and the pop of blue is gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: I love this blouse!!! Will definitely be renting again. Can be worn for work or a date.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Runs true to size. I rented a medium and the length of the sleeves was perfect. It has a lovely floral pattern that I think anyone can wear. Perfect for the office or a nice date with your partner!
Would be great for night out or work...runs a little short so stripping it of a star.
Very versatile blouse that goes from work to after hours easily. Fit perfectly and I am 38D so that can be an issue.
Great color/pattern for work. Will definitely rent again.
Just a great warm sweater.
material is too thin almost lining like, but cute style and pattern.
fit well a little see through

links_reviews_title: Perfect shirt for work - its loose I usually wear S / M and small was very roomy
links_reviews_text: very comfy can wear alone or with jacket / sweater. can tuck into pants or not it looks great either way

I wore this twice! I wore the 4 but I definitely would order a 2 next time. I got so many compliments on this coat! It's professional and lovely. It's not lined and not the warmest and it was a bit long on someone so short. But I would definitely rent again.
Loved the color, it kept me pretty warm but the button hole on this particular one was a little too big so it kept coming unbuttoned
This coat is not lined, hence the 4 stars. Otherwise, it is pretty awesome. Nice color and texture. The cut is slim, not oversized. It could be dressed up or down.

What a lovely color! I love the cut of this coat, but don't absolutely love the gesture and exposed seams of the build. The color is so lovely, though, I would happily rent again for springtime! Made me feel elegant and polished and bright.

Nice coat for spring or fall- or mild climate winter. It fits comfortably and doesn't pull. Do NOT get this coat if you have a wool sensitivity. It is not lined and is scratchy if you aren't wearing long sleeves under it. The color is more versatile than I expected.
I really loved this jacket as it looked so classic on! Very pretty blue color. The only downside is it isn't super warm. Other than that- 10/10!
I could've gone with 2 or 4. Boxy fit. Boiled wool material so very warm. The sleeve length was just right.
It fits perfectly. The color is gorgeous, and I never ever want to send it back.
I loved this coat. I got numerous complements in the color of this coat & it was so warm. It definitely runs large so size down!
This is an unlined boiled wool. It's fairly warm but not heavy. Was a little snug in the tummy where it buttons but I'm apple. Sleeves were long.

I would have never bought this coat if I saw it in a store, but renting it with my unlimited subscription seemed like a great opportunity to try something new. It's simply gorgeous and the baby blue color is more muted on than you would think. The fit is perfect and unlike J.Crew's cocoon coat, this one has working pockets. I love this coat and now I'm even tempted to try it in hot pink...

links_reviews_title: A coat for a capital L, Lady
links_reviews_text: Felt like a full princess in this coat. The sleeves were a full 2" short for me and the texture is not great but willing to overlook for the color and style. Can't wait to rent again!
did not wear

links_reviews_title: Compliments every time I wore it
links_reviews_text: Color, cut and fit are gorgeous. The boiled wool is a little itchy if exposed to your skin, but maybe that's just me.
Warm, beautiful, lovely color. But the loop for the button is stretched so jacket wouldn't stay closed.

links_reviews_title: I've basically worn this everyday since I got it.
links_reviews_text: I love this coat (although the button hole is too big for the button). I wear it all the time, get tons of compliments, and rented it for a second month. It's not super warm, but I wear it anyways in Philly and Pittsburgh weather--with gloves and/or a hat it's fine.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, matched my dress perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, soft and comfortable.
I loved this coat. The color was refreshing and it was super comfortable. Perfect layer for weather in the 40s!

Gah, this coat was so clutch. I'm so glad I picked it for one of my monthly rentals. The blue color is beautiful and it worked well with most everything in my wardrobe. It's lightweight but does a great job keeping you warm. The fit was solid - perfect length (hitting about mid thigh) and not too short/long for my arms. It definitely added a fun pop of color on those fold winter days.

I love the color of this coat! It was plenty warm for where I live in the mid-Atlantic. Only thing is it definitely runs small - I normally wear an 18 and the 20 was the right fit for me in this. Also it does not stay buttoned very well so I mostly just wore it open.
Classic. Love the color and was able to wear it with more than I expected. Very warm too. Love this coat!
I loved the structure and fit

I got SO many compliments on this coat! I absolutely love coats (and already have plenty) but didn't have a blue coat like this. Felt very stylish in this coat. Everywhere I went people gave me compliments on the color.
Material of this coat is amazing

links_reviews_title: This jacket was amazing. I got so many compliments on it every time I wore it which was nice!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, oversized but flattering. It was great with a sweater, jeans, and booties or even a sweatshirt and joggers. Very diverse however, it was not as warm as I would've expected
Classic yet fun because of the color. Matched almost everything and was comfy and warm.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful coat, was told I looked like Jackie O!
links_reviews_text: Classic coat in a lovely color! My only issues was that this coat does run more true to size than other J Crew items, so the sleeves were a bit short and tight. I recommend ordering your normal size and not sizing down on this one.
The color is unexpected but versatile and the cut can go from elegant evening to casual overcoat with styling. Really liked this one and ended up purchasing it from J Crew on sale.

A great mid weight coat that works just as well with jeans and a t-shirt as it does with a pencil skirt and blouse. Great structure but stretchy enough that you can easily fit a chunky sweater underneath without too much bulk. Lovely color.

links_reviews_title: Needs a second set of buttons
links_reviews_text: The buttons were not enough to keep the coat closed in windy weather or with anything bulky underneath like a scarf or sweater. The second button would slip out and the whole coat would open repeatedly. Beautiful color and a nice option for fall in New England so long as it didn't need to be buttoned.

I'm in love with this coat! I feel classy wearing this to work. The color is so pretty, it's well-made, and nice and warm for November weather in NYC. Most importantly since it' wool: it's NOT itchy! Fits true to size too but a size smaller probably would have fit nicely too.
Fits well, but the front button would come undone. So, better to wear left open. Material is not as nice as I would have liked.
Absolutely loved this jacket! I got many compliments while wearing it. Perfect for a weekend getaway!
Beautiful blue color #cozy #autumn #fall
Wore for a travel day. Very comfortable but stylish.
So comfortable, so cozy. Wore almost every other day while working from home.
It was fine to wear around the house. Nothing special
Comfy and cute for airplane travel!

Loved this sweatshirt! It was light but still warm to wear. I liked that the sleeves were on the tighter side. I almost considered buying this piece but ended up not. It is great for a casual everyday event.
Looks great with jeans- I probably could have sized down but was fine with for the weekend look. I considered buying it but not thick material so I will just rent it again later.
Great sweatshirt that's just different enough to feel upscale casual. Just note that the dropped sleeves means it's a tight fit to layer under a close-fitting jacket.
This sweater was everything I wanted for work from home comfort. Warm, soft, and fuzzier than expected, very happy with it!

links_reviews_title: Cute color, simple, but not extremely special
links_reviews_text: This is perfectly nice but pretty much a basic...nothing that noteworthy except the colors. But I have nothing bad to say either...it's just not SPECIAL. But it was cute and comfortable and I'd rent it again!
I went up in size because I read that it was a crop top but isn't really necessary. I would call it true to size.
Cute, cozy, warm and thick. Great quality and not itchy. However the labels along the side are ginormous and without an undershirt would be really irritating!
Cute and comfy sweater! Perfect length. Would rent again.
Great comfy sweater! Short/cropped kinda but worked okay with high waisted jeans! So soft and not itchy at all. Love it and will rent again w/unlimited!

I love running my errands early in the morning and this was a perfect top to wear since it's still a bit crisp then. Not so great when I went back outside in the middle of the day but so worth it! Having a bigger chest makes it ride up a bit, but I just wore high waisted jeans and was set!

links_reviews_title: Amazing quality, beautiful color, loved this!
links_reviews_text: The color is bright and so pretty. It tucks nicely into jeans and the quality is great. Highly recommend renting

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, easy to wear, very cute.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were a bit bigger than I imagined but overall it was a great sweater. Would definitely wear it again.
Warm and soft, not at all scratchy. A bit cropped but I liked the style to balance out the fullness of the shape.
Everything I want in a sweater was here! Fit, color and fabric. Loved it and will rotate it again.

This is a great voluminous sweater that's thick enough to stay warm in. My rental did have a ton of tags on the side warning of being flammable, but they weren't too itchy once you got the sweater on. Fun winter color that goes with white, blue, or black pants
great color, nice quality knit, fashionable fit

Too short on body, and too long in sleeves. I know its to be fashionable, but the length comparison was about an inch off. Needed one more inch in the core, and an inch less in sleeves. Great color, and nice fabric.
Loved this sweater. Super cute but also comfy & warm.

links_reviews_title: cute and warm but too big and billowy, a bit overwhelming for petite figure.
links_reviews_text: gorgeous color and so soft. I would order it again in a smaller size.

this sweater is great! super soft, and really flattering pink color. The sleeves are oversized and a little long, so that is why I noted "runs large". The length is great, and collar detail is super comfortable and not itchy like other sweaters!
Definitely should size down. Oversized, but very soft and beautiful color!
Super cute top. Loved wearing this shirt, got so many compliments from people. It definitely fits a little bigger. I'm between small and medium and the small for a little big.
loved this shirt and got a lot of compliments! material was a bit rough and it wasn't out of this world. probably wouldn't rent again but it was cute for a one time use

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of wild
links_reviews_text: Love this shirt! I would never buy a shirt with a horse pattern because when would I wear this again?! I feel chic but funky - a must rental if you're looking for something a little fun!
Love this shirt! Super cute and I love horses. The print definitely sparks conversation. I want to buy it! I'm obsessed with RTR!

Fit great. I am larger busted and, for the most part, there was no gap. I wore a tank underneath for security and I think that's what really caused it to gap at times. I got so many compliments on it though. Fun and unique!
Everyone loved it. Men/women it didn't matter. It was a fun shirt to wear. Looked classy but fun. I'm normally a small to medium. A small was perfect

links_reviews_title: Color isn't what I expected, still a fun top
links_reviews_text: Based on the RTR photo, I assumed the shirt was white with a horse pattern, but it's more beige/slightly pink. Still a fun top, just wasn't exactly what I expected.

Loved the fun print of this blouse - so sad not one person said anything so we could get a good laugh. True to size. A little short in the length, but perfect for tucking or knotting. Silky material, not a cotton button up.
Great shirt! True to size, not see thru and awesome print.
I'm not a horse fan but fun look to try. Comfy material, little tight in the bust
I loved the horse print. The fabric was little scratchy. Sleeves ran a little short but not bad.

I cannot believe the other reviews. My experience was so different. Although the top is super cute, it runs small. Looked too shrunken to wear in public. Sleeves were even tight at cuffs and too short. So disappointing because it is a great print.

links_reviews_title: I rented it because I teach high school and our mascot is the Stallions!
links_reviews_text: I liked the fit and fabric. Very comfortable. I just wish I could afford to buy it! Would rent again.

I love a good unexpected print - this one is great! The shirt is a good thickness, not bulking, but not sheer. A little oversized, which worked great paired with skinny jeans and front tucked with a belt. If you like a little creativity and whimsy, definitely give this shirt a try!

links_reviews_title: This is why you RTR! This shirt was fun but something I wouldn't need forever.
links_reviews_text: Loose fitting and good length. Don't size up

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print, runs a bit small
links_reviews_text: I usually toggle between a medium and large when it comes to tops. The chest area was tight and buttons ended up pulling a bit. Also, it's a bit shorter in length than I typically prefer for my blouses - usually I like them long enough to be able to comfortably french tuck. However, the horse print is very cool and I received a lot of compliments each time I wore it. Would rent again, sized up.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this bold print
links_reviews_text: The shirt was comfortable and fit well. I received a lot of compliments throughout the day. H
Wish I had sized up, not necessarily snug but felt myself adjusting the shoulders all day. Fabric is a bit thicker than I anticipated.
I got so many compliments on this blouse. It was perfect for the office, dinner with friends, and dressed up for a holiday party.

links_reviews_title: So cute, if you like a tighter fit size down
links_reviews_text: I'm keeping this one to wear again. Nice material and great pattern! I got a lot of compliments
Pros: Cute print, nice fit Cons: a little itchy.
Really nicely tailored fit. The print just makes this shirt though. A great way to make a work outfit fun.
Perfect fit, perfect print.
This is definitely a fun shirt, although I think the colors show up a little more muted in person than they do in pictures. It is comfortable and easy to tuck into a skirt or pants for work.

Beautiful detailed shirt! I'm not into horses or anything but thought it was a fun statement blouse for fall. Got tons of compliments. The shirt is a really pretty mauve color and is good quality. I tied the bottom in a knot for a more casual look after happy hour. Recommend!
Fun! Wore with corduroys and black slacks. Needs an undershirt but a fun everyday blouse.
Fits as expected. Got lots of compliments. Only issue I had is it wrinkles easily, especially around the mid section after wearing a seat belt.

This shirt was AMAZING. I got so many compliments. The fit was flattering, though it was a little short for me (I'm taller than most) but worked well with some high waisted jeans. The pattern was fun and perfect for a night out! Loved this so, so much!
Fun sleeves, great color. Lots of compliments!

Very flatting and easy blouse. Can be worn more casually with jeans or more professionally- it's very versatile. The fit is feminine and can be low cut so I recommend sizing up if you have a larger bust. It can feel a lil snug.
The fabric (print and feel) on this are absolutely stunning. It's a true wrap but isn't too low cut (and I'm busty). I'm short-waisted, so it rode up a bit in back. Generously cut.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous in person. Lot's of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Love, love, love! This is such a pretty wrap blouse. Lightweight, but very well made. No gaps and because of neckline folds, appropriate for larger or smaller bustlines without fear of gaps. Cute tie in back or around the side. I wore a size 12, which fit well. I wore this versatile blouse with jeans and flats and with a pencil skirt and pumps. Would buy this!
Very much a departure from my usual style, but that made it fun! I felt like an Austrian princess :)

Very beautiful fabrication. The silk is really high-quality. The pattern is really fun. The wraparound is terrific for an hourglass figure. I was also able to wear this blouse without a camisole as well as with one to have different looks.

links_reviews_title: Best top that I have EVER worn!
links_reviews_text: Con: There should be a pin to close the chest because that area was big on me Pro: Everything. It is so light, airy, and great! Overall: I despise prints and am not a fan of wrap clothing. And this made me a believer! It cinched my waist in a way that had me getting compliments non-stop. Even my parents were awes struck and thought I had drastically lost weight. No I did not - I'm finally wearing a top made for my body and doesn't look like a pillow cover on me. I'd buy this if it wasn't so expensive.
This top was so pretty, and did gape open like so me wraps. It was a little short, but not too bad. Absolutely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Sexy and covered up at the same time
links_reviews_text: Love this for an evening out with my husband. it is a fairly deep plunge (sexy), but with the long sleeves it is really balanced. I had to wear with a high waisted pant to not show my belly, so keep that in mind!
Really comfortable and flattering. It is roomy in the arms which I appreciate.
This blouse was fantastic. Great fit, great print, great fun. I did wear it with a tank top underneath for a little more coverage, but it can be worn without.
Runs true to size, gorgeous material and easy to wear. Very flattering. Would rent again.

Great blouse for day to night! The pattern is really fun and it's super flattering. The tie closure accentuates your waist and the sleeves and shoulders are puffy and flowy in all the right ways. I got tons of compliments wearing this and considered buying. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect top for work and play
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a casual bday dinner with jeans and boots. Perfect for full chests and soft middles. Adjustable with the string tie. Added a pin to the neckline but didn't NEED it, just being safe. Will rent again. Oh I will say it looked velvet on the site but was not. Still cute pattern though.
I really liked this blouse. The fabric is very pretty and it fit well
Really pretty print but too loose to wear out in public. Need to wear a tank underneath
I love this. The colors are gorgeous and the website just doesn't do it any justice

This top runs very large. I have a DD chest and the shirt still appeared frumpy in my normal size. Sleeves are very loose and baggy and I'm not sure that sizing down will help it appear more tailored.

I rented my normal size 12 and couldn't make this work. In order to get the wrap tied tight enough to fit my natural waist (very cropped look), there was too much fabric up top and no latch to secure it. Basically the entire top was oversized/billowing, but no way to control it or keep my bra from showing. The sleeves were very oversized as well. The fabric and print are beautiful, but this just didn't work for me.

Good fit, but will need fashion tape to stay closed. The ties are long and go around the waist and tie in the front. Sleeve is puffy and looks like it has shoulder pads, although it doesn't. Looks nice with jeans. A good "wear to work" look.
This was a super cute dress for work. I love the ruffle detail for the slit. The color is also fantastic! I did just have to make sure when I sat that I was covered at work.
I got this for a work conference and it was perfection. It's super stretchy, structured enough that it doesn't wrinkle, and the color is fab. I'm between an 8 and 10 size-wise and the 10 fit great.

I would have given this five stars but there was a weird smell attached to the dress- like plastic and it was nauseating at times. Otherwise the dress fit well and there was no need for shape wear. I loved the asymmetrical cut and that the sleeves didn't cut off my arm circulation.

links_reviews_title: Easy beautiful work dress with just enough evening flare
links_reviews_text: Great fit, flattering for your figure without extra pieces and frills. Side detailing brought the whole look together. Back comes up shorter if you have a booty but remained long enough to be work-appropriate.

Holy moly this is the perfect work dress! I wish it came in every color and even a long sleeve option! It's so comfortable, forgiving, and stretchy. I wore with shapewear but you don't need to because the fabric is thick so it's great for low 70s high 60s weather. Very flattering but conservative. LOVE IT!

links_reviews_title: Classy and cute dress for sister's baby shower! Big fan of this brand.
links_reviews_text: This dress was a real win - after another recent rental, I'm a big fan of Shoshanna. I'm often in between a 4 and a 6 but 6 had the right amount of room for me in the waist, where I'm usually a 27/28 in Levi's jeans. I'm also straight bodied and relatively small chested. I wore this for my sisters baby shower and got a ton of compliments. It fits the body well and the sash adds something different. Great for a daytime event, and probably an evening one too!

I've rented this dress in a size 2 and 4, and for me, I prefer the size 2 because it's more fitted. The photo here is the size 2. But if you're in between sizes then go for what feels more comfortable to you because the 4 definitely still looked good, just looser in the stomach and legs. :) I got tons of compliments on this dress. It's a nice heavier weight making it great for all seasons! I just returned it but I'm almost positive it had pockets too (bonus!).

I would purchase this dress, if possible. It is a stunning dress. The fit is TTS. I wore the size 12. It is flattering and I received many compliments. It is a perfect weight and color for fall. For reference, I'm 5'11, about 185 lbs, and a 38DD.

This dress looked lovely in the pictures on the model but average IRL. I'm tall (5'10") but the torso felt too long, the length of the overall dress was a bit odd, and it didn't hug any curves, just looked kind of lifeless. I was going to wear it to a work event but instead am returning.

The color and weight of this dress is perfect for the fall, and I got compliments all day! The ruffle detail and slit add a little something extra and the length of the dress was perfect for work. You could also dress this up for a cocktail style event as well. I am glad I went with the 8, since the waist band doesn't have a lot of give, but the hips were a little roomy. Overall I love this dress and will rent again!

I really love this dress. The wine color is beautiful and could work for multiple seasons with the right accessories. I also loved the fabric- thick enough to hide bumps but unlined so it could be worn in warmer months. The ruffle lays nicely and adds interest. The shoulders were a little tight for me, but that is not abnormal for other items I wear. It's not particularly stretchy, so if you're between sizes I would suggest going up. I'm a true 16, with a 35" waist and it fit great. I'm planning to wear it for a conference and job interviews I have this month.

links_reviews_title: Too casual for the event I ordered for, but would be great for work.
links_reviews_text: Snug through the belly area which I do not like. Nice thick material that felt too casual for an event but good for work.

links_reviews_title: Good basic, nothing fancy but work-appropriate
links_reviews_text: Fits a little matronly, but nice change of pace for a work dress.

I wish I had taken a picture of this dress - I wore it so many times (I am in sales so see different clients every day/week). Great look - I work in conservative work environment so wore with a blazer. I think it might run a little smaller in the bust and slightly larger in the hips since it did seem a tad roomier in the hips and waist. I couldn't have gone down a size though because the bust fit perfectly. Would rent again and wish it came in other colors!
So flattering! So many compliments!
Fit well and was comfortable to sit in at work throughout the day. Very conservative and longer than I would have liked.

links_reviews_title: Great quality. Beautiful cut. Looked great for work. I would rent again.
links_reviews_text: Fit great even though it was a little long on me due to my height.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a work event
links_reviews_text: The fit and material of this dress made it form fitting yet comfortable. The length was perfect too right below the knees, will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to work and then a broadway play.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2 and this fit really nice. The material is a little thick so it's flattering on the stomach bumps.
Beautiful dress for work. Great length and cut... interesting shape and conservative enough to accommodate any work environment. Would even work for happy hour cocktails
Usually I wear a 6 but in this dress, the 4 was the right one. A lovely swing to the skirt, and fabulous color and fit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress runs a little small
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and the heavy fabric is nice for colder months. I did feel like for a 14 it ran a touch small in the arms and chest.
Nice dress, but nothing exceptional

links_reviews_title: Great, comfortable dress for work event.
links_reviews_text: This is a conservative dress with great details that fit great.. Wore on TV for work and the color popped! Will rent again in the fall.
This was tight on top (I couldn't zip it up) and way too long. Maybe on someone taller with a smaller chest it might work...but it definitely didn't work for me.
Quality was perfect. Color is a bit more burgandy than red, but still loved. Ended up wearing the smaller size since it fit best.

links_reviews_title: Not a great fit for long torso
links_reviews_text: Well tailored classic dress perfect for work, church, or a conservative choice for a night out. I am 5'9" and have a long torso, so while the dress fit it didn't quite hit me in the right places. The waist was essentially just a little high on me which cause it to be too big. The color is gorgeous and I'll wear it a few times this month, but i would not suggest it for other ladies with a long torso.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable work dress that transitioned well to an evening reception.
links_reviews_text: I received lots of compliments on this dress. The fit was flattering in the bust and hips, but a bit too roomy through the waist and lower back. I belted the dress and wore a blazer to hide the extra fabric, and it looked great.
Loved the fit and ease of wearing this dress. It was comfortable and elegant at the same time. Great for a wedding, fancy brunch, girls night, or cocktail party!
Perfect dress for a holiday work party! Very comfortable and flattering. I ordered in a 2 and 4 and ended up wearing the 2 so that it would be a little more form fitting.

links_reviews_title: Classy and chic, perfect for a day of important meetings
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear, classy length, clean lines, and extremely comfortable
This dress fit great and was really flattering. Color was great. Highly recommend for work
Beautiful. True to size and very comfortable.

Wanted to like this dress, the color and fabric is great but the fit is lacking :( the "ruffle" down the front pulls on the dress causing the waistline to sag and the fit to be off. If you're short the dress length is not great and makes you look matronly.

Love everything about this dress: the heavier weight of the fabric, the unique design, the color. I am 5'8" and a true hourglass shape (36 DD bust, 29 waist). The 10 worked well on my frame and gave me comfortable room in the waist without looking too big.

links_reviews_title: Nice, heavy fabric in a conservative for work cut and color
links_reviews_text: Front panel is extra forgiving through the tummy, longer sleeves are nice for year-round office AC
High quality and conservative dress. Perfect for work event. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I wore it twice
links_reviews_text: Great fall dress! Full swishy skirt to hide tummy.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for a client meeting. Professional vibe.
links_reviews_text: The color is accurate and perfect for fall. I wore it with black heels and long, dangly earrings. The material was comfortable to move around in.

links_reviews_title: Great shape for small waist/larger hips
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress several times. Primarily for work and then to a dinner afterwards. It's nice that it can show off a waist without being tight on the hips, but the skirt is not too full. Did not wrinkle when folded for travel.

Overall I liked this dress! My two disclaimers would be that 1) it's way more of a plum/purple than what I expected based on the stock image (not at all a red dress). And 2) it felt just a bit Little House on the Prairie or something... I paired it with snakeskin booties for work though, and got tons of compliments! I'd rent again.
Rock the shoulders. I felt like a boss!

This is a 4-season dress for sure, although the color is more autumnal. I would definitely rent this again. The fabric is divine - and it has a reptilian pattern woven in that gives the fabric texture to the touch, not just to the eye. There is a lining, such a nice touch with lighter fabric. I loved the puffed sleeves, everything works with this dress! I styled it with a chunky necklace and knee high reptile pattern boots.

links_reviews_title: I liked this so much more than I expected
links_reviews_text: Not my usual style but I really liked this dress the fabric is light and soft, not what I was expecting from the photos. I wish I had somewhere better than work to wear this
This fit perfectly. I felt amazing in it - was complimented all day. The color and texture make it look every bit of its retail price. I will definitely rent this again. Love love it.
Totally should have ordered a small. It was huge on me. Still wore it - it's an interesting crocodile embossed, plum colored satin-like material. Waist has stretchy band.

links_reviews_title: Such a cool dress –Wish I didn't have to give it back!!
links_reviews_text: So when I first got this dress, I was a little intimidated by the sleeves but the more I wore it, the more I liked it. It has a fun pattern and felt beautiful and well made. I wore it to a Christmas party and then again with a sweater over it for brunch. I ended up loving it and wishing I could keep it!

links_reviews_title: I liked the length of the dress and pattern.
links_reviews_text: The elastic around the neck and waist made it look cheap. I recommend adding a wide belt.

Loved this dress. At first I wasn't sure how often I'd wear it, but I noticed I kept reaching for it- two fancy dinners and a night @a show. One of those things you probably where don't have many others items for similar needs. Fit was nice. Waist maybe a teeny bit snug if that's where you carry you're weight.

fits true to size, the back zipper was difficult to zip on my own; interesting puff sleeves add appeal; as a short person, this dress came to mid-shin; i paired it with a leather jacket, a belt, and lug sole high heels. would rent again

links_reviews_title: A little right around the neck but beautiful fabric
links_reviews_text: The neck was a bit uncomfortable - it felt tighter than I would have expected but the fabric was beautiful and the dress was very flattering.

links_reviews_title: True to size and very unique
links_reviews_text: Fits great, true to size, modest and unique crocodile pattern

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear burgundy Sea New York midi dress
links_reviews_text: This embossed dress was cute. I'm 5'4" and this was longer than a midi on me. I'm also short-waisted and I thought the elasticized waist came up a bit high on me. I ended up belting and it looked better. I also thought the cut of the sleeves hung a little funny on me, although the shoulders and bust seemed to fit okay. I don't know that I'd rush to rent this again.
I wore this dress to work, to dinner, and for a cross-country flight, and it was perfect for all. It comfortable and the subtle texture adds a little personality. Go with your normal size.
Man, I love this coat. It is solid, exceedingly well-made, heavy, and made me feel like a rock star. I feel like a million bucks wearing it. I'm not sure I want to give it back! Highly recommend.

This coat does fit large. The M was big on me. I still loved this and wished I could keep it. I got so many compliments. There are 2 closures that snap closed to loops on the other side. You do have feel around for the loops but I quickly got the hang of it.

This jacket was AMAZING. It so cozy and perfect to be dressed up or down. It's perfectly oversized and I would have kept it if the price wasn't so high. One thing to note is that it is warmer than I expected and was a little too warm for an event with a lot of people, but it was so cute that I suffered through it.
A bit heavy but great for a cold day!
This coat is adorable! The fit is definitely oversized but intentionally so. I had a small and probably could have done an XS but this fit well with a sweater underneath!
It fits oversize. If you want a regular fit, size down. Very soft, so warm even in extreme midwest winter, and so fun to wear!
Great winter coat. Comfortable and warm. On trend. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved this jacket! It was big but that is part of the look. I got so many compliments when I wore it
links_reviews_text: The fit is loose but looks amazing and is very warm.
I really wanted to like this jacket, but the S was way too large on me. Had to return without wearing.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments when wearing this coat.
links_reviews_text: I loved that I could dress up my leggings with this coat and high heel booties
This coat is simply amazing. It is soft, cozy, warm, stylish, and can easily dress up or down any outfit. And the pockets are enormous. I never want to give it back.
I love this oversized coat. Great fabric, unexpected color.
Glamorous coat. Not much of a closure, just one little hook that kept coming undone, but still so fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: OBSESSED with this piece and wanted to keep it so bad. SO cozy and oversized .. VERY cute
links_reviews_text: Great oversized cozy Tibi piece. So many compliments!

This jacket was super cute, but it was massive! Normally I'd be a medium, but I got a large bc it was all that was available, but this jacket felt more like a 2XL and made me look like a character from "Where the Wild Things Are".
Runs very large! XS fits like a 4/6 - long arms, etc. Cute and cozy!

so I haven't worn it out yet (and it has not been worn yet either-- tags on still), but when I tried it on, I loved the feel, the look, and the quality. It's a pretty grey color, very soft, and pretty heavy and nice weight! It looks like you could definitely dress it up if you wanted to, too! I am an 8 and the Large is a little bit big on me, but the oversize look works for this piece, and I know I will be able to wear a sweater underneath it. Really excited to wear this on my trip to a cold climate next week!
Very soft love the feeling. Runs a bit big

links_reviews_title: Like a weighted blanket you can wear in public
links_reviews_text: This runs large, but is the most cozy jacket I've ever worn. It's not cold enough where I live to require this weight of jacket yet but I just keep wearing it anyway because it's SO comfortable.

The fabric on this coat was really nice, soft and plush. However, the sizing was wildly large. I am normally a S/4-6 and got a M based on the RTR recommendation. I should have sized down to an XS. Also, there is only a super small hook to keep the coat closed (no buttons) which could not get to fasten all the way, so if you live somewhere cold don't expect this to keep you warm.
Perfect for fall if you love oversized coats. So warm and cozy I literally never want to take it off!
Not sure why RTR recommended the medium. Sleeves are way too long and the overall fit is gigantic for my 5'4 self
This jacket swallowed me up & left me looking life a bulbous poodle. Did not wear.

This sweater is amazing! Great weight for spring/fall. Nice length for me, as I do not like tops that are too short. Comfortable knit. Yellow that POPS but isn't overwhelming. And that accent piece down the side, oh my!! So many compliments. I look forward to renting this one again!

Wore this for a Harry Potter themed work event, and it was perfect! I'm usually a medium but wore a small because that's all that was available. It was little snug on the chest and short so I bet a medium would've been better.
I got a 40 which is usually a size 4 and it fit perfectly. I am usually a size 6 so I think it runs a bit large
Loved this shirt. Nice fabric and fun design. Brightened up the office!
Okay top. Definitely different. Feel I was too short to pull off this.
This sweater is great for everyday and easy to dress up. You need to wear with high waist pants unless you're fine with skin showing. The arms are pretty long but not awful.
Good for! Maybe a little long in sleeves but if I went down in a size it would've been too short. I wore it with high waisted black skinny jeans.

This sweater is just enough different to be a fun switch up, without being so different you aren't sure how to style it. Great color, comfy, and would rent again. Does gap a bit when sitting since it isn't sewn closed all the way down the front.

links_reviews_title: The perfect transition cardigan shirt for Fall!
links_reviews_text: This top fit perfectly, I specifically loved the wrap quality of it! (There's a button to open up the front if you'd like, too) The sleeves added a unique flair to my outfit! I wore this top to a regular day of school and got so many compliments. I think the material is perfect for a windy fall day.
Cute, but sleeves were very baggy

I think ASTR may be one of my new favorite designers for winter sweaters. This is a great casual piece that I can also wear to work so it is very versatile. I'm tall and long waisted so this works well with a high waisted jean. I'm not big on pops of color so this color was perfect. Super comfortable!

Such a comfy material to wear for just about any occasion. Most enjoyed wearing this with jeans on a sunny Fall/Winter day. Cut to accentuate curves well and looks better than your average green sweater.
So comfortable and warm
I am going to exchange for a smaller size. The medium was a little too big / too much fabric! But it's super cute and I'm excited to wear in the smaller size.
This being big on me was 100% on me getting a bigger size. It's cute though, but if you are big chested, it might have too much cleavage.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and I received a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It is definitely cropped, but was a comfortable length with high waisted jeans. Loved the sleeves to give the sweater a bit more. Had cleavage but without being excessive. Would definitely rent again.
Love everything about this - beautiful winter green, fun sleeves, flattering neckline. I wore this several times and will probably rent again.
This top was so nice, soft, comfortable, fit great, but the front kept opening under the snap, it needs at least one more snap.
beautiful green color. fit true to size. looked classy and elegant, but simple. Came with tags on!!!
Much heavier than expected but great quality! Super warm and I loved the pockets

I don't want to give this one back. It's a lot of fabric, but somehow manages to be flattering. I felt very cool wearing this to work but also grabbed it for a cozy night in the couch. It fits narrow in the shoulder, which keeps it from feeling too bulky, and all the extra fabric falls nicely and gives it a funky feel. I'll miss this one when I send it back!

links_reviews_title: Great alternative to a jacket. Wore in 40 degree weather and stayed warm!
links_reviews_text: Nicely made, heavy, and warm. I have slim arms and I found the fit to be a bit tight. Then again maybe it's because I wore it over long sleeves! It can be dressed up or down. I wore it twice with jeans for shopping and travel.
great length for leggings neat drap in the front. Would buy but arrived with small hole at the sleeve seam.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and warm cardigan - Size down!
links_reviews_text: It's a really cozy and warm cardigan. The style on the bottom can make your hips look wide though. I tried on the XS and S in the store and I'm glad I did because the S was humongous. The XS fit perfectly and I'm normally a S/size 4.

I'm tall so it's rare to find a dress with sleeves that actually are long enough. This is a loose, flowy dress that has some details that are fun (ruffles on chest/ shoulder, cinched details on skirt). Drawstring waistband helps add definition. Love!

Wore this to work, but will definitely wear again to brunch! It has a tie along the waist to adjust it, the length is work appropriate & it is light and comfortable! Not sheer at all either. Absolutely love
I probably could have sized down to a Medium but felt super comfortable in this at work. Very conservative. I'm 5'8 and was still long enough on me to wear to work without tights.
Fun dress for daytime. Paired with black tights & booties. Cute & comfortable, might rent again!

links_reviews_title: Dress it up or dress it down
links_reviews_text: I wore this to two Christmas Eve parties and also to 10:00 PM Christmas Eve Mass. Both parties were more on the casual side. Most people in jeans. But I felt like jeans would have been too casual for mass. This dress was great because I didn't feel too dressed up at either party or too dressed down for the service. It was also great because it was 50 degrees here so I could wear it without tights. The only bummer was that I thought it made my already large chest (32DDD) look even larger (boo!).
This dress is so perfect for all kinds of occasions! I added a belt for work but the dress didn't need one and also OTK boots looks amazing with it! Would have purchased if I could afford it!

links_reviews_title: Cute Prairie Dress but A little Big
links_reviews_text: Usually I wear a 10/12 and it suggested I wear the XXL. It was very loose and baggy up top. Thankfully the waist was adjustable so I was able to make it tighter. Fabric was very comfortable and I got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Sneakers or heels this dress is fab!
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this dress while out exploring all day in NYC. During the day I paired it with white sneakers and for night I switched them out for black heels, both looked fabulous! The drawstring waist is perfect for adding waist definition and I love the more blousy top for a more put together look. I'm keeping this in my closet for Thanksgiving and maybe by then I'll justify a reason to just buy it and have it forever. Highly recommend! Fit note: size down if you have smaller bust/shoulders
This is a pretty and easy to wear dress, but it didn't have much shape on me. Comfortable elastic at the waist.

links_reviews_title: I received lots of compliments and the look was effortless
links_reviews_text: Had a torn elastic clasp

links_reviews_title: Cute and fun but was too big for me. I need to exchange next time, didn't know I could do that.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and easy but just be sure to get the right size. The XL was giant all over.
Such a cute dress for work or family events. I wore with black booties and got so many compliments. Might consider buying and definitely renting again!
It was a cute dress but it was really baggy on me, especially in the top and on the shoulders. I think I would have liked the medium on me better.

Cute, pretty, patterned dress. It runs big and is voluminous, I think if I bought it, I'd go small. Got lots of compliments on it, actually - it's feminine but the purple is dark and it's nice for winter.
This was a really beautiful dress. I paired it with black tights and booties and it was great for work! Runs slightly large but fit was okay!
Very true fit - comfortable, and easy to wear! Wore this to a Fall Bridal Luncheon!
The size was a bit big, but that was because the small wasn't available.
I wore with tights and booties but would also wear with knee high boots. It does run big, I had to really tighten the draw string. I would have easily fit into a medium.
I've rented this twice and get nothing but compliments. Looks cute with OTK boots and a moto jacket.

links_reviews_title: Should have got a smaller size
links_reviews_text: Too large. Didn't end up wearing.

links_reviews_title: Casual but roomy every day bags
links_reviews_text: Rented this as a purse to carry my laptop and other essentials on a daily basis. It was really roomy, but very casual with the bungee cord handles and plastic embossed logo. It was cute, but almost more of a gym bag. You can fit a lot in it!

This bag is everything. I have gotten so many compliments since wearing it and being not a huge fan of tote bags this is literally my favorite.
