The blue tie dye is so unique and on trend right now I am just obsessed. The functionality of the bag itself is amazing... I've been using it as an overnight bag, bag for work and books, and just to store everyday things and it fits it all perfectly. 10/10 Love. This. Bag.
I love the color and shape of this bag, however, the interior zipper pouch (which divides the bag into two sections inside) makes the bag very impractical.
The bag is a little stiff but overall great looking. It fits my phone, wallet, chapstick etc. the handle is a little squeaky but I would rent again

links_reviews_title: Cute little bag that fits with a variety of occasions
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved this bag. It came with me out to dinner, to run errands, to boozy brunch, etc. Beautiful color and construction. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Adorable. Great for work and then I to evening if need be
links_reviews_text: Perfect to size love it

links_reviews_title: Front slit not appropriate for work
links_reviews_text: I'm really not sure what the purpose of this dress is. It reads business but the front slit is scandalous. I'm afraid my underwear are going to pop out from the front as natural tendency for fitted dresses are to ride up a bit. I do love the color and fabric texture but I will not be wearing this in public.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colour but felt a bit frumpy
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful colour. The seam across the chest looked slightly pulled to me, my husband asked if there was a rip so that's not great. I wore it to an interview and got complimented but it's not breathable so I felt sweaty even when I wasn't really warm at all. I also felt it drew attention to the stomach area. If I owned it I'd wear it again but I'm glad to be returning it

links_reviews_title: Comfy and fashionable. True to size!
links_reviews_text: It's definitely a form fitting dress but it's not uncomfortable. The slit in the front is fun. I wore it on vacation but the conservative top and the length would make it appropriate for work and everyday wear. The fabric has a sporty stretch feel to it.
I find DVF usually runs snug but this was true to size or a bit generous. I'm usually between an 8 and a 10 and the 8 fit nicely without pulling at all.

Really liked this color for fall. The dress silhouette is nice, the length is ok, but runs a bit large so it bunched all over and wrinkled on me. Not super flattering. There's some decent stretch in the material but it's on the thinner side so it is not forgiving at all - you can see all lumps, bumps, and undergarments.
Got this for work. The fabric is almost linen like and shows everything. The slit was weird for work. Wouldn't rent again.
After trying on other work dresses this one just paled in comparison. It was very thin material and just didn't fit well on an hourglass shape. Returned!

This dress is very flattering and a great color. The arm holes are enormous, so expect your bra to show. I was also surprised that it is unlined. Even so, it does a surprisingly good job of camouflaging problem areas and hangs perfectly. It's also quite long — it hits me just below the knees in that unflattering area where legs look fat rather than just at the base of the kneecap, which is very flattering. As a result, it must be worn with heels.
I would say this dress, although GORGEOUS, did not fit well.. Order down
The fit of this dress was flattering. I didn't love the material. It was stiff and thin and wrinkled easily. Best as a fall dress.
This dress is beautiful. The fit is just right and the color is very nice! Overall my favorite out of the shipment I received.
Great fit. A bit long, but this is what makes it a good fit with tights for the office.

links_reviews_title: I love this color and fit.
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments on this dress. The color was amazing and the fit was perfect. Very feminine.
Attractive and sophisticated. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Cute but you must have hips.
links_reviews_text: I didn't get to wear this dress because the dress is made for someone who has hips and I don't. The sides puckered out because it was too big in the hip area and the top was tight on my chest. It was very nice material though and looks good on the hanger.
As I am a petite, 4'11'', the proportion did not work for me.

This was my favorite thing I've rented so far in my unlimited subscription! I wore it so many times, all different ways - belted with a blazer, with a loose sweater over top, and with a cardigan. Love the color, love the fit (form fitting but NOT tight), love the style. Very comfortable for long days at work. I should have listened to the size recommendation and ordered a size 4, but I didn't want it to be tight for work. The 6 fit well but was a tad loose in the midriff area.
Great versatile dress, wore with grey knit shrug, silver jewelry and black scrappy sandals. The stitching on the bust makes it so flattering.
Great color and fit. You could dress this up or down in so many ways! But... the fabrics is unforgiving. Shapewear is definitely needed!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress at least 3 times. Very comfortable
links_reviews_text: Fit was very comfortable.

Loved the fall color of this dress and the fit! It hugs the curves, so I wore it with a light kimono and some shell top Adidas to make it more work-whimsical (I'm in tech). Not particularly thick material, so wore it with shapewear.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for work in the fall
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress but the slit in the front was ripped a little when I received so it was a little higher slit than I would have wanted for work.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to work.
links_reviews_text: This is an amazing dress. The material is light. Very comfortable. I work it to work and felt wonderful in it the whole day. I would rent this dress again. I'm 5'4, 117 lbs. I wore a size 2.
Great fit. Stretchy material

links_reviews_title: Small when with a shirt underneath!
links_reviews_text: I wanted to wear this with a beige shirt underneath and felt it was a little small, I usually wear a size 8 and opted for 10. It was big in the stomach area, fitted in the chest and booty. Would rent for summer.

I hoped that this would be a fun, breezy spring/summer dress for everyday wear. The skirt's fullness and swing were the only positives. The straps were too long and the weight of the skirt pulled unevenly at the waistline, making the outfit appear quite sloppy. The linen material didn't lend itself to the size and shape of the straps. The chest was a bit tight on me (34B), even without a bra, yet the fabric was sheer enough I could spot my nipples. Picture looks way better than it was in person.
Loved this dress! Perfect for Mexico. It runs a bit big - even the xs was a little large in the shoulder/armpit area.

I rented this last year in the red and loved wearing it, so when I saw the white was available for the 4th of July, I knew I had to get it. Like the red version, the material is heavier but very high quality. The only issue with the thick material is that it makes it hard to zip up the tiny side zipper. Other than that, the dress is great and got tons of compliments!

This dress is so adorable for vacation but it is HOT! There is a lining underneath so very well made, but probably best for the beach days when the temp drops and it gets a little cooler at night. The zipper on my dress got stuck but other than that, was a great rental.

Wore this a few times, the zipper is on the side and this particular one was very challenging to zip over the seam, so I left it half zipped and pulled it over. The straps are not adjustable and did slip down a few times.

links_reviews_title: This dress is comfortable, flattering and fun!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits so well and is comfortable and fun! I wish I could rent it on Unlimited but it's never available because it's so cute!
So comfy and the skirt feels so billowy!
I wore and xs and it fit great! Really cute, carefree summer dress that's super comfortable! I gave it a quick iron when I received it and after that it traveled really well!

Loved this casual well made dress. Several layers so it isn't see through at all. It is tight on the top and didn't have much breathing room in the chest. Made me even flatter than I actually am. Very comfortable though and got lots of compliments. Highly recommend. Didn't give 5 stars because arrived very wrinkled and stays that way.

I wore this for my bridal shower on a hot, sunny day, and was so incredibly happy with this dress. First and foremost, I didn't need to wear a bra which was a miracle (I'm a D), second, the fabric is gorgeous, and third, it was so comfortable! I wasn't hot at all, it fell in all the right places, and I felt like a boho princess. I've never received so many compliments...probably ever. So, for that, thanks RTR!

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear and stand out dress
links_reviews_text: Felt like this simple design and embroidery gave a lot of character and personality. Didn't need to wear a bra and felt like it was okay! No stretch but felt it was true to size. Typically wear a 4/6

links_reviews_title: I wore this several times and loved it!!!
links_reviews_text: So cute!! And got so many complimentS

This dress is so feminine and beautiful! I'm completely obsessed with the fit and the flutter sleeve. I think it runs slightly large, but it was fine. The only downside is that I spent 30 min ironing it before I could wear it out. Tons of compliments. Will absolutely rent again.
Fit was great and the dress was perfect for the occasion.

I rented this to take with me on vacation to Florida. Thankfully, I tried the dress on at the RTR store before bringing it home because I immediately returned it. It was not my style at all. The dress itself is VERY boho with a full skirt. Like, this skirt has some serious weight to it. I'm also 5'9" and I felt like the skirt was long on me.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for vacay! Love the length and ruffles!
links_reviews_text: The only area it was tight was the bust - couldn't wear a bra with it.
The bodice was thick and not flattering, so many layers of fabric. I was hoping for light and breezy but it wasn't

links_reviews_title: Super cute - perfect for our tropical vacation!
links_reviews_text: Fit very well and was extremely flattering. Loved the look/style for our tropical vacation.

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfortable. I got sooo many compliments and felt really pretty in it!
links_reviews_text: Personally I thought it ran a little big in the wait
Fit fine everywhere except the chest, which had no room at all. Didn't wear it.
Cute, but the chest runs small and the straps run long. I struggled to zip the dress, and after doing so found the chest to be too tight and uncomfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: Could have sized down. Tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Could have sized down because the straps were loose and kept falling down when I sat. Also there was plenty of space. Received tons of compliments. It was a great dress. Would order again.

links_reviews_title: It's so beautiful, flowy and happy! Got endless compliments.
links_reviews_text: Shoulder straps are a little loose, they fell down quite a bit... but it's so amazing I'd rent it again and again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a transition from daytime to night time events while on vacation. Beautiful and TTS.
links_reviews_text: Pros: beautiful, vibrant colors, fits TTS. Cons: wrinkles easily if packed in a suitcase.

I love the look of this dress, it is just for a specific body type. It fit me everywhere and zipped up but completely smashed my 36C size chest. While it was smashing my boobs the shoulder straps were a little loose, so if I went up a size, it would be way too big. I would recommend for women who normally wear a size small or XS and have a 36B or smaller size chest.

links_reviews_title: Really cute dress, but ran large!
links_reviews_text: Really cute dress, but ran large!

links_reviews_title: Wore this on my birthday- love it!
links_reviews_text: Really flattering fit, got so many compliments

I'm obsessed with this dress! I wore it three times. It's long (tea length on me, I'm 5'6" and wore a small) and the bust area is almost too tight (I'm a 34B). I definitely couldn't have fit a bra under this, so plan accordingly. It's a luxurious summer dress because it's constructed so well and has lots of layers of linen in the skirt. The embroidery is beautiful. One of my fave rentals!

links_reviews_title: Very cute but BIG skirt area
links_reviews_text: Pretty, maybe a size down would be better but honestly the skirt is just so full it's fairly shapeless. But I got compliments even though my husband thought it looked a bit like a sack.
I'm about 27 weeks pregnant and got this in a medium to accommodate my baby belly. That was way too big! Otherwise, it is super cute.

links_reviews_title: Too small in bust area. Need to size up. Didn't get to wear. Will be renting the next size. Beautifu
links_reviews_text: Too small
Absolutely OBSESSED with this dress - so many compliments and great fit. I am normally a size small, but the XS fit great!
Straps kept falling down, but otherwise I loved this dress.

I was hoping for a true white linen dress to wear while touring Cartagena, but it's a yellowed white –like the color of an an old wedding dress. The chest was tight, the rest was loose. I ended us leaving this one at home due to the color.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was SO cute! Wore it to a day time party and it was perfect. It was right in the chest but I think it was complimentary that way. Super fun for the day and loved that it was long.
Top right and bottom shirt old fashioned.

links_reviews_title: My boyfriend's parents called it the "Matisse Dress."
links_reviews_text: Straps were a little loose, might have been better with a size down, but still very pretty!

Love this dress - it is more cream than white and will definitely require some good steaming out of the bag but once it's pressed it looks great. I have worn this same style in pink and found the pink dress to run very large while this one is much more true to size! I actually had to get help with the side zipper where as the pink dress I just stepped into without unzipping to get into it.

I liked this sweater, it's thick and warm. The colors are green and yellow more than just green. The fit isn't boxy, so if you size down it'll be more flattering. Nice weekend wear but nothing special about it.

Wore this sweater several times and enjoyed it. It's a fun departure from the more minimal staples in my closet. Sorry, I didn't take a good photo while wearing it and just had this random partial shot. :) Anyway, great quality and would rent again. It had a nice slightly over-sized fit.
It's baggy but that lets you wear a warm base layer underneath. Stand out wear the sweater with layers and avoid having to bring a jacket.

links_reviews_title: VERY soft, love it! Wore it to work and got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_text: Easy wear, medium heavyweight sweater.
Love the sweater!! Color is so fun. Got lots of compliments. It's warm and fits well. It does run larger. I'm between an XS and S and the XS was good!
Loved this sweater, definitely has an oversized fit. It was perfect for a comfy day of travel

links_reviews_title: Runs large and was stretched out.
links_reviews_text: The colors were so perfect and I love the material. Unfortunately was stretched out. Originally ordered a medium and it was too big so I rented the small. Small fit everywhere but the bottom due to being stretched out.

This was a great casual sweater for hanging outside in the fall. This sweater has a good weight to it, not too heavy but kept me warm. It's definitely an oversized look. If you are between a small and medium, get the small. I got a lot of compliments on the color and fun logo.
Cute sweater. It was very thick and bulky. I didn't like the way it fit, so I did not wear it.
I love this because i can wear it over my pajamas or to lounge in, but throw it on with jeans and it's a cute winter outfit. Perfect for everyday or to go shop around in.
This was a very warm sweater. I liked the color you can't really tell but there is some yellow mixed in with the green

Rented it as a seasonal item pre-Valentine's but would wear it hear round. It's thick but not too warm, holds its shape, boxy yet still flattering. Unique color. Wore with jeans and black boots as well as with black leggings. Would love to own it but it's pricey for an item that is memorable enough I can't wear it everyday :-).
Not a fan. Fun sweater but very unflattering. Wouldn't rent this again.
nice
It's a full cut sweater and was great! I wore it for a casual Christmas Eve party Size down if you want more form fitting.
Perfect fit and very warm
Cute sweater. A little itchy at the neck. Very warm and colorful. Taking it on a winter vacation.
This sweater was so comfortable and looked so great with a pair of jeans and flats. Super cute for everyday, would rent again!

I rented this at 9 months pregnant and had plenty of room to spare. It was comfy and only the tiniest bit itchy on my arms. The color is much more yellow in person (think tennis ball) but it was a fun standout piece for two days.
The color really stands out.
Although i only wore it once for a couple of hours, i could tell that this could have been one of my #1 sweaters in my closet that will last with me.
Didn't plan on it, but wore for tennis member guest event and of course the LOVE message was perfect. It runs big and is a long sweater on my frame. Enjoyed wearing.
Style was pretty long on me and it was itchy, especially at the neck. Cute style though!
I love a good oversized sweater but I got this in my usual size and it was way too big. If I get it again I'll definitely size down.
My go-to sweater for looking cute but cozy on every zoom call.

links_reviews_title: LOOOOVE a good oversized sweater! I lived in it!
links_reviews_text: I order an XL because I wanted it to be a super oversized sweater and it definitely fit that way. I wore it tucked into jeans as pictured, or would throw it on around the house. So comfortable. Got lots of compliments. The sleeves are long which I liked, but cuffing them is just as cute. Considering buying!!
obsessed with this sweater. I love the longer length and the large sleeves which are comfortable and drapey and magically not too long. Will wear at least 3 times, considering buying this one!
I can see how others would find it runs too large but if you love oversized sweaters, you'll love it!
My favorite tops are slouchy and oversized, so this piece immediately made it in my top ten favorite rentals. The material is quite thick, and great quality as well.
I was excited about this cute fall sweat but it's ENORMOUS! I'm usually a Medium/Large in sweaters and like things oversized, but I was drowning in this one.

links_reviews_title: It's not 100% cotton and it's huge
links_reviews_text: The description of this sweater says it's 100% cotton, then later on says it's a cotton-wool blend. I'm allergic to wool and hoping the cotton description was the accurate one, I rented this for working from home. It turned out to have wool in it and it made me itchy the second I put it on. It's also incredibly oversized. I'm usually a large and I'd order this in a small next time to get a slouchy but not swallow-me-whole look.

Oh man, returning this one is physically painful. This sweater IS huge as everyone says (I ordered a S), but I love oversized clothing so I loved this. I wore it constantly. I might still buy it. Note that because the shoulder seam is dropped (owing to the oversized fit) it's a little awkward to wear this under a coat.
It can be kind of itchy, but overall a very cute oversized sweeter! So comfy.
This sweater is great quality and incredibly versatile. Couldn't stop wearing it all week!
Yes, it's huge. But that's the best part. So cute with leggings and booties.

links_reviews_title: Very oversized but I like that about it. I may never send it back.
links_reviews_text: Looks good with leggings, jeans, or PJ shorts around the house. Oversized and cozy...I got tons of compliments which says a lot for a basic black and white striped sweater. A piece you can live in <3

I absolutely loved this sweater. It is supposed to run big. If that's not the look you're going for then size down - but I still think it will be big. My absolute favorite sweater I wish I could have kept it!
Love this sweater. Still thinking about it-- might buy
Huge! I got the M and it's basically to me knees and i have enough arm room to fit another two people. Great if wearing tights and wanting to lounge around but not actually going out in jeans.

links_reviews_title: Just another day out and about
links_reviews_text: The cut is great - just runs a little big. I'd go one size down an this is a great everyday sweater!

links_reviews_title: Cute, stylish sweater order size down
links_reviews_text: rented just for everyday use. Only two sizes available so I got the smaller one. Very glad I did. It's a little loose in the chest area so I wore a cami underneath. Some say it's itchy but I didn't think it was uncomfortably itchy. Overall cute and chic. Would get again.

I love the style of this sweater but it was a little itchy when wearing all day without anything under it. It also runs pretty big I had to safety pin in shut on top to keep it from flapping open all day.

I am petite and got the size XS/S. I need to wear an undershirt otherwise it would sag way past my bra. The wool felt itchy but not enough to stop me from wearing. It was overall baggy on me but fine to wear as a slouchy/comfy look. It's a beautiful camel color

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear this. It's so gappy and loose
links_reviews_text: I really wanted this to fit like the picture but unfortunately it's really baggy and comes apart to show your entire bra at the top. I am 25 weeks and all the extra material hung so strange, with my bump most things hang really nicely, it's almost like the cut is off. I really wish this had worked because the color is so beautiful.
Very comfortable, but boxy and less flattering on someone with a small middle and wider hips.

links_reviews_title: Depending on the bottom can be dressed down or up. Great for everyday
Rented this for casual friday at work with jeans and booties. Super cute.
links_reviews_text: The wrap portion opens up pretty significantly so you will probably have to wear a tank underneath :)

Great for a dressing it up for work or a brunch or evening out. Very comfortable and flattering. I did need to wear an undershirt since the v-neck is fluid but anticipated that prior to getting the shirt.

links_reviews_title: Super cute to wear for a casual date night (I paired with light jeans and cheetah booties)
links_reviews_text: Really cute, but a little bit itchy! If you have a longer torso I'd suggest sizing up, the length can hit a bit funny.
Love the fit, material Was not as soft as I expected but overall comfortable
Fit was boxy and long. Deep cross in the front and didn't look right with a cami underneath.

links_reviews_title: I was comfortable and warm in this.
links_reviews_text: This fit well for the most part. It was a little boxy.

links_reviews_title: Wore on casual friday to work and on weekend.
links_reviews_text: Great with jeans for nice fall look. Needs a cami underneath.
I got so many compliments on this sweater. I'm very tall and slim. This sweater was perfect for work and dates.

links_reviews_title: Nice light neutral sweater - just a bit scratchy
links_reviews_text: I thought this would be worse, just based on how the material felt when I took it out of the bag. It's pretty scratchy and rough. Miraculously, it felt OK when I put it on, and you do need to wear a camisole or something underneath anyway.

links_reviews_title: Unique! Can dress up or down & fit well even though I'm short.
links_reviews_text: A cute jumpsuit that can be worn more casually, as I did with combat boots to work, or… Dressed up with heels and sparkly jewelry. The drop shoulders make the sleeves look a little big. But, the rest of it fits great. For short people it's still short enough where it looks purposeful, not just weird. It was extremely comfortable… I did put a belt on the waist to give it more shape since I am short. I would definitely rent this again

Cute romper that I wore for work. I typically wear a size 8 but sometimes need a 10 because I have wider shoulders... I definitely did NOT need a 10 in this. Should have gotten the 8 as there was too much room in the top half. But I still got a lot of compliments from my coworkers! Pain to go to the bathroom though... You have to untie it at the waist and unzip it all the way to get it down.
The jumpsuit was fairly easy to wear. I liked the fabric. I thought ran slightly big.

Rent the Runway has made me a huge Kate Spade fan and this jumpsuit does not disappoint. Received so many compliments. Runs true to size and is great for petites as it's cropped. Wish it came in more prints and colors.

links_reviews_title: Cute but proportions off for my body
links_reviews_text: I love the print, style and feel of the fabric and the top drapes perfectly. However I feel like my backside has disappeared because the bottom drapes too low.

links_reviews_title: Stick with your true size, as this has a lot of room to give
links_reviews_text: I sized up out of fear of the pant suit not fitting. I wish I hadn't. There's lots of give on this dress. My true size would have been better. I still wore it! Love the fun fall print. Hated when I had to use the restroom.

links_reviews_title: so cute and comfortable, well fitting for long torso-ed figure
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a concert which ended up getting postponed due to COVID19. So I only got to try it on. I am super long torso-ed and the bottom didn't ride up too much. The fabric is super soft, lining was think enough to feel a little warm. Probably need a cami under. Pattern is really fun, could dress up for event or down for day time. Will def rent it again.
I wore this for Valentine's Day and it was flowy and flattering with pockets to boot. I would wear this again!
Worked just fine. A little bit big in the top
I fell in love with this right away. It is the perfect outfit for work. Cute, comfy and stylish. Only downside is having to unzip and pull off to use the restroom. I would rent again though.
A little big in the bust, you'll need to be okay with cleavage or wear a camisole. Not too long, which is usually my issue with jumpsuits. Great fabric and cute print.
Upper half is baggy, lower half feels too short. My friend said I looked like a fancy clown. Didn't work for me.
I thought this jumper was great. I hope to rent it again because I mainly wore it inside my house! I think it'd be a fun evening or daytime ensemble.
The print wasnt my style, but the fit was great and comfortable.

lot of extra fabric like other reviewers say. but well shaped. shoulder puffs need to sit on your shoulder so size down just for that. also not really great for winter as i sadly found out. very lightweight silky fabric that felt great but not outside
One of my favorite rentals ever. I always worry about jumpsuits being too tight in the butt and hips/thighs on me but this fit wonderfully. Lots of compliments, would rent again.

links_reviews_title: True to size but sleeves are too puffy
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work or a meal out. Overall it fit well and seemed true to size. Unfortunately, the bell/puffy sleeves were too big for me and unflattering. I returned without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Pretty - but didn't work for my hips.
links_reviews_text: Snug around my hips so I didn't wear. (I'm pear shaped, so it would probably be great for others)
Not a flattering cut and the pattern overwhelmed me, as well as too large overall.

links_reviews_title: Fun print and stitch at neckline prevents too much cleavage
links_reviews_text: Not as roomy through hips as I hoped, couldn't wear
This pattern was a bit bold and I needed a bodysuit underneath since the top part of the jumpsuit was a bit big. I wore this out with girlfriends and they thought it looked good.
Got lots of compliments, very comfortable and pretty. Great quality.

Really really wanted to love this, since the print is adorable. However, I think it was just too much fabric for my frame (I'm barely 5'3). I also really wished the neckline hadn't been so low because I had to wear a camisole underneath it to make it work-appropriate. Probably a better rental for events where you feel comfortable showing a lot of cleavage.
Wish I'd taken a photo of this one. It was too cute! The pattern/fabric is forgiving to any lumps and bumps. I wore my usual size and it was long enough in the torso! Tall ladies rejoice.

links_reviews_title: This outfit was comfortable and stylish.
links_reviews_text: The fit of this outfit ran a little bit larger than the true size. It was comfortable and beautiful at the same time. I loved wearing this outfit to brunch and for a day of shopping.

links_reviews_title: Love the bottom part but sleeves were too puffy.

links_reviews_text: Great outfit to work roam around a new city! Can be dressed up or even down! A vacation must.. so versatile!
Comfortable and easy to get in and out of. I just wish the pant legs were a little more tapered, the hem felt a little weird to me.

Wore in weather ranging from 50-90 degrees- put a turtleneck underneath, wore on the plane, and then threw on some jewelry and cute shoes to wear to a casual dinner. So cute & versatile. A little big on top since I'm short, but the legs hit right at the top of my shoes. S could've worked if it had to but XS was much better-fitting.
I loved this jumpsuit! Wore it to a Friendsgiving and even to work the next day. Can easily be dressed up with a nice jacket. Would definitely recommend if you're looking for a casual day look.

I was really hoping this would work as a everyday look but the top is enormous and the bottom fits but is on the short side. There was just no way to make it work. The problem that I see is the garment has no zipper, so the neckline and arm holes are very large. You get into the jumpsuit through the neck hole. That causes the bodice to be out of proportion to the bottom. I tried to style it with a shirt underneath but just didn't think it worked. Tall ladies, the pants will be cropped on you!
Loved this jumpsuit! Wore to a health & fitness event and it was upscale yet comfortable at the same time. Fit was flawless. Would be great for everyday wear too.

NWT. This jumpsuit is very cute. It was short-waisted (high-waisted?) on me so not too flattering on my apple shape but I wore w/ jackets and it was fine, easy Monday office wear. Wore a few times bc comfy.
Wore twice and it was super comfortable. Easy to use the restroom in too which is a plus. Only con is the pants don't have drawstring or ties at the bottom.

I wore this in the winter layered under a RTR sweater, but I would love to keep this jumpsuit for the summer! It's super comfortable and surprisingly fits well although jumpsuits can be tricky for me. It was a tiny bit of a crop leg on me since I am 5'9. Love the side stripe which makes it a piece that can be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: Excellent for everyday or jet setting!
links_reviews_text: This has become my go too outfit for travel. I pair it w/ a chunky scarf and sneakers. Super comfortable, loads of compliments, pretty much timeless. I ended up finding it online and buying it after having it for 3 months. 5 stars!
wore it on vacation to mexico. very cute. flattering neckline and length. Only issue is pant leg is wide cut, so I rolled and pinned to give it a more updated look.
Very cute, but far too big in the chest/arm straps for me.

This was super comfortable! It was a little less formal than I thought it would be, but that was okay. I also think it was a little loose - I usually wear a medium but I got this is in small and it definitely wasn’t tight.
It fits very well.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable enough to wear on a fall day with a coat.
links_reviews_text: It was okay but it laid a bit weird around the bust and shoulders so it called for pretty consistent tugging throughout the day.
Loved the comfortable fit of this jumpsuit, it was easy to wear but made so well and looked great.
Lightweight, better for warmer weather. Super comfortable and easy to accessorize.

links_reviews_title: i LOVED this jumpsuit - super comfortable, flattering and versatile.
links_reviews_text: Love this jumpsuit. Wore it once to work and once to a concert. Will absolutely be renting this again.
Wore for work event. Pretty twist on the typical pencil skirt

Skirt is great - pencil skirt like. Does not give - but not tight! I wore to work and then to a catholic school luncheon for my son. I wore black tops and did not tuck in but that is a possibility for someone who is comfortable with their midsection. Perfect for a body suit.

This skirt fit me perfectly! I am between a 6 and 8, but have a butt so I went with the 8 in this pencil skirt style. I had a little room in the waist, but the hips and butt for perfect. I loved the length and the slit made it easy to walk without showing too much. I wore it to a art event at my son's school and it was perfect!
Great piece. The fabric has a sheen without being tacky. The double side slits are fun combined with the large graphic floral print. Great fit but order up.
Very flattering skirt that I wore to a baby shower. Many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Best rental I've had with RTR in 5 years!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful skirt--tons of compliments. It's true to size and the fabric is gorgeous. It's versatile as well. Will rent this again!

Fit like a glove. My only critique is that the flowers aren't oriented the way they are on the model so just something to be aware of! I still loved wearing this skirt but don't expect it to look exactly like it does on the model :)

Cute skirt for work but was very large. I'm usually a 4/6 and ordered this in the 6 but it felt more like an 8. It was definitely too large to sit on the waist where it's meant to, but I didn't mind it sitting lower on my hips for just a one time wear at work. Fabric was lighter than I expected as well but beautiful pattern and color.
Gorgeous skirt. Perfect for formal to casual
The fabric doesn't give so I think that's why it is cut large but you should order at least one size down. It's so pretty though! Great for work!
Very elegant silk material skirt with a nice slit detail. Came new with tag on. However, it has zero stretch so if you are between sizes I would suggest size up.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful skirt. Size 2 would have been perfect fit

links_reviews_text: This is the first piece I have worn more than once and would buy. I wore with a fitted black tank and then a blousy black tank, and with sandals for work and appointments.
Had it for a month and only wore it once. For was kinda schlumpy, which was weird with the nice fabric.
The fit was spot on. I wore it a bit higher on the waist with a silk slightly cowl neck black long sleeve blouse, diamond studs and silver watch, and alexandre Birman black velvet pointy toe pumps.
Very attractive skirt and fit very well

links_reviews_title: Too big. Nice material, but too large to wear.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear it - it was too big in the hips and waist.
I had tons of compliments --ran a bit large. Will rent again.
I wore this for a work party and it was perfect. It's a very flattering skirt and the pattern is beautiful
I'm super tall so didn't work for me - too short.
The fit around the waist was perfect, but the wider fit at the bottom made this look more like an A line skirt. I felt a little frumpy in it.
Beautiful
While this skirt technically fit, the cut itself was unforgiving and accentuated my stomach. Between that and the somewhat shiny fabric, I didn't wear this.
I was a little uncomforable with the double splits but it's still a fun piece to rent
I rented this for my formal work environment but it was very tight and would not have been comfortable to wear all day
Pretty skirt. Weight and fabric were nice. However, it runs very very big, particularly in the hips. I was swimming in the size 0. It looked ridiculous, could not wear.
The material is a bit heavy which makes it nice for the winter

links_reviews_title: Pretty sweater details for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: This sweater was mostly TTS but rather short/cropped, so I wore it with a black tank top underneath. Very fitted and a heavier weight so it'll be warm enough for cold weather. I loved the sparkly black flower details!
Wore this PG sweater during a brunch with a friend. Really like the vibrant royal blue color! Cute embellishments too! Perfect sweater for a cool day!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Color for dark winter days!
links_reviews_text: This sweater is beautiful--color, texture and fit. I was concerned that the trim would lay odd around the bust line , but it seems to have been designed carefully. I wore it with tapered black slacks and low boots. I love color and so this was a big win. Compliments from a number of people. I'm a size 14 and it wasvery flattering.

links_reviews_title: Comfy fall sweater with a lil sparkle
links_reviews_text: Rented this as an unlimited selection for work. The blue is really vibrant in person. The sweater is thick but not bulky. A solid selection for everyday wear.
Fitted but not tight. Nice material. Thinner so can fit under a blazer for work. Nice color
Beads were falling off

links_reviews_title: Did not wear it due to temperature.
links_reviews_text: Great color. I ended up not wearing it because the weather was too warm to wear a sweater the day of the event. The fit was a little snug for my liking. I wore the pink version of this sweater which has a little different cut, and that one worked out better for me.

This sweater is extremely pretty, but I didn't enjoy wearing it because was so tight and hot. I usually wear XS but the small was very tight, even around my arms. Also, the sequins were all bunched together in a tight roll. Another reviewer said she spent time unrolling the sequins, but I was afraid to damage the sweater so I didn't mess with them.
The sweater was a bit short, but love the detail.
This sweater is a really beautiful shade of blue. The yarn has held up well to repeated dry cleanings. I would recommend going up a size. The M fit me well when I generally wear a S or 4.

links_reviews_title: Too tight even after sizing up and too short, my belly would hang out if I didnt have a slip
links_reviews_text: Too tight, too short
Wore this sweater out to a nice dinner with friends. It is so comfortable and made me feel wonderful. The color is a rich, beautiful blue. I paired it with black pants and black flats.
would rent again but in medium
I loved the color and the design was nice. I'm glad I got a large. I'm usually medium but I am 34DD so i needed the room up top. It was still fitted, not big or baggy. Definitely runs on small size.
Pretty color, looks nice with black bottoms. Worn to work ... wish it was an inch or two longer.
LOVED this and got so many compliments!!! It runs small so the medium fit me perfectly (5'4, 125lbs)

links_reviews_title: Cute but runs a bit small
links_reviews_text: Great blue color, and the detail is cute. It just runs a bit smaller than expected and is a little shorter than I like.
It fits great. Just not as soft as I would like. Fabric (I'm sensitive) is a little rough.
Fit was good
Wore several times on vacation to Zurich over thanksgiving. Color is bright and bold, and the embellishments make it a little more special.
Medium fit perfectly. Sleeves were just the right length. The torso is a bit short though - I found my bellybutton was being exposed every time I adjusted my hair clips, etc. Still, a great top.
Really tiny & short - couldn't wear it.
Will try in a larger size bc its beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Boost your sweater game with this one
links_reviews_text: Great blue color and sequin detail. Comfortable and garment was in great condition. The size S was fitted without being snug and was long enough for me to tuck into the skirt with which I paired it. I recommend and will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Sweater, Some Pilling on the Sleeves
links_reviews_text: This sweater requires a little bit of work to spread out the sequins- it comes with the sequins all bunched up, but it looks gorgeous when they're all spread out. It's a good weight, but slightly itchy. Be warned that it's slightly cropped.

links_reviews_title: Perfect pop of color for fall
links_reviews_text: Brilliant color and the sequin accents add a fun pop to a casual sweater
I should just buy this dress. I love it sooo much! This is the second time I've rented this and every time I keep it for 2 weeks to fit it into as many things I can wear it to!
Comfortable and flattering.
I love this dress and got a lot of compliments on it. Very flattering. It is very low cut though, wore it to the office once and that won't be happening again!

The length and long sleeves make this perfect for the office and fun for a night out. I took the recommendations and sized down. Fit great! I always feel the need for a cami when wearing a wrap style dress to work so busty ladies be ware. The deep maroon color gave a classic leopard print an extra pop. Comfortable and east to wear!
Cute fall print, nice quality, but the puffed sleeves are way too baggy - feel like I'm playing dress up in this :/
Fits well. Needed to put a safety pin on top to make it appropriate for my chest. The sleeves are a bit Victorian for my taste.

links_reviews_title: Good option for business casual workplace
links_reviews_text: I rented this for work, on a day where I was not meeting with any clients or outside stakeholders. I'm a 32D bust; the top is NSFW if you don't wear a cami or bandeau underneath. Material is very thin, so I would also not wear this is I had to spend a lot of time outdoors in winter weather. Looks cute with black fishnets and booties. Could be tight in the shoulders if you are broad.

Cute dress! It's not super secure, I had to pin it in a few places to keep it from flapping open. It's not easy to tell in the photo, but the sleeves billow out a little towards the shoulders and look really pretty. I was able to style this a few ways, it's definitely versatile and I would recommend it!
This dress can be dressed up or down. I wore it to work with a blazer and tall black boots. Comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Too long and too big in the chest area
links_reviews_text: Too long for shorter task and the wrap part is too big, even for larger chest sizes! Bummed because it looked so cute.
This dress is super cute but is not lined. I wore to work and had to safety pin the chest as it was definitely quite revealing.

links_reviews_title: Very low cut didn't work for me
links_reviews_text: I don't love the look of a cami/tank under wrap dresses and this definitely would have required that or some tape/pins. Pass!
Wore it once to work but I am a little broad across chest ant it wanted to pop open in front all day long. Meh.
I’m tall so this worked great for me. Also for a wrap dress it stayed put. I absolutely wanted to buy it.
this dress is so dang cute, it's perfect for Fall. I wore it twice, once for work and another for personal use. but needed tape for cleavage area.

I loved this dress, and I got so many compliments. I liked the sleeves that some have complained about. It was very low cut, so I had to pin the top. It's also a true wrap dress, so you have to be careful about exposing too much leg. I would love to own this dress--it's beautiful. It's a great weight for fall, and the colors are amazing! I'm not a leopard print person, but this one was very classy!
way, way too small across bust. couldn't wear.

Overall, this was a nice dress. I really like the pattern and color, but the puff sleeves were too much for me. I am a pretty petite woman and I just felt like they took over the whole look. If you are into sleeve details, then this is a perfect dress!
Good fit. Comfortable wrap dress!

links_reviews_title: Not the best quality, but trendy for this fall
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a weekend dinner with friends and it worked out just fine. I'm 8 months pregnant and ordered my normal size, so I wore a black bodysuit underneath to make the tight wrap work. I was surprised by how worn the fabric looked, considering this is a relatively new piece to RTR. But it held up nicely throughout the day and received several compliments. Perfectly fine fall dress for a day.
Did not fit well across my chest (too small). The length was great and I really liked the bell sleeves.

Loved the print of this dress and got it as an option for outdoor fall family photos. Usually wrap dresses look great on my hourglass figure, but this dress made me look two sizes bigger from the hips down.

I thought this would be cute but I felt like an old lady in it. I didn't like the puffy sleeves or the length. I tried twice to wear to work but changed my outfit both times. I don't know if it's the color but I never wore this dress.
TTS, very comfortable and cute wrap dress. Would definitely rent again!
Comfy dress at the office and for a long flight
Print/fabric were fine, shoulders were tight. Didn't wear

links_reviews_title: Great alternative to standard animal print.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It is lightweights so it was great for the transition to fall. I loved the red background of the print. Really pretty colors and not so in your face animal print. I received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Favorite of this order- considered buying
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, it was so so cute and I got a ton of compliments in it.
Loved this cropped sweater! The sleeves and detailed slits by the wrist were so cute. Comfy and warm and not scratchy at all. Not usually a pink person but loved this!
Great, cropped sweater for date night out! The fit was very flattering with high waisted jeans. Only con-The sleeves were slightly snug. Was not itchy at all and kept me mildly warm.

So, I am a usual size 4-6. I ordered the L bc it was the only available size. It was OK fit but I would have liked it better in a S or M. Also, it's wool/cashmere which I normally do not wear. I didn't check prior, but it's super cute and would have worn it everyday otherwise. I'm 6' tall about 150lbs. Great with Levi's rib cage jeans. As shown

LOVE this sweet little sweater! It really grew on me too the more I wore it so much so that I wore it 3 days in a row! Perfect for all 3 days-lunch date and errands, church, and work! I have a short waist so this hit me just right for any style of pants, but average-long torsos should plan on high-waisted pants. Will rent again!
Loved this sweater. Received lots of compliments. I am 5' and it was Fine in length but if you're taller it may show your belly.

Never in my life would I see this on a hanger and try it on. That being said, I would buy this sweater!! It was so comfy and cute. It's a bit of a crop but looked really cute with a pair of high waisted Lulus. I received many compliments on this sweater it's so cute without being juvenile. It did fit very large, and was boxy but somehow it worked.
Like the other reviews have said, this is a cropped sweater so wear high waisted pants if you intend to wear to work. Otherwise such a dreamy and beautiful sweater! I will likely rent again!

So so so obsessed. Please rent this. I got so many compliments and loved the color and the fit. It is a little cropped so beware if that's not your thing. Hit just around my bellow button with arms down. For more reviews head to my RTR highlight on Instagram and feel free to DM me any questions @leahgay

Perfect for a fall east coast trip! Although I should have sized up for my height. S made it definitely crop. I wore a cami underneath anyways but would have been nice to feel more comfortable with a M. Great rental bc the design it bright and then once you tire of it, you can send it back!

This sweater is super cute, and has a lot of details that I loved. The slit in the cuff made it easy to roll, the ruffle at the sleeve was flirty and fun, the embroidery was cute and the color was great. Only thing I didn't love was the length. It was very cropped so I threw it over a Derek lam 10 Crosby that matched in color! Got lots of compliments!
I love this sweater. the fit was so flattering get and the details were very feminine.
The color and details of this sweater are too cute. It’s great for late summer transitioning into fall. I’ve worn it many times and always get compliments. Debating buying it!
Wanted to love it, but it is so short. Just covered my boobs. Great material and color.

links_reviews_title: A cute crop sweater- may not be appropriate for work!
links_reviews_text: This was super comfy!!! It was a little worn out but not too noticeable. Loved the color!
Very cute design with a pop pink color. Definitely an eye catching piece. The sweater is not harsh to wear. This cut will suit girl with flat tummy better. Love it!
Very cute pink sweater with unique arm details. Loved the color and cropped fit. Also very soft. Looks great with jeans or leggings.

I love this sweater!! I've worn it several times & always receive compliments. It's cute but not cutesy, if that makes any sense. Love the color and ruffle detail on the sleeves. It is a bit cropped, but is a great go to with jeans!
This was one of my first rentals - intended to pair it with jeans but it looked too good with the leather pants I rented too. Perfect for a girls dinner. It's loose fitting a little cropped.

links_reviews_title: Someone Venmo me so I can BUY this sweater!!!
links_reviews_text: This sweater is so fun, perfect transitional piece for winter to spring (or a nice "wishful thinking" top for us northeasterners, ugh). I have worn it probably 10 times and still can't give it back. I'm 5'10 and I definitely prefer wearing it with high rise denim as it is a slightly cropped sweater.
This sweater warrants compliments and is equally comfortable and flattering. I loved this even on a tropical vacation and over the winter!
Very cute sweater - the sweater leans more toward lavender pink in person. It is very cropped so it works for me as I'm short but with those with longer torsos may want to size up.
Loved this sweater! Perfect for spring. It is cropped so I wore a black cami underneath to wear it to work and got lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: The cutest- but somehow not TOO cute
links_reviews_text: Seriously my favorite sweater. So soft, sweet but not too cutesy, and the prettiest color. I do NOT want to send it back.
This top paired well with my high waisted jeans because I have a long torso
Cute details!
I wore this a couple times. Easy with jeans. The fabric is soft so I wanted to wear it. I wish I could keep it. It does run a little short

links_reviews_title: Super cute & received lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Oversized fit

links_reviews_title: Got a lot of compliments but it looked very worn
links_reviews_text: I would have kept this for a longer time because it was so cute, girly and different, however it looked very worn. Pilly and used.
This sweater looked gigantic on me. I couldnt wear it, it was a bit too short but the arms and body were huge. It made me look very large.

I have a short torso so thought I could get away with this cropped sweater. Still wore but felt a little silly as I am too old for cropped tops. Barely hit the top of my high waisted jeans. But if cropped tops are your thing I highly recommend! Super cute design, loved the sleeves, several compliments.

I received so many compliments on the couple of times I wore this sweater. It's a nice weight (not too thin, but not too bulky), the color and print are cute, and the ruffles on the sleeves make it even cuter. Comfy, too!
Such a cute sweater! It is cropped in the front but not too short. It's perfect for a night out — did have to roll sleeves tho bc they were long
I didn't end up wearing bc it was surprisingly warm the NYC March weekend I rented this for but it's a really cute sweater - very very warm piece.

Great everyday sweater, runs pretty cropped but doable with high-waisted pants. I paired it with a pair of plaid pants and black boots with a navy faux fur jacket (not pictured). I got so many compliments! Highly recommend for a casual everyday look.
I wore this to class and out to dinner a few times. I got so many compliments!
Very feminine, fun sweater! PINK!

links_reviews_title: LOVED IT! So comfortable and I got a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Perfectly. And it is soft.
Fit great! Super comfort. Loved it and wore it all weekend. Nice and worm too!!!!
Received lots of compliments. Definitely cropped and needs a higher rise jean.
adorable color and sweater. so many compliments and so much fun to wear! would rent again

The buttons did not pucker, the shirt was true to size! Light weight and comfortable. I however will not rent again, some of the pictures were not very flattering, empire waist I forgot doesn't usually work for me. I looked like the one expecting, sigh, I wore it to a baby shower. I wore it with black pants, the flowers are clearly navy if you look closely, I hope no one looked closely. I wish it was a little longer, but that probably would definitely have made it look maternity, I just cannot win. Color was beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Great top to dress up jeans
links_reviews_text: Received lots of compliments! Fits true to size.

This fit quite large on me even though I rented an xs. I didn't end up wearing it bc I felt like it didn't really look great on me. I was hoping the band around the high waist would have defined my waist, but it was just too loose.

links_reviews_title: Loved this shirt for Valentine's day so much that I wore it to work too!
links_reviews_text: So flattering and comfy. I needed a camisole to wear this to work, but it made me feel festive and put together.

This was a great everyday top. I love the color and that it's casual yet flirty. It was just a little short and a little large on top on me (I'm 5' 6"), so I wore a cami underneath just in case I raised my arms or had to bend over for anything. I would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Very cute and perfect for a casual event, like a birthday or family dinner.

links_reviews_text: Too small and barely fit over my bust which made the arms at the top tight. If the bust had more room, and it was longer (not a midriff), I would have really loved it.

This shirt is so pretty and the color is great, but I couldn't wear it due to it being too revealing in the bust as well as too small. In order to fit, I had to unbutton the top button, which made it too revealing.
Not too tight or loose around the waist

links_reviews_title: My friend narrowed while I had it
links_reviews_text: I wore this on a Friday to dinner with friends and one of my friends then narrowed it for brunch that Sunday because she loved it! It fit us both well and she is slightly smaller then I am. This looks good on all body types and the color is amazing!
Loved it
did not love how this fit me. It seemed to be the correct size, but it was pretty short and boxy.
Sleeves were slightly short but I have long arms. Easy to wear and lovely
Would buy
TTS. Wore twice with jeans and mules. Super cute and comfy. Recommend!
I am usually a size 16 and ordered an XXL just to be safe. While it fit fine, it was crazy short, like practically a crop top. It looked too silly to wear.
Phenomenal bag. Would have purchased but too pricey.
Couldn't lift my arms and was so unflattering from side view, bummed.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and classy for work
links_reviews_text: If you have a big bust then I would size up. It is very small up top making it hard to zip. I was able to make it work but I wouldn't say it was very comfortable being that tight.

I wore this dress to give an important presentation and I felt like I was wearing Wonder Woman armor (in the best way possible). It was a perfect fit, and the seaming was very flattering. It would have been a tad bit too short for me without tights, but since it's freezing outside, that's no big deal!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work in the cooler seasons
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. I'm between a 10 and 12 dress, I was able to wear the 10 but didn't have any room to spare. Great material, flattering cut - even for my square frame! I will likely rent again.

Fit is small - I'm between a 2/4 and the 4 fit perfect. Material is thick and seaming detail is beautiful. However, this dress is uncomfortable for all day workwear. Zipper down the back cut my thighs while I was sitting. I couldnt raise my arms in the sleeves (and was barely able to zip myself in). The neck is high and felt like it was choking me.

I rented this for work. I liked the color and the idea of this dress, but I didn't love the fit or the fabric. The fit was a little snug in the shoulders and the fabric was very thick and not very stretchy, so it was tough to lift my arms up. The waist was also a bit loose (probably because I have a long torso)
large around waist

I wanted to love this dress even after the other 'meh' reviews. It's a great color, the length is great, and it's just form fitting enough to be chic. My only complaint is the style doesn't allow a lot of movement in the shoulders. I felt like I couldn't raise my arms that high and was afraid I would damage the dress. I wish it had worked out cuz I loved the zip detail down the back!

links_reviews_title: Tight and loose all at the same time!
links_reviews_text: Do not rent this if you have an hourglass figure or a long torso. The waist fell way too high so it was tight across my lower rib cage and very baggy over my stomach. Sad it didn't fit at all because it looked cute in the pictures.

links_reviews_title: Too short and tight for work.
links_reviews_text: Very tight through the arms and on the bottom half.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but thick material and didn't fit right

links_reviews_text: As others have mentioned, this dress runs small especially on top and I am not a busty woman either. It is a thick material which makes it a good fall/winter dress. I'd recommend going a size up.
Toccin is becoming one of my favorite workwear brands. The fabric is so dreamy!
Great fit but there is no way to wear this to work and not look like you are applying to work for Mr Gray. 50 Shades of stitching made it look like erect nipples.

links_reviews_title: Love the color, which it was slightly bigger.
links_reviews_text: The tailoring was great. It was a smidge too tight in the waist, so I had to wear some extra tight spanx to supplement.
Great material. It's most definitely form fitting and very flattering but it runs small. If you are 5'9 and taller, it's going to be on the shorter side for work.

Heavy fabric and lined. Well-tailored with some detailed stitching on the side but the true zinger is the large zipper in the back that runs from the top to the bottom. Lots and lots of compliments on this dress. Would wear it again.

links_reviews_title: My boyfriend really liked this dress on me
links_reviews_text: This dress looked smashing. I am 34B, weighing 129 lbs, and the size 8 just fit with enough comfort without being too snug. The material is thick. I did not have the trouble with stiff arms that other reviewers reported. I guess the fit of this dress works best for smaller-chested women. The lower zipper on the one I got was a bit stiff to operate, which became an issue when using the bathroom, but that may be an individual dress issue, and in the end all was fine.
Absolutely loved this dress. Perfect for work and for going out for a nice dinner afterwards!
Great dress used for professional photos

links_reviews_title: This dress was excellent quality and fit. A little snug in the arms.
links_reviews_text: Couldn't lift my arms above my shoulders but don't do much of that in my office job. I felt sharp and confident wearing this dress.
Tight all over. Fabric is really thick...good for cooler weather. Looked nice, wished I could fit. I may try a size up.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering with nice thick fabric - no spanx required
links_reviews_text: Cute every day dress. Very snug and body con without being immodest.

This dress is sewn in a way where it appears as if you have large nipples poking through the fabric. In addition, although the dress fit, it was sewn in a way where I couldn't raise my arms. It's as if it were sewn to minimize any arm movement. Maybe I got a bad dress. This was not an issue of the dress being too small.

For reference I'm 5'10. This dress is cut for someone shorter. While it fit in the chest/shoulders, the waist hit too high and the hips flared out at my natural waist making it very unflattering. Sizing up would've been too baggy elsewhere, so this was a no-go for me!
This was great for work but it definitely is right. I could barely lift my arms all day. Very thick- great for fall and conservative for a professional work environment.

links_reviews_title: Better for Straight and Narrow Body Types
links_reviews_text: Thick fabric with very little stretch. As someone with a long torso, small waist, and curves, the fit was *way* off: it had ncan't-lift-my-arms-narrow shoulders and was tight in the chest and hips, yet the structured and fitted waist fabric—which looked pretty on the hanger—was too big on me.
Rented my usual size but barely got these on, would have been more comfortable in a size up
I would wear these over and over again!! High rise fit, great silhouette and amazinggg blue color. Perfect for fall! They did run a little big but still looked great! Was very hard to give them back

I love RE/DONE jeans and have had no trouble with their other size 32R jeans but these ran so small - I was unable to wear them. Such a bummer. I was so excited for a black version of my favorite jeans!
I was looking for a new denim style and loved the look of these. In almost all brands I'm a 29. I couldn't even get these buttoned. There's no give or stretch and they're heavy.

The sizing for these pants seems very inconsistent. I am normally a 28/29 and went with the 28 based on a couple reviews suggesting to size down. I could not even get the pants on beyond my legs. My roommate, who is a size 26, could not get a single button fastened. I wish they would have worked because they are really cute.

links_reviews_title: Runs super small but wish they fit me!
links_reviews_text: I went with one size up and still can’t get them on. I wish I could though because they look adorable. Oh well
Love the raw hem. You'll like these jeans if you go into renting 1) sizing up 2) expecting rigid denim
Run very small. These fit more like a 25/26

links_reviews_title: Great classic black jeans with a little edgy vibe
links_reviews_text: Fits a bit smaller, not much stretch
Definitely size up, but these were great. Pretty significant crop. Buttons instead of zipper. Very cute black jeans!

I'm a 27 and sized up to 28 and these were SO flattering. At first you may panic because when you put them on that feel very tight but once you wiggle a little bit they slip right on and are very comfortable. They hold everything in place without being too tight!
Runs about a half size too small.

links_reviews_title: Still Looking for RTR Jeans that Fit
links_reviews_text: Have yet to find a good fit on any of the RTR jeans I have rented. This pair seemed to have what I wanted: NOT skinny jeans, high rise, black denim, raw hem but could not shimmy them up my hips so back to RTR they went. Could try sizing up but will probably just keep looking!
These jeans have no stretch and are very small in size. Make sure to go up possibly 2 sizes.

I was weary when I ordered these that they would be too small (as the reviews suggested) but they fit very true to size. I usually fluctuate between 28-29 in jeans and I wore the 28. I do like jeans to fit snug, and these were just right. They're not completely raw denim, so they have a bit of stretch to them. I've got short legs, and these hit my ankle in the perfect spot to show off booties! I also love that they're a jet black and not faded at all.
These were so tiny I couldn't button them. I'm usually a 24 and this size was way too tight
Im always a 25 or even a 24 in re/done. These size 25 I could barely get on!!
I'm usually 26 or 27. Rented 26. Barely got over thighs and couldn't close at all. One size up MIGHT have fit.

links_reviews_title: Had to return because it's too small. Typically a 27 and couldn't button the buttons.
links_reviews_text: Definitely size 2 sizes up. Hurts the ego but I think I would have liked if I did that :)
Super cute, but couldn't get these past mid thigh. I usually wear a 25 or 26, and these were more like a 23/24. Very stiff, no stretch. Unfortunately, I could not wear them due to the sizing.
could barely get over my butt. huge bummer because these are a clean and beautiful pair of jeans.

links_reviews_title: Too small, but would have been cute
links_reviews_text: No stretch, so they were too tight to wear
Love the look of these jeans, but they run very small. I am normally a 25 and could barely pull these up all the way, let alone try to button them.
Need to go up a size

First off the jeans were tight. I managed to close them but couldn't walk from how tight they were. I'm pretty sure they might stretch as the day goes by but I wasn't going to risk my insides being squished and moved around to prove that.
accidentally had the skirt on backwards here - but was extremely comfortable and flattering. highly recommend renting with the matching sweater.
So many compliments on this skirt! Beautiful silhouette and perfect for work. I do caution that it's a little small and a little itchy
Loved this skirt. Lines were amazing. Is there such a thing as a skirt worth $700+? Absolutely not. But this skirt was pretty amazing.

I rented a MR but if I ever rent this again I'm going to try the SR. I REALLY wish there was a petite version because the length is hard to work with--I had to fold the waist band over to achieve the correct length. It's a very warm skirt, I imagine pairing it with the sweater would be VERY warm.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful material and style, but waistline was impossible!
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately the super tight waistline made it too curvy and sexy for work. I rented XS but could not wear it.

Got more like a M than a L, which tracks for this brand. Beautiful quality and cool mix. Warm, which was lovely for winter. Hard to match because the knot is so deep in color and tight in gauge, so had to be selective about options, but I notice variations that others may not. Felt stylish but very cozy.
The skirt is super cute, but the shape is unforgiving. It doesn't have any structure built in, so it clings everywhere. I was unable to position the wide waist band to be flattering.

It's cute! The olive, navy, and grey all complement each other. While the cut is fairly flattering, the contrast between the thick fabric on the waistband and the thinner fabric of the rest of the skirt looks a little...off over the stomach. The fabric is also a bit itchy, but I think the elasticity makes up for it in comfort.

Unique, warm, trendy, and so comfortable. I saw other reviews said it was warm which I figured relative to other skirts, but this was seriously like getting to wear a blanket to work. So perfect for cold January days in the office!

links_reviews_title: So gorgeous but small and tight in the waist
links_reviews_text: When I first received the skirt I thought that I would not be able to fit into it, it looked like an XXS. However it was easy to fit into and it conformed to my body perfectly. It's very nice and warm. However, beware, even with all that stretch it is tight in the waist. I was happy to take it off at the end of the day. I would definitely recommend it otherwise. Maybe size up for comfort?
Kind of tight but the thick material sucks you in. I loved this skirt for work with a fitted black sweater.
Nice piece for work. Paired it with olive velvet blazer and booties.
It runs small so size up. Very flattering fit.

links_reviews_title: Fits comfortably and very high quality, warm wool. Easy to wear and great looking.
links_reviews_text: Pull-on skirt made of medium weight, stretchy wool. Below knee, with slit detail that is not revealing. Fits close to body so may show lines and will fit and show tummy -- wear longer sweater to cover that if you need to.
I rented with the matching top. There's a nice ruffle down the side, which makes is a bit awkward to tuck in. Very, very warm. Almost too warm if you wear tights and boots with it.

links_reviews_title: Wasn't flattering at the waistline but loved the back.
links_reviews_text: If you're straight up and down or dont have a thin waist, I'd skip this as it doesn't do you any favors with the thick babd around your midsection. The back of the skirt is cute though!
This was great with black pants for a work dinner. It felt professional but still stylish. It does not have a ton of shape but looks cute tucked in.
Perfect work top. Went perfect with black pants. Love the print and material.

links_reviews_title: Liked it! Just not the most flattering
links_reviews_text: I liked it but it is not made for large breasts. It only looked good from the side lol it was not as flattering from the front.
The one side of the shirt is very very short, even with high waisted pants my belly would've been out so I wore cami underneath and jacket over, but was unable to remove the jacket

I wore this to work and got some complements. I am on the fence about it because the cut runs a bit high above the waist. I was self conscious about my tummy bulging through the light fabric, but nobody but me probably noticed.

links_reviews_title: Cute top but UUUGH the buttons!!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was pretty nice, although the sleeves could have been a hair longer. The buttons were so difficult to work with & ruined the shirt for me. I had to recruit help from my fiancé and by the time I was actually dressed we both hated the shirt.

links_reviews_title: I wore it to work. Very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Shirt is very pretty.
I love the shirt and material, but if you have a larger belly it's not flattering and rides up easily.
Ordered a size bigger than my normal and still was too small.
Got a ton of compliments on this top except it pulls oddly to the side so I feel like it's consistently not fitting right. Luckily it's adorable on, covers my (large) chest and Has fun sleeves!

links_reviews_title: Not great if you have a long torso
links_reviews_text: This doesn't hit right for a long torso lady like me. Black and white striping is also not ideal if you have any sensitivity to light or texture. Not my fave.
The sleeves were very long and the shape of the shirt was just weird.

links_reviews_title: nice blouse for dinner out or date night
links_reviews_text: runs big

I absolutely loved this top. It is very comfortable, although (like many other reviewers have shared), the top is asymmetrical-- so one side is super short. This design feature didn't bother me at all as I wear cami's anyway. Love it!

Love this material. I'm 5'8 and the shorter side of the blouse did not even come down to my waistband. I really wish it had been a tad longer because I could not wear it due to skin showing. I usually wear a small and ordered a M based on the reviews but still too short.

links_reviews_title: Great work top, but def is short on one side
links_reviews_text: So many compliments on this top. I felt pulled together, cute, and appropriate for work. It definitely is short on one side like other reviewers said. I wore high waisted pants and just tried not to raise my arms when I was at work :-)

I rented this for work and absolutely loved it! The lines are perfect for conservatively accentuating your figure, while still remaining professional. I'm 5'10 with long arms, but these sleeves were the perfect fit. I will absolutely rent this again, if not buy it!

links_reviews_title: Flattering wrap with unusual sleeve length
links_reviews_text: The wrap style was flattering. I wore the shirt with a high waisted black pencil skirt. The length of the sleeves was not ideal.
This top lays so beautifully! Very well made and gorgeous details. The buttons are a little tedious but so worth it!

links_reviews_title: It was just for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little odd, it seemed I had to keep twisting the waist to keep it straight, but then the top seemed to bunch. It may have just been that the sewing was a little off. Otherwise, it was a cute style and blouse.
Best worn with skinny pants without pockets. Button in front kept everything hidden. Very nice!

links_reviews_title: Wore it as my pirate shirt for my Halloween costume so the style was perfect for that event!
links_reviews_text: The fit is TTS but the one side is really short which for normal wear probably would have bothered me.

links_reviews_title: Lopsided cut is awkward. Longer in front than rear
links_reviews_text: Lopsided cut is awkward. Longer in front than rear. It's ok, nothing earth shattering.

I rented for work. Pros - The snap closure at chest is a great feature, very flattering cut that was simple but elegant to pair with stretch cropped pants. The cuff detail further elevates the look. Cons - the V kept sliding off-center, and would even go so far one way that my lace camisole would show. Not a good look for a professional environment. From the photo, this appeared to me to be a knit cotton. It is actually a sheer synthetic.

links_reviews_title: Fit was very flattering for a smaller chest.
links_reviews_text: I have longer arms and average torso and it fit perfectly. Will be adding this to the permanent rotation

This shirt did not fit like the girl in the picture at all. I'm 5'9' and the bottom of the shirt was at the top of my jeans, it just didn't lay as nicely either. It was super cute and had nice button details- which could be annoying if you needed to adjust them as a previous reviewer had mentioned. If it had been longer or perhaps accommodated my bust better than it would have been a great shirt.

links_reviews_title: Flattering, comfortable, stylish option for work.
links_reviews_text: Really enjoyed wearing this top. It fit well, looked nice, and was comfortable. I wore a black tank top under it which with the clasp in the front, made it appropriate for work (otherwise there could be some cleavage, which is for another time!)

links_reviews_title: The shirt is flattering, the pattern is nice. It looks great.
links_reviews_text: The shirt has buttons on the left side and because I'm a little wider in the shoulders it was difficult to get on, and the loops where the buttons went in were really tight so it was hard to get the buttons in and out.

links_reviews_title: I wore it on a family trip with some jeans and I looked classy
links_reviews_text: Flattering on my curves
Very long arms, but small everywhere else.
a bit big for my frame..

Fantastic blouse with a nice fit even with a large bust. Unfortunately, the cuffs make it impractical for work or dining. Apparently my arms are significantly shorter than the model's (as is the rest of me), and the cuff covered my entire hand. If not for the cuffs I would buy it.
This shirt fit really well, but the short side showed a bit of skin, even with relatively high waisted pants. So just be aware. Still an excellent item and I got lots of complements.

Tons of compliments on this very smart work dress. If your curvy like me you may want to size up, otherwise it hugs everything and can ride up as you walk. The neckline is very low and showed a lot of cleavage. I wore a black undergarment to help along with a blazer to deflect all the curve hugging. If you have a more lax work environment it's perfect and may not need a blazer like I did.
I sized up on this dress and I'm glad I did. Although at the end of the day it seemed like it had stretched out a bit. It was a great fit and curve bigger.

I rented this for work and it was perfect. It hugged the curves in all the right ways. It is conservative, yet still sexy. It zips in the back and the front buttons are just for show. The bottom button has come apart on the dress I got, but it didn't change the look. This was one of my favorite work rentals to date!
Great fit and cut

This dress was comfortable when worn in the winter months. It fit perfectly on the chest, waist and hips. It was a little large on me in the shoulder area. I am a 34C, 145lbs and toggle between a 6-8. I got lots of compliments all day and felt great. I would rent it again.
Perfect length, flattering fit; quality material. A little too low for work without camisole. Overall unique work dress; a little loose fitting, but still great. Worth the rental!

links_reviews_title: Not great for petites but so well made
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much, it felt like amazing material and looked so good on, the problem was that at 4'11 the V neck was just too low, when I pulled it up the shoulders sat too high so I felt too exposed in work

I LOVE this dress!!! True to size, I'm almost always a a size 10! I love it. It's perfect for work. The material is thick and perfect for the fall and winter but honestly I love this so much I would wear it year round. I was nervous at first because there weren't many reviews, but I'm so glad ai picked this!!

You can't tell from the picture, but this is a nice thick material that is brown and black. I felt a little 1980s or 90s (like if I was wearing my mom's dress!), but I loved. It's a little bit reaching in the chest, but not so much you need to wear a camisole.

This dress fit perfectly! It's definitely a little more form fitting for a work dress- but the length and long sleeves kept it appropriate for work. Felt great in it- it's a thick fabric, and was amazing quality!
This dress was fine. Nothing great.

links_reviews_title: Nicely tailored work dress, good for hourglass
links_reviews_text: This was so well tailored for hourglass figure! I have a longer torso and it worked great for me. I'm usually between 4 and 6 and the 4 fit great... so if between sizes I guess size down.
I liked this dress a lot. Felt comfortable in it for an important work meeting. It was a little short in the front middle when sitting but otherwise really liked it.
Dress is definitely body con, and I’m happy I sized up in between sizes for a looser fit. But regardless of the tighter nature, it looks super sexy but also professional! Wish I could buy
Fit is amazing- super flattering. True to size.
This brand is almost never a disappointment. Loved it!
Runs perfect. Tight at all the right places for a curvy woman.

links_reviews_title: Too small. Hugs nice at the hips.
