links_reviews_text: This dress was a nice thick material but it was too small. I am usually an 8 and this was a 10. Then 10 zipped up but it was right. You could see every roll and imperfection. Great dress for a thinner frame.

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: It is a perfect winter dress for work
It fits great and is really flattering, just not totally in love with the muted brown/grey color.
Wore this for work and got a lot of compliments. Had to wear a black tank underneath as when I sat down it bunched a bit and I was worried about my bra showing.
Loved this dress but too much cleavage for work.
Cute everyday sweater. Love the tie towards the end which allows you make is smaller if needed. Soft and comfortable!!

I may have to keep this one. It's so warm and snuggly, I love the funnel neck, and the drawstring waist and pattern give comfy casual a bit of an edge. It's fabulous and I have worn it every night since I got it! Just around the house, but will be super cute this weekend with jeans and boots!
This item was very warm. Kept me cozy on a chilly winter day.
Great top for cold weather. Love the tie at the waist.
Perfect for feeling fashionable in the middle of the Midwest cold.

Run don't walk!!!! This sweater is SO soft and chic. I would wear this everyday if I could. The print is so unique but you feel like you're wearing pajamas. I'm 5'9" and wearing a size large with high waisted pants so I would size up. The only wierd thing about the sweater is that there's a low hanging bow/ribbon in the front and Idk if it's supposed to be worn out or tucked in.
Heavy warm sweater. I love this sweater and will rent again.
Don't be fooled- this sweater is WARM. It is super soft and cozy. I loved the print and got a ton of compliments. Rocked it with hoops and heals to work and felt like a boss. Would rent again
My boyfriend did like this but it is for very cold weather only.
Fun , cozy and warm . Looked great with jeans and also a good top for layering

This sweater is so warm! I went with a size small rather than my usual medium, because it looked oversized and I'm glad I did. The small fit well, though I would have liked about another inch of length..but that's just me being picky. I wore it to work, styled just like the model photo and felt cozy and stylish all day.

Really soft fabric! I loved the pattern and got a ton of compliments. The length/cinch at the bottom was a little weird to style at first but with the right bottoms is really cute! Would definitely rent again.
Fun to wear and got compliments! It's slightly cropped but wore it with slightly high waisted black jeans and felt a-ok! This is one of my go-to winter tops for a fun weekend.
LOVE!!! I got so many compliments on this. It's comfy, EXTREMELY warm, and still feminine and cute for going out. One of my favorite pieces yet!

Typically I have an issue with this material with being itchy.. especially around my neck. However, this sweater wasnt itchy at all and was pretty comfortable. I did get a little hot and claustrophobic with it being so high up my neck I had to keep rolling it down.

links_reviews_title: Stylish, warm and cozy for NYC weekend!
links_reviews_text: I was getting a dress for a holiday event with my husband in NYC and I came across this sweater last minute and added it to my RTR order and I’m so glad I did! I want to own this sweater now. It was so adorable and yet warm and toasty while we walked through the city in the cold winter weather.
Got a ton of compliments on it and perfect for a winter day since so cozy. It maybe runs a little large/boxy but it tends to rise up so preferred the larger fit.

links_reviews_title: What sweater dreams are made of!
links_reviews_text: Bummed I didn't snap a pic of this. This sweater is everything you want on a cold day. Super soft, warm, comfortable. The neck was a good length and with the material you didn't feel confined. The options with the string waist is great for versatility. I wore this in more of a lounge around atmosphere but easily could have dressed it up more too.
So cute and fun!! A bright sweater that fits great and is so comfy and easy to wear!!! I could live in this sweater!!! It makes you feel happy as soon as you put it on!!!

links_reviews_title: Cheetah licious in a bright yellow!!
links_reviews_text: Love this sweater. Good material, warm, not itchy and fun color / print
Highlighter yellow. Neck is cut high.
This was a fun sweater to wear out with friends! The print is bold. The material is warm but not scratchy.
Very cute casual sweater. I wore it multiple times during my monthly rental. It's a bit oversized but fit well overall. Paired it with leather leggings and black jeans.

links_reviews_title: Fun top. Wish it was a bit smaller in fit. Will consider ordering again but smaller size
links_reviews_text: Nice bright top but a bit big and boxy
Love the color, the fit, and the texture. Will rent again!
This is a great sweater. Not itchy and not too hot. The sleeves are cut big in the arm pit, but it's an amazing style.
Loved the color, print and length. Goes great with a pair of skinny jeans or leggings. A big boxy, but perfect to hide a 2nd trimester baby bump.
Great material and not itchy. However it's hard to get on and off due to the tight neck Once it was on it was comfortable
So comfortable, and so many compliments. Can't wait to rent it again!

Rented for work and received a ton of compliments. The neck hole is very small (and no i don't have a large head!) so it was a little challenging to get on. It is a true chunky sweater which isn't my personal favorite but definitely would recommend giving it a try!
Fit well. Loved the boxy cut! Bright and cheery top. Got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater! Made a statement!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Slightly cropped on the waist as pictured and boxier with Dolman type sleeves. It was bright but not too bright...pattern was awesome. Almost wanted to buy this!
A bit tight in the neck and sleeves are a bit short, but I still liked it.
This sweater is so much cooler in real life. It is everything a 90's Berlin Club Kid could hope for. The fit is boxy but flattering, and the racing stripes are very cool. 10/10 would recommend.

links_reviews_title: People Couldn't Handle the Bold Color
links_reviews_text: I loved this sweater. It's tight on the neck so best to put it on before applying make-up. The biggest annoyance I had was from all the haters who couldn't handle the bright color. So many comments about how loud it was.
This is a great oversized sweater. The drape is perfect and the colors are very fun. I don't usually like the oversized look but I loved this one and wore it multiple times in lieu of a sweatshirt.
Fun print and comfy thick sweater! Not too oversized but not clingy. Easy to dress up or down. Would rent again!

Loved everything about this sweater - the colors, the pattern. It runs a big wide in the waist, but its cut shorter so it works well. I did feel like it stretched out as I wore it but still looked amazing.
Loved It!!! Stylish comfortable oh so many compliments would rent again runs true to size

links_reviews_title: This was such a pleasant surprise
links_reviews_text: Great quality, flattering cut, and the color is amazing. It's a fun sweater that felt very stylish. Will definitely rent again.
Just so comfy and the material is so soft. I bought them.
Would definitely recommend wearing the matching set for a more put together look! Worn separately works too!
These pants are so comfortable. I was expecting the fabric to be more of a knit, but it’s actually nylon-like polyester. Still the most comfortable pants I’ve worn in weeks!

I loved these pants so much that I purchased them. They are very lightweight. Best part is they have pockets! I styled these pants with a sheer zip up blazer and put on nude heels for going out and white sneakers for everyday.
Xs was a great fit! High waisted and very comfortable
Super thin wind pant material. Didn't care for waist band. I would have to roll waist band down or these wlda gone up to my boobs. Also too long and balloony on me. I'm only 5-2. Returned next day .

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this. It was very comfortable. I could've gone down a size maybe.
links_reviews_text: Pros - Super cute, comfy, and stylish! Cons - Jacket is a pull over vs. a zip up, but not the worst thing. I got to keep it on during TSA b/c it was a pull over.
These pants and the matching jacket are the coolest most amazing set I've ever rented. Material is the perfect weight. Sporty but not too hot. Rented to go adventuring and couldn't have been happier
The cheetah print on the side add a little something, huge fan. Very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Good high waisted jean with a little stretch.
links_reviews_text: I wore these on a moving day into my new place. They don't have a ton of stretch, but the fit is true to size and I liked the high waist with my crop too sweater. The waist went right at my belly button.

Wanted a friendlier high waist black jean, these were a bit large and have a big front-butt look in the creasing/extra room in the crotch for me. They were also very starchy when I got them which made them stuff and exasperated the crotch crease; I still wore them but not ideal.

I hope this style doesn't replace the skinny, soft stretchy jeans that I prefer. These high waisted stiff Levi's were the ones I remember wearing as a kid in the mid 80s. Not flattering on me at all and made my butt look long. Maybe if I were 6 inches taller...

These are true to size. I never know with bottoms, so I usually size up, so I got the 29. They were fine, but they also stretched out throughout the day. I would've been fine ordering the 18 I think. Other than that, these jeans are nice and simple. They're not rigid which I liked
These are my second pair of Levi's i have rented. Love them!! High waisted. They loosened up a bit as I wore them.

links_reviews_title: not as cute as some of the other jeans on this site, but good classic look
links_reviews_text: very classic looking faded black jeans
These are high rise with buttons. Great fit and style
I'm a 14/16 in pants, but these jeans didn't even get past my calves. Never have athletic calves stopped me from wearing pants...until now. I bet they're cute if they fit you though.
Liked them.
I’m curvy and it fit great - prefer high waisted jeans but like that it is a thicker denim and doesn’t feel like leggings
These just did not fit. Couldn't even get them buttoned and I ordered my usual size. I have other Levi's that fit well, just not these.

links_reviews_title: Really cute and comfortable for work or weekend!
links_reviews_text: I went a size up than my normal size since these jeans said they didn't have any stretch. The first 4 times I wore them, they fit perfect but as denim usually gives a little over time, they stretched out a bit and are now a little loose. I think once washed, they'll go back to fitting perfectly, but they did stretch out a bit and having known this, I would have probably ordered my regular size 26. I have a short torso so these looked more high-waisted than mid-rise, which I liked.
Fine
It falls a little short if you have long legs, but the Botton fly and high cut is flattering
These are a great staple piece. I would definitely size down as They are a relaxed straight leg fit
This is a great pair of jeans however i felt they did run a bit large. I am a pretty average height and had to roll them up twice so they could hit my ankle.

The print, material, and pops of color (subtle green and pink accents on the interior) are all very cute. I found myself wishing the coat was a little more fitted, it felt baggy even with a thick knit sweater underneath.
Wore this to work and on the weekends. Dresses up any outfit, but definitely runs big - the 6 still fit me with room for sweaters and kept the menswear-ish look!

links_reviews_title: Fun standout option for nyc trip
links_reviews_text: I thought it would be a little more neutral but it's very much green! Was able to make it work with some fun vacation outfits but a little loud for daily wear

links_reviews_title: Green and navy plaid oversized jacket!
links_reviews_text: Jacket was comfortable but yes, oversized. I have smaller shoulders but a large chest which is why I rented the 4. I probably would go back and get the 2. Fun standout jacket!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful light weight coat with a fun pattern
links_reviews_text: This coat runs true to size. Light weight which is perfect for this almost Spring weather. The color is black and off white with some green mixed in. I received so many compliments on this coat, several random people on the streets of NYC .
Received dozens of compliments and it kept me nice and warm!

Fit is over-sized, agree with other reviewers that neckline best supported by a turtleneck. Note that it is not black & white as it appears in photo. There is dark green mixed in also. Nice coat but I felt "big" in it

I liked this plaid coat for winter, and so did others. A stranger ran up to me and called the coat "fabulous!" But I didn't like how big it runs, making it oversized. Plus, it only has two buttons, so it's not that warm in very cold weather.

links_reviews_title: Cute pop of pink but not a true winter coat!
links_reviews_text: The pop of pink under the collar was adorable ! This coat is very lightly lined and is more of a long blazer than a true pea coat. I think anyone would be cold in it if it's less than 50°F. The white checks looked a little dirty and off colored for some reason. The fit was structured ...definitely more on the oversized large side though. I'm 5'8" and it was a nice length hitting mid thigh. It buttoned shut easily with the two buttons even though my hips are wider than my top half. My biggest complain with this coat is how wide the lapels lay on the chest , you would really need to layer up with sweaters and scarves for this to be a practical coat, but the shoulders and arms are a bit too tight for that. Try it if you have unlimited but otherwise I'd recommend skipping this piece. Feel free to follow my RTR adventures on insta @conceptualemily

links_reviews_title: I loved this one! Couln't stop wearing it
links_reviews_text: Great fit+ very chic

I was so excited to rent this coat, however it was way to big on me, and only has the two buttons so it flies open a lot of the time. I am usually and 8 to 10 in coats, 8 wasn't available, but I was just drowning in this.

links_reviews_title: It is a cute jacket, very over sized and fun for fall.
links_reviews_text: However, because I am petite with broad shoulders it looked like I was wearing my dads jacket. Meant for taller women!

links_reviews_title: Great classic cut and well tailored
links_reviews_text: Great fit, classic look, warm and cozy coat – stylish for work or casual event.

This has nice length, to knees. Really good for every day to work. And it feels thick and warm, suitable for NYC spring (around 60F). I tried both size 2 and 4, both look good on me. I'm 5'5, 114 lbs, 34C.

Such a beautiful coat!! The green and black actually work as a neutral so the coat goes with pretty much everything and makes every outfit you wear it with feel more special! It's on the roomier side but I liked that. I could wear a sweater or anything under it and not feel like a stuffed sausage.
Love the oversized fit. Great for work trips and everyday
i loved this jacket, it was perfect for that winter into spring (or i presume summer into fall) timeframe.
The coat was a bit boxy, and had more green in it than I had anticipated. Ended up not wearing, but more due to weather (it got warmer!) then any other reason.

The sleeves and length were right for my petite frame, however, the waist was too loose for me. I wore a bulky sweater underneath and I felt like I was swimming in the coat. I returned it the next day.

links_reviews_title: Cute, casual, great colors, but runs slightly large. Lightweight and better for fall/spring.
links_reviews_text: Fits a bit larger than expected. Also, has a more masculine fit. It is lightweight and not a warm jacket for winter. Better suited for fall/spring. The colors and pattern are fresh and can dress up an all black outfit.

slight oversize but that is good to wear sweaters underneath. very comfortable with nice pockets. also buttons up high enough to be warm. it was more dark green and black then i realized (it is not black and white).

This fit well over a dress and jacket. Not too snug with layers. There is a green check in the weave too which I didn't see in the photos. It's not just black and white. I liked the subtle color but was surprised! Great jacket.

links_reviews_title: Loved this. Loved the dark green added to the black check. Loved the pop of pink.
links_reviews_text: the only con is it needs one more button to keep the cold out.
Just wish I had gotten a size down. And the color is green, black & white Check which I didn't know until I rcvd
standard everyday coat. Versatile and can be dressed up or down. the pattern wasn't sliming but it worked for a few weeks of winter wear
The coat fit a little too boxy. There wasn't a way to close the front well, so it was drafty. I loved the pattern.

Nice coat and good quality but I was swimming in it and felt like it would have been too tight in certain areas if I sized down. Overall was way too oversized in the shoulders - not in a cute boyfriend vibe kind of way but in a sloppy way. Had to return without wearing.
The length is a few inches above the knee which was ideal since I was traveling. The top material is stretchy so it was an easy fit. I wear a size 2 and got an XS!

I loved this dress! The colors were beautiful without being too loud. The fabric has no stretch but the top had smocking around the bust and waist so it fit perfectly. If you are a larger bust it might not work, I'm a 32B and with a strapless bra I felt like I had just enough room.
Loved this dress for vacation! I wore it a few times and it was super easy to throw on and look cute. I am petite and it did not drag on the ground. Cute print, adjustable straps, and lightweight
Great fit overall. Only complaint is it ran a little small in the chest area!
This is so cute. I love the print and style with the toes! It hits right at the top of my foot so not to drag I wore a heel. I love this dress.

Love this maxi! Adorable print and roomie enough for my 5 month bump without overwhelming my figure. Lightweight fabric and smocking at the chest make this dress super versatile for chest varying sizes. Also loved the adjustable straps.

Love the pattern and colors. But this dress was weirdly long - I'm 5"7 and even with 3 inch wedges it was grazing the floor. Also there is too much fabric in the chest area- the ruching isn't very flattering across the chest, especially if you are large chested like I am.

links_reviews_title: Loved the print not the fit
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress but the smocking detail on the top get very awkward. I wasn't sure if my boobs were too big or just not sitting correctly, and I adjusted it all day. However, nobody noticed other than me and I got tons of compliments all day. I like the adjustable tie straps as well. I am tall and the dress was just the right length for me with flat sandals. Very comfy and great for offices with AC in the summer.

This style is super easy if you're tall- I don't recommend this for shorter gals. I wore platform shoes and this was still close to the floor. The smocking is a cute detail, isn't super flattering but worked for the day. Overall great style for vacation or a day out
I'm 5'3" and the length worked well with flats. The top was a bit tight across the chest so be careful if you are large chested. Wore this 5 months pregnant. Super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable dress, but cuts across your chest oddly
links_reviews_text: The seaming along the chest cuts poorly, it makes you look like you have lines across your breasts (maybe because i am very flat chested). But overall the dress is comfortable and easy to wear.
The straps are adjustable, which is great.

links_reviews_title: Easy dress over swimmers or casual dinner / lunch get-together
links_reviews_text: Bust is tight especially with a strapless bra. I have a size AA cup but anyone bustier would find this size uncomfortable. Great length and easy to wear.

I liked this dress, it's really really long. I always have to wear platform shoes or heels in order to make it work. The neckline is a little bit odd, and quite low, but since it's a straight cut across, it's not particularly revealing.

links_reviews_title: Bust looks odd and shoulder straps dig in
links_reviews_text: Was not a fan of this one- the bust lays odd as other reviewers have said. And I also found that the shoulder straps dig into my shoulders making the whole experience unpleasant. Didn't actually end up wearing this anywhere.
The dress fit cute and was flattering. I would recommend! Love the pattern and color.
Such a pretty, nice fitting, and comfortable dress!! Perfect for day or night. Definitely will be renting this again!
This was a very comfortable and cute dress. Wore twice and received loads of compliments both times.
Loved this dress! Great print, flattering fit, cool and comfy.
The elastic at the bust cuts in on your boobs a little, creating that mono-boob look, from the side.

Super comfy and cute, love the tie straps (adjustable!). Print was a little more muted than expected, but fabric is nice. Probably not for petite ladies...I'm 6'0" and found it to be the perfect maxi length with flat sandals.

i'm typically a 2/4 and the small fit w plenty of room. these is tons of stretch so if you get your reg size or 1 size smaller, you'll be fine, straps are adjustable. i'm short so this looks best w high wedges. cute pattern. easy to wear summer maxi.
Didn't wear
Tight in the chest, but was wearable. Hit the floor on me since I am 5'
Cute dress. Would rent again in a small size
Fit good and was really cute but only wore once
The material was so warm, prettier in person! I'm a 34B and weigh 115 lbs, the small had a loose feel without being too much.
I could have gone smaller. Cute sweater, very girly if you like that.
Cute and comfy. It is a shorter cut so size up if you want it longer.
I wore this mostly in quarantine but it kept me warm and cozy while being completely Zoom appropriate!
Cute and casual!
Very comfortable and soft.

links_reviews_title: Very long sleeve length, kind of see through
links_reviews_text: This was an interesting one.. the sleeves were very long but the rest was true to size. The material was kind of see through because it is super soft but it was thin.
It was so warm and fuzzy - I loved it! Slightly cropped - so I wore high waisted faux leather leggings with it. Looked great on me, I'm 5'3, small chested

Loved this sweater & wore it 3x in a month. It's true to size & is super cute, but runs slightly short. This could be a matter of preference, but definitely had to wear an undershirt when wearing this to work. Overall, would recommend!
This is a cozy sweater but runs a bit short. Medium would have been a better fir for me
Perfect length in my opinion, not a big baggy sweater but still super cozy and fuzzy warm.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous!!! Made me feel so successful and elegant. Got tons of compliments

links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. The details around the neckline made it much more interesting but in a very refined, understated way.
This was so dang cute and I got so many compliments! Highly recommend renting this piece!

I thought this was a fun outfit but it was seriously hard to get the top on over my shoulders. I held my pee for most of the party so I wouldn't have to go through getting it back on again. I read the reviews and sized up and I couldn't even imagine getting into a small. Legs were a little long for me but worked fine with heeled booties. Ultimately a fun piece for a short party!

links_reviews_title: Cute jumpsuit but such a pain to take on and off
links_reviews_text: Cute jumpsuit that got me a lot of compliments. I sized up to get more space for taking this on and off. However, the zipper is short so getting this thing on and off was such a hassle. Liked the outfit but didn't love that.

links_reviews_title: Going to the bathroom is an art.
links_reviews_text: Pros: This is why I love RTR. I would never buy something this funky and cool! Lots of compliments from Canadian tuxedo to mechanic chic. The denim is thick and kept me warm. I wore to work zipped up and then wore boob tape and fashion tape and zipped it down for a date (pictured). It's on the longer side. I wore 3-4 inch heels. Cons: Getting this off/on to go to the bathroom is an art! There's no stretch (except the waist). I did dread going to the bathroom each time. But still worth it!
Wore this to a denim party and got a TON of compliments. Squeezed into a small and it totally worked! Def recommend and also would rent again.
Loved this jumpsuit. Fits true to size. The denim is not super flexible up top so it takes a minute to navigate taking it on and off. Def recommend
Loved this jumpsuit and received so many compliments! VERY DIFFICULT TO GET ON! I had to purposefully avoid drinking too much throughout the day due to the fact it was so hard to get in and out of
Fun look. A little snug in some places however once it's on you're good to go!
Absolutely love this as an everyday outfit. Fits well, snug enough to show some form but still comfortable

links_reviews_title: Recommended size too big; hard to get out of
links_reviews_text: New item, no reviews, so went with the recommended size and it was much too big! No shape... could definitely have sized down. However, I probably won't re- try because I got it for casual wear with sneakers or flip flops (Florida life!) and it's very long (and I'm tall). It's also very hard to get in and more importantly out of! Very thick denim but it is generally comfy and cute.
it was sooo cute but so hard to get off, I had to have someone else help me get it off. I couldnt have gotten a bigger size but maybe because I am tall. Not really sure.

I was more excited about this than most rentals, but I was somewhat disappointed. It is high waisted and you have to pull it on through the limited depth neckline. Makes it hard to pull on and off. Nice length to pants if you are tall and good quality heavy denim.
This jumpsuit is very cute. It was too long for me but looked fine rolled up (I'm 5'5") but it did make me want to buy it so I can hem it. Still considering that!

links_reviews_title: Was so excited but could barely get it on!
links_reviews_text: I'm tall so I normally have a bit of trouble with jumpsuits but this was the smallest yet. I had a hard time getting it on and barely was able to get it off. Ended up returning because of the size but also found the collar and fit to be a bit too masculine for my taste

links_reviews_title: this looks super cool, but ultimately it doesn't have much shape around the waste which made my butt
links_reviews_text: butt looks flat with this because it's kind of square, but above the waist it's awesome. Wish this just had a bit more fit around the waist

Loved renting this. I felt very effortlessly cool and got tons of compliments. More comfortable than I expected, too. Note: VERY long in the legs. I'm 5'5", cuffed the bottoms once and wore 3" heels. My mom actually borrowed it the next day. She's 5'5" and cuffed it 2-3 times but it worked.

It kind of has a fun 70's vibe going. Received a number of compliments. The denim is definitely on the heavier side, so not something for a warm day - Perfect for late fall. I have a long torso and this fit well, even when seated. Would definitely rent again!

Fabulous style. I went to two meetings with NYC artists in this and got compliments from both artists. Thick, quality denim -- stood up to cool temperatures. Roomy, functional pockets. The zipper is short so it's tough to wriggle in and out of. Worth it!

links_reviews_title: Looks good - if you can get in
links_reviews_text: This jumper looks beautiful and is very comfortable. However, putting it on and undressing feels like getting out of a straight jacket.
Fabric is bulky and it's not flattering. I'm 5'6 and the XS was big.
Loved the shoulder pads. The fit was large so try to get your size or smaller. I prefer this too tucked in and you'll have to keep an eye on the chest area because the top shifts and opens.

links_reviews_title: Hold all your feelings in these shoulder pads
links_reviews_text: Loved this shirt. Be aware, it is a LOOK. I was asked about it all day. More so than any black shirt I've ever worn. I loved the way it made me feel. Had to pin it in the front. The girls sometimes wanted to say hello in it. But I highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top! Completely high end and fab!
links_reviews_text: I wore this on nye and then to a work event as well. Very comfy and well constructed. Love the shoulders and you might want to use a little fashion tape to keep the front closed, or keep it open for more of a date night or going out look. Great piece !!!

links_reviews_title: Wore on first date. Felt confident
links_reviews_text: Felt super chic and sexy in this long sleeve, it's perfect downtown cool - bag is RTR to
The pleating in the front does not lay quite right, so made for an awkward fit. Otherwise, the shoulders are so fun and it's a great too for a night out.

links_reviews_title: Fun Saturday night bar hop in NYC.
links_reviews_text: I loved this so much I bought it. I'm a full chested (D-DD) and this was super flattering and sophisticated with a hint of daring.

Loved the silhouette of this top. Shoulders are very defined and pointy. Drapes open at front so I pinned. I ordered a size bigger than usual as this brand often runs small, but my regular size would have been fine.
This top is very flattering and great for date night. Needs a bit of tape to keep top closed or just wear a cute bra!
Great top for a party. Wore with a leather skirt. Awesome material.

I really love the color and print of this sweater but the fit is so weird! The sleeves completely covered my hands and more (so long!) and the shoulders were worn from being hung too long. Material is soft and cozy though.
It was a bit fitted but the fabric pattern was so fun. Good option for movie night with my husband.
This was a great everyday sweater. The colors are really pretty and you could dress it up a bit with some leggings if you wanted.
Wore this for dinner on a ski trip. Neckline could use a scarf or a necklace. Great fit.
This sweater runs true to size. It's a beautiful green. It's warm, cozy & soft. I paired it with some fun leggings and a black sleeveless vest. Great rental, I would definitely rent again.
Loved this sweater. I've got nothing this color and fit well. Only con is I thought the sleeves ran too long, so I had to roll up and thought that didn't look as cute. Baggy, but fit well.

Cute, fun & different. Got compliments... until my 11 year old called me a leprechaun! I liked it a lot though. Not itchy... yay! I could have worn a small. I liked the M fit though. I'm 5'5 140...34DC/D
Please, please wear this as a layer and know that you will be warm. You've been warned. That's said it's so soft and I've loved wearing it!
This was very form fitting - long and slim. Too tight for my liking. Nice print.

links_reviews_title: Its a loose casual sweater but still fitted
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and relaxed fit. I could wear it to work over nice pants or on the weekend with jeans. Loved it so much so I purchased!

links_reviews_title: big in the shoulders and arms, waist is small
links_reviews_text: This may have just been overworn and be too stretched out. The sleeves were super long and the neck was really wide, but the body was tight and fitted.

links_reviews_title: Soft, cute and great for everyday
links_reviews_text: Great fit.

links_reviews_title: The green really pops against black jeans!
links_reviews_text: This sweater fit fine overall but the sleeves were too long on me. It also arrived misshapen and had a hole in the back. I liked the colors and pattern though.

Fit was strange. The shoulders were quite stretched from the hanger. I resembled a linebacker. The sweater was long and tight through the torso. I thought it would be a thicker material from the pictures, but it was quite thin.
Was more light weight then I expected but was great for layering. The sleeves were a little long.
Runs a little big and short. XS was a good size for me.

The material of this sweater is heaven, so soft and cozy yet does not pill or look worn. Additionally the cut is very flattering for a sweater. The neckline is wider than a crew (but not a scoop), the sleeves hit mid hand and there is a soft shape to the torso. Only thing I wasn't crazy about was the print. Ended up being even bolder than expected. But the flattering shape while still being cozy made up for it.

The pattern and colors are awesome...looked great with black jeans and booties for a casual fall afternoon. The length was a bit weird. I hit right at waist level. I wanted to front tuck it which I did but it was just a hair too short for it to look right. Regardless, it was warm and comfy and cute!
Super cute and unbelievably comfortable. Different print, absolutely loved it.

links_reviews_title: Soft comfort, vinrant color. Wsy to add color to a gray day.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves a tad long for me but I'm borderline petite

links_reviews_title: A great everyday pop of color.
links_reviews_text: Warm but not bulky. A bit short waisted which was great for my short stature but may fit on the short side for others. Added a lovely pop to everyday wear!

links_reviews_title: Cozy + Soft + Cool Camo Pattern = Win!!
links_reviews_text: Loved this sweater! So soft, great colors. I got a Large, but I usually wear a Medium so it was a little big, and the sleeves were long like someone else mentioned. I didn't mind though, felt super cozy. Great for weekends or office.

In description it said XS was a size 0 and S was a sz 2-4 so I went with the S, but it was more like a 4-6. If you are a size 2 go with the XS. Love the colors/pattern of the sweater, but the sweater they sent me was really worn out and you could see the balling in the sweater. I returned it immediately.
Great weekend sweater. Super soft.
Very soft mohair style sweater in this amazing vibrant pattern. The sleeves are super long while the torso isn't as long so the fit is a little odd. But easy to wear for a casual look.

links_reviews_title: Cozy and soft but weird fit in the shoulders
links_reviews_text: Very cute and cozy but the shoulders are extra wide - not sure if that's because the hanger has stretched them out or if it's by design. Coulda fit an entire shoulder pad in there - or made it a boatneck. Sleeves are also super long.

I got compliments from EVERYONE when wearing this sweater. By "everyone", I mean my 3 year old, strangers, my barista, my therapist and the overtired new dad from my church who I signed up to bring a hot meal to. My husband said it showed off my hourglass figure, so that's a bonus. It's warm and a bit scratchy, so wear it as a top layer and be prepared to remove it when you get warm.
Would like to own it.

links_reviews_title: Nice to be wearing a statement sweater.
links_reviews_text: The sweater is soft and drapes nicely. I paired like the model...with skinny dark grey jeans and and black boots. My mid section is more full than I'd like it..and the sweater, although not short is more than I like...so paired with a longer black camisole below. Fun graphic. Happy I rented it.
Fun and funky
This is a super soft and very warm sweater. Nice colors, it was great for traveling. You don't need anything underneath it, as it's not itchy at all.

I wanted to love this top so bad, but it was HUGE on me. The colors were stunning, especially in person, but even tucked in was just a little too big. You can definitely make it work, especially if oversized is your thing, but don't forget to size down!!!!
I'd definitely wear this again! It's a bit oversized & more like a tunic. The print is subtle and I liked the balloon sleeves

links_reviews_title: Perfect transition from work to drinks
links_reviews_text: Love this shirt!!! It runs super big but looks amazing!!! I really loved the material!
I would normally wear a large top but after reading reviews, I decided to order the medium. It feel great and was still pretty long.
Really nice shirt that feels very luxurious on! Fit great

links_reviews_title: The fact that I look like Violet when she was turning violet
links_reviews_text: Nice material, very soft and pretty pattern but this was just like mix of Seinfeld's puffy shirt and a smock. And this is a size S.

links_reviews_title: BUY BUY BUY, did I say buy?
links_reviews_text: This shirt is everything - would buy if it wasn't $300 with a discount. Though I still haven't talked myself out of purchasing it. I wanted to buy before trying it on. It's beautiful - it fits perfectly. A little loose while barely, oh so delicately framing your chest and creating a great V neck when unbuttoned. Wish I had a pic standing up. Wore this three ways - 1) to work - buttoned to the top and untucked with high waisted skinny jeans and block heels 2) after work - fully tucked in, unbuttoned with a great statement belt and block heels 3) kids first day of school - front tuck ONLY, skinny jeans and flats. I cannot get enough of this shirt. I love it. Rent it. It's classy, dressy, sexy, chic and modest all at the same time. You will not be sorry. My debit card's about to be sorry though. Fit perfectly.
Lightweight great blouse

This shirt is fun to wear because the sleeves and front detailing are unique. The color is stylish, and it's just the right length (I'm tall). The only reason I didn't buy it is that it's polyester and gets way too hot and sticky on a warm day.
So flattering. Love this Top. Will Rent Again

Another A+ top from Equipment. Slightly vintage vibes with the print and silky material and let me tell you, the material is HEAVEN. I sized up because I like a loose fit. Would absolutely buy if it weren't for the price.
It has some subtle pleating up near the shoulders that I didn't like. Didn't end up wearing it.
Rented for work but could have worn this out to dinner too!
Lovely fabric. Versatile
Blousy, peasant-y fit looks great tucked into jeans and elevates any outfit. Sad to return this one.

Loose fit. Long as well, which makes it harder to tuck into pants/jeans. Pretty color and pattern. Quality is very nice. A bit too blousy for me, especially when tucking into pants. But overall really nice. Runs large.
It was a bit large on me but I still wore it paired with jeans in a casual work environment.
Silky feel and classy fit. Wore with jeans and also work slacks
The shirt is true to size. I ordered a larger size than I usually wear because I was concerned it would run small, but you can trust that it runs true to size.

With the shine and color, this top is versatile for a casual work environment or a sexy night out. I was able to bring it from day to night by wearing it loose and fully buttoned-up over black jeans at work, and then tucking it in and adding a peek of little black bra for date night!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for everyday at work, felt like a small level up that was easy.
links_reviews_text: Loose fitted and luxurious to the touch!

Got some compliments on this. Fabric is nice and comfy, but I'd size down one or two sizes. It was huge. Fits like a tunic on my 5'7" frame. Made it awkward to tuck in. I'd rent again, but would probably get a small.

I love this shirt for work or lunches with friends. I actually wore it to a cocktail event pairing it with slacks and a white blazer. I thought it looked great and was such an easy way to dress something up when in a pinch.
Felt great, loose but silky. Wonderful pattern and palette almost bought

It wasn't clear to me that this was an oversized fit, but it is. I could have dealt with the body by tying the front, but the billowy sleeves were huge and so long on me. Couldn't roll the sleeves up and have it look okay so I didn't end up wearing.

links_reviews_title: overall fit is larger than expected
links_reviews_text: i was expecting the shirt to be more fitted then it actually was. it's very flowy and long. too long to tuck in so i tied the bottom for a tied look rather then tucked in look.

links_reviews_title: Material is so comfortable perfect for white jeans. The color was perfect for night out
links_reviews_text: Perfect
Gorgeous blouse.

This is a nice blouse with an eye catching pattern. It can be dressed up or dressed down which makes it so versatile and great for work. In terms of sizing, it is quite long and a little puffier than expected. I typically wear a size M but sized down to a small, if renting again I would even consider a smaller size so it could be more fitted. Overall a great staple blouse.
It ran pretty large in across the shoulders. Never wore it.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this! It is beautiful and versatile and got compliments everywhere!
links_reviews_text: Runs a little big but not enough to worry aboutl

links_reviews_title: Oversized shirt with super cute pattern and great material. Works for a certain look.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'10 and wore the XS. The shirt was a lot longer and wider than I was anticipating based on the fit on the model, but the pattern and material is amazing. You have to work it a bit, but it can work for an oversized shirt look.

links_reviews_title: Love the shirt but runs large
links_reviews_text: Pattern is cute. But definitely could have sized down.

links_reviews_title: A great everyday shirt. Looks good with jeans.
links_reviews_text: Very loose fit. Too big for me.

links_reviews_title: Ran big - wish it was cooler
links_reviews_text: I love Equipment blouses bit this one ran rather large everywhere and looked a little dumpy on me.
Great shirt, definitely go down one size. Wore with black slacks. Fun and professional.
I really liked it but just not enough to buy it. I did like the cut and the feel of the material.

links_reviews_title: I received compliments but it has a fullness to it that I didnt care for.I love the brand
links_reviews_text: big, shiny
The blouse is gorgeous. I wanted to wear it however size large fits essentially like an XXL. I will rent a small.
fit perfectly- high waisted and very flattering
These were cut pants with pretty colors on the side. Generally they were comfortable but they ran long on me and I had to pull them up causing them to fit weird in the crotch area.

I wore this sweater for a casual Christmas Day dinner. I loved the pattern and style of the sweater, and thought it had a very flattering shape. I wore with black ponte pants, but would be cute with jeans too! It is slightly longer in the back, and the sleeves were a little long (but I'm also petite). I took off a star because it is kind of itchy, but that didn't bother me enough to wear something else. It does shed slightly as well. Overall, a great winter piece - wish I could buy it!

I ended up wearing this a few times. Perfect for weekends and work. Runs true to size. The arms were nice and long. I wore a t-shirt underneath to help with the itchiness - overall very warm and comfy!

Overall I liked this sweater! It felt like the perfect thing to wear for our Thanksgiving potluck at work. The reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because it was SUPER itchy. I wore a cami under it and was able to manage it for the day, but the more I moved in it, the more the arms itched.
Loved this sweater, but had to wear a long sleeved shirt on underneath & it still itched. It was adorable in person & in photos, so if it's worth it def rent it!
Fits true to size, very warm I was almost too hot! Great for winter, only complaint is that it's a little itchy.
Not my usual style, but I wanted to try something different and I'm glad I did. Comfortable and fit true to size.
Loved this sweater! Couldn't wear it as much as i wanted because it is so warm (and i am in California) but every chilly day - super cute with black pants and boots.
Very cute and loved the pattern and look but so itchy! I couldn't even wear it. Very sad.
Loved this sweater. I sized up because I like my sweaters longer and bigger. I received so many compliments on this one.
Warm and comfortable with a funky design so it didn't need to be dressed up too much. Boxy first.

links_reviews_title: The soft yarns are soft and quality!
links_reviews_text: The different textures of the yarns are what make this soft sweater and luxurious. This sweater is very easy to wear!
Oversized fit and nice, warm fabric.
I loved this sweater! My only complaint is that it was a little itchy. But it was still comfortable, with a loose fit and looked so cute!

links_reviews_title: So love this even though it's itchy
links_reviews_text: This sweater is luxurious. It is a wee bit bitchy but over time I noticed that less. Received one million compliments. It is meant to not be fitted but the length and sleeve length were perfect.
I love the style and design of this sweater BUT the material is SO itchy. I couldn't wear it because of how itchy it was.
I really like this sweater, but it runs very big. I'm sending back to exchange for a smaller size.
These are glorious. Beyond flattering. Made my booty look 20 years old again. Benjamin Button booty.

links_reviews_title: Loved them - wore them on the place to Europe and they were super comfy and cute at the same time.
links_reviews_text: Waistband holds up without pinching or creating muffin top and doesn't roll. Fabric is buttery soft and lightweight. Design covers any skin flaws really well.
Totally comfy and stretchy for a work out or just a hang out! Not restrictive, a little bunch at the ankle, and I'm 5'4, but I thought they were super comfy. Too pricey or I would have bought!

This dress is really cute and flattering. I wore it on a gloomy Miami day and it instantly lifted my mood. I did feel like it ran a little large and the straps where a little loose. I am pear shaped so if you also have a smaller upper body, I would recommend sizing down.
This is a happy dress. Many people complimented them bright cheerful mango color. And linen is the best is hot weather. I would rent again. I loved the buttons and the belt.
I got so many compliments in this dress! Wearing with boots works well for the transition to fall.
I really liked how the dress fit in the body but the straps fell off my shoulders. The pockets were also very low on the body of the dress so my hands could barely reach them. I am 5'6.
I loved the fit of everything about this dress except the straps. They were too big. I tried to pin and wear with a bra. Nothing worked. I'm very small chested so I didn't fill it out.

links_reviews_title: Love the dress and the colour
links_reviews_text: Got loads of compliments on this dress! Would rent again!
I wore this to the church for my friends summer wedding. It was light, perfect for a humid and hot summer day in the city. The color is fun and the belt was so cute!

links_reviews_title: LOVE the colour, fit and style
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress. Despite it being linen, you can tell this was quality linen. The dress is lined and very comfortable to wear. Having spent all day in the dress and hours in a car it barely looked worn. Lots of compliments, event from strangers. Loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: Great pop of color, fit is so so
links_reviews_text: The color was much brighter than I expected, almost neon, but it worked well with a summer tan. I usually find Nicolas to run small so I sized up, but this dress I probably could have gone true to size. As other reviewers said the straps are long, but it's more like they are to far apart so they don't sit at the right angle on your shoulders and fall off. I ended up pinning them inside shoulder which didn't look great but felt more secure

If summer were a dress, this would be IT! Clad in linen, I felt ready to face my day, which was FULL of compliments from coworkers and strangers a like. Grab this dress and a glass of rose and toast to summer!

links_reviews_title: Super cute color, loved the belt, straps ?
links_reviews_text: So this dress as other reviews state super cute color, super good fit on the hips and everywhere BUT the straps. I tried it on, wore it in the morning, straps constantly fell, super loose and long through the straps. I'm 5'9 and am busty and so usually when people complain about the bust or straps its not an issue. This was an issue. I took the dress off before mid day because it just wasnt working.

links_reviews_title: Great yellow, cute buttons, and pockets!
links_reviews_text: I am usually a 12/14 in dresses sometimes a 10 with certain designers and I often size up to a 14 if I am at all concerned about bust, which I was for this dress. I rented the 14 and lets just say I was swimming in this dress! Would recommend sizing down if you are between sizes. I will rent again but in a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Ended up not wearing the dress...
links_reviews_text: The 8 was WAY too big. It looked like a sack on me :( Would recommend sizing down! The color is a lot brighter than the picture too!
This dress is super cute. I got a ton of compliments. The color is great and it has pockets

links_reviews_title: An amazing dress. I wore it with a denim jacket.
links_reviews_text: It runs very large, so I will definitely go down a size if I rent it again.
Color of dress is pretty with a tan. Fit great, comfortable, elegant and timeless. Nice to wear outside on a sunny day.

Got this for an all orange Auburn game. I read the other ladies' comments about long straps and planned ahead and packed garment tape. They were right, even though I am tall the straps were v long. The tape fixed it.
I normally wear size 14 but have a thick mid-section so I sized up 2x. Dress fit way too big on top while bottom fit great. Definitely made for someone with broader shoulders.
Fit okay on my pear body. Straps were on the long side and the dress has a pretty straight cut to it. It was a little to baggy up top in general. did not end up wearing.
I liked the dress a lot but I was swimming in the size 4. Not sure what happened bc I've squeezed into a Nicholas 2 before and could barely breathe.
Fits large in the top had to wear a jacket to cover the gaping.
The straps and chest are enormous but the waist was too tight
The top was a little loose on me but the dress is beautiful

links_reviews_title: Very cute dress, got a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: The top sleeves were too big and fell at times, otherwise the fit was perfect

links_reviews_title: It’s like the top of half the dress and the bottom half are not coordinated.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color, and substantial linen,but the top was huge and unwearable, even with a cami underneath. Very disappointed.
It looks so frumpy and the shoulders don't stay up.
The fit is feminine but casual and the color is absolutely stunning
As many have said, the sleeves are rather large and slide off of the shoulder. Other than that the fit is good. A lot of fabric on the bottom half.
This dress was about 4 sizes too big. I couldn't even wear it.
Love the linen, the buttons are incredible and eye catching. The added belt give the dress amazing shape. The straps did fall down a bit but not excessively

The top is HUGE - I'm solidly a 14 and this in 14R was sooo big in the top. Straps need 2" taken up, back needs 1" taken in (it sags) and sides chest are also way too roomy. It's really too bad too because this is an awesome style, I tried to make it work w safety pins and even strongly considered doing a basting stitch to temporarily take it in! No luck tho.

I loved this dress for its color and easy linen fabric. The buttons are a nice detail that make it really flattering on. The only thing that brought down the rating is the straps. They kept falling down. Could be a good dress with a cardigan and pin the straps a bit. Still super cute and wore it for everyday.
The fit is very large, and the straps were too long and would not stay on my shoulders. I did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Orange, not yellow -- and size down
links_reviews_text: I expected a mustard yellow based on the photo, but in real life it's a bright, tangerine orange. I sized up which was a big mistake; straps wont stay up, and top is too baggy and low. I may rent again sizing down.

So this dress.. it's the color of a very ripe mango. Orange. The fit is flattering but the straps are too long and annoyingly fall off your shoulders all the time. The belt I couldn't really get to lay properly. Meh.

links_reviews_title: Fun and even better in person
links_reviews_text: I rented this on a whim, not really thinking it was going to be a knockout piece, but it's really sweet in person! The fabric felt nice and didn't wrinkle easily. The pattern is interesting without being overwhelming, and the shirt looked great dressed up and down. Highly recommend.

Off the hangar the top seemed really large, but when I put it on it was roomy but not overly big. There isn't much shape to the bodice part, the sleeves are really poofy. It's a statement top for sure. I liked wearing it and would recommend sizing down if you wanted it to be more fitted. I liked it with jeans, you could wear this to work too with black pants. It's comfy for all day wear.

Literally felt like a Polly Pocket doll with this bag, I love it so much!! Got so many compliments and it actually made a perfect beach bag. Easy to style from the pool to dinner and everywhere in between!

This purse is everything!! Love the trendy, beaded style and the gorgeous rainbow colors. It is super fun and bright and adds a great pop of color to any outfit. I also found it to be really functional--just enough for your phone and a few little items. Kind of looks like something you made at summer camp, but in the best, most high-fashion way!
Looks great over a sweater or a tank for a night out! I got a lot of complements on it!
Similar style to Veronica Beard but not as fitted or flattering. Looks better with a skirt in my opinion. Wore it on a Friday to the office with jeans and riding boots.

links_reviews_title: Runs large and not good quality
links_reviews_text: I was expecting a good quality blazer to wear to an interview. However, this blazer is made in a cloth like material and looks more like a sweater than a formal blazer. It also runs large so even though I rented a Small, it was too baggy for me.

Great for everyday. Relaxed oversize fit with classic construction and features. Wore multiple times, casually with jeans as well as to the office. Nice to have a comfortable blazer so that you're pulled together yet comfortable due to the roomy fit. Slightly worn or would rate higher. Recommend!

links_reviews_title: Not flattering. Just not my style
links_reviews_text: I like work jackets. But this just was not flattering. It has very board shoulders and just didn't fit right. I never wore it.

links_reviews_title: Great blazer, ran a little large
links_reviews_text: I definitely could have gone with an XS, the S was a bit baggy. But a great chic blazer with a fun twist.
I really loved this blazer so I bought it! I usually wear a 6 and a small fit well. Really elevates the look of any outfit.
Fit true to size, great for work
I didn't end up wearing this because I thought it would look too formal, but it's a nice blazer! True to size
The fit was right on, the style was both professional and polished with an edge. Certainly will rent again!
Great Fit and beautiful style
I really wanted to like this Blazer but the cut is boxer than I would have expected give the mod image and the sleeves are a bit too baggy
I have a short torso, so this jacket hit the mark perfectly on length and fit.

Love!! I avoid tunic style tops because they just add weight to my pear shaped bod. This top is an exception! The beautifully draped upper made my narrow shoulders look a little wider, while the lean asymmetric bottom balanced things out below. Split shirttail made it easy to make sure nothing took a dip in the restroom! Fabric doesn't wrinkle. Belt is fixed, can't tie it tighter, nor loosen it. Would look great on many body types. Wore it with RTR DVF Dakota pants.

I rented this for my trip to Egypt and it was perfect. It's really comfy and fits nice. I have a bit of a tummy that I like to hide and this did the trick. I got a lot of compliments on it. Great with leggings.

PROS: this top was so comfortable. I was tempted to buy. But it stands out so much that I didn't think I could wear it very many times. I love the navy color and I felt like a million bucks in this. CONS: none
Beautiful material and rich color. Has great flow and didn't wrinkle! The belt is a nice added detail.
Surprisingly this blouse had a zipper in the back as well as the tie at the waist. The blouse was fun and flowy and paired well with black skinny pants for work.

links_reviews_title: Lovely color, got tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: Skims figure beautifully, falls well, lots of compliments, easy to style, loved it. Will rent again when the weather is warmer

links_reviews_title: loved the train on the back. will definitely grab this one again
links_reviews_text: a bit hard to zip alone
Had to force myself to NOT wear this sweater every single day. It was so comfortable, warm and went with so many other items. Almost bought it.

links_reviews_title: Cute but a little robe like
links_reviews_text: This was so comfy and warm. I also liked the print. I just couldn't get past that I felt like i was wearing a robe.
Wore this to a super bowl party and was so comfortable at 5 months pregnant. It's a great combination of colors and an awesome length.
I felt stylish in a very low effort and relaxed way. I would have bought it if retail price weren't so expensive!

This might be the RTR item I have received the most compliments on. Total strangers were stopping me to compliment me. It is unusually warm which was great for the winter. I wore like a coat but also looked great as a sweater. It hit me mid calf. It is definitely oversized but the proportions don't swallow you.

Comfortable and casual and very fashionable. I felt great in this cardigan. It's heavy and warm. If you're between sizes, size down. I ordered and wore the small, which was fine but I'm sure I could have gotten away with the extra small. I wore this work with pants and then out with jeans and boots. Compliments both times. The one draw back is that the armpits were pretty stinky upon arrival. It's been rented a bunch and has some reasonable wear and tear. Still - it's a great cardigan!
Rented this for casual everyday wear. Love it! Highly recommend it. Runs a little big. But can easily roll up sleeves and style it easily.
Love the colors and weight. Large. I have long arms and I had to roll the sleeves. But loved borrowing this! So easy to be causal or work appropriate
This cardigan is heavy and warm but soft and cozy. I rented the small and probably could've fit a bit better in the xs but this still works well.

Rented this for a work from home day - as other reviewers mentioned, it's super cozy. Sleeves and length were long on me - I would say it runs large. My only issue with it was that the XS I got definitely looks overworn. I love a fuzzy sweater, but it was completely pulled/piled throughout, and there was a small hole in the side of it. Not a problem for a day of video calls, but I don't think it would work for the office or going out with friends.
Loved this but would definitely size down next time. Arms were super long. Perfect for work or weekend. Loved the print but looked like it had been worn a lot.
Very thick and warm sweater - a little bit bulky. Great colors and perfect with jeans or leggings.

on the large side, sleeves too long for my arms. Has obviously been a popular rental--the knit is a bit pilly from being cleaned a lot, I think. Was fun to wear around town running errands, but more casual looking than I anticipated.
Super warm and comfortable. Usually wear a small but went a size down due to the comments and it was the right move. It's definitely worn looking, but I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Warm and cozy but will look used
links_reviews_text: This is super cozy for just throwing on and being warm and looking cute, but after being washed and worn, it looks like an old sweater.
This was soft and slouchy and stylish. I loved it!!
I wore this for a work tradeshow and I absolutely love it! I'm most likely looking to purchase at this point!
Loved the print and color. Wore this a few times- once with black skinny jeans and once with gray ankle length jeans.

links_reviews_title: Thick cardigan great for the PNW!
links_reviews_text: Thick material so I can only see myself wearing this outside.
It's been pretty cold and i was not sure if wearing this would be enough but omg so beautiful and warm! Perfect for a casual outfit.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and cute at the same time
links_reviews_text: Wore this to work with jeans and boots. I felt like I was wearing a soft blanket all day. It was a bit too oversized but wasn't too bad. Not itchy at all (I can't wear wool because I find it too itchy)

links_reviews_title: The closest thing to a socially appropriate bathrobe
links_reviews_text: This sweater is thick and warm and very cozy. I wore it on a weekend away and I didn't want to take it off. The fabric is a bit stringy but it's fine for a casual look

links_reviews_title: I wish I could own this sweater!
links_reviews_text: It was so cozy and comfortable! I received compliments galore!

I'm 5'3" and there is no way I could wear this for anything other than a huge fuzzy bathrobe. It was huge and long, way more than an oversized look. The fabric is so soft and I love the print! Wish it fit. Best for less petite ladies.

These were okay. Runs a bit tight in the waist but close enough to true to size. I personally didn't love them, so I didn't end up wearing them as they weren't what I was looking for, but they were comfortable (besides for the waist being a little tight).

Material is thicker, will keep you warm, but too thick for warm weather. Spacious around upper thigh area and hips. Nice quality. I didn't end up wearing them because they were too spaciously sized for me, despite fitting well on my waist.

I love renting jeans I wouldn't otherwise buy, like these carpenter jeans! They were cute but I'm glad I don't own them because they fit a bit odd. When I was standing they felt big around my waist and hips but when I sat down they were super uncomfortable and tight! Worked for the day I wore them but wouldn't rent again.

Love the carpenter detail on these jeans! I originally rented a 27 because they felt a bit snug at first try on, and with the carpenter style being oversized can be cute. Swapped for a 26 because as I wore the 27 they loosened up a lot and became more than just oversized but straight up just too big.

links_reviews_title: These pants have become my uniform
links_reviews_text: I'm buying these. They're awesome. Wear with docs for a cool, casual look or dress them up with booties and a cute top. I'm obsessed
Love these pants!!! So comfortable while still being fitted. Straight cut works great with flats or heels!

links_reviews_title: True Carpenter Look! Runs 1 Size Small!
links_reviews_text: These jeans are great. Super straight leg. High waisted. However- they do run very small. I am usually a 27R and got these in a 29R. I probably could have gotten a 28R if available. I will definitely be renting these again! Just be sure to size up 1 size!
I loved the soft feel of this sweater and how it snapped on the shoulders. I would love to buy this & I kept it for 2 weeks. It was the perfect fall sweater & it went with everything.

Love the fit of this. I'm usually between a M and L and got a M since it is a little open. Love the clasps around the neck to hold it closed. Simple everyday sweater but medium thick and warm. Drapes nicely!
I was unsure about renting this but was convinced by the reviews. So glad I was! Much more interesting on than I expected. Will definitely keep for a bit.
Rented this for the first few weeks at home with my newborn. It's fine--soft and thick enough, but I wish it were longer.
Worn multiple times. The magnetic closure is a great design. Could wear as a light jacket. I would rent this again.

Loved this and wore on repeat for all of January and February. Looked polished with black pants and heels at work in the cold NJ winter and loved it with ripped jeans and a tank on weekends. Rent this!

links_reviews_title: Perfectly warm in a slightly snowy day.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to visit family and surprisingly it started to snow Perfect amount of warmth and soft.

I rented this to wear on a couple flights and then to work on a Friday upon return. I loved this piece! The material is warm and structured, giving this sweater the ability to make an outfit look very put together and not frumpy. The overlapping neck is warm and cozy, but not too tall as to be itchy or turtleneck height. I loved this sweater on a plane and at the office! It is true to size, but I did size down to a large from my normal XL and it was plenty roomy. (I don't like anything too tight or short.) Love this and will for sure rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful sweater jacket. Soft and warm.
links_reviews_text: I love this sweater jacket so much I have not taken it off for 3 days except to sleep. It is super soft wool, not at all itchy, a great weight under a heavier coat for winter wear and goes with every pair of winter pants I own. I am going to have a hard time letting this one go!

links_reviews_title: This is best sweater - dress up, dress down. I wore this multiple times and should have bought it.
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were long enough for a tall person, and the length was just to the hip.

Can't wait to tent this again. Loved the crossover closure, gives it that extra something to stand out. Nice weight without being too heavy. Took it on vacation to a mountain cabin for thanksgiving, and also wore to work. Can dress up or down. Rent this one!
I'm a long-time fan of White + Warren and, despite not being cashmere (W+W's specialty), I loved this. In fact, I liked it so much I bought it.
RTR suggested that I size down and that was super helpful as it fit perfectly. Styled up everything it was paired with.

Super cute and comfy sweater that I will definitely be keeping through the winter. It's a little longer on me than the model because of our height difference and I had to fold back to sleeves a little but it looked normal. I got a lot of compliments on it! I would say it might be too itchy if you have sensitive skin.
Nice for layering. Liked the front wrap detail. Sleeves were a little long but looked fine folded up.
I wore this three or four times when we traveled. Loved it as with warm and comfy!
Warm and soft. Good for 50degree days when the winter coat is too warm
fits nicely
Cozy and loose fitting. Looked nice for lounging around Thanksgiving weekend.
I'm a consistent 14 and found the L in this sweater perfect. The open slit lets a shirt peek out from underneath and the magnetic closures on top are a nice touch.
I rented this for an October trip to Europe and lost count of how many times I wore it. Got tons of compliments and it was super comfy. A great staple I would rent again.
This sweater is amazing! I love it so much. It is soft, functional, and a beautiful knit. If I could afford a $300 sweater, it would be mine forever.
Great sweater! Magnet closure is a nice touch. Very warm, nice big pockets.
Great material, so soft and even came with the tags on!!!!

This sweater is made out of the softest, smooshiest yarn. It looks great fastened as shown on the model, less fabulous when unfastened and flopping open. I kind of wish the weather hadn't warmed back up in California--I'm missing out on opportunities to wear it. I am super pear shaped and got the size I thought would fit my hips. I hit a happy medium where I'm not totally swimming in it up top and it gapes open a little on the bottom. Works for me.
I found this easy to wear for work and for the weekend. The snaps add a fun detail. Was perfect for the first cool fall days.

links_reviews_title: Fun print but big and boxy
links_reviews_text: Material wasn't "snuggly" it was actually kind of rough but the pattern is cute. Wore it a couple times to workout outside and to lay around the house. Very boxy and not flattering enough to wear out unless you are going super casual.
This sweatshirt isn't the softest material, but it is so comfortable I would sleep in it. It is boxy and cut high, so I wore with high waist skinny jeans. Got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for travel from cold climes to tropics!
links_reviews_text: Not super warm but very fun. Perfect for arrival in CUN.

links_reviews_title: Fits baggy and the material is heavy
links_reviews_text: This is a heavyweight material so it's more of a structured baggy fit unless you tuck in a few places. It's not a "flowy" baggy. For larger chests, it will stick out in an even plane from your chest so you will want to tuck in the front to give you a shape. Otherwise comfy and warm.
Not super fuzzy and warm, a cropped boxy oversized fit but every single time I wore this I got soooooo many compliments

Definitely runs large - I could've sized down and ended up doing a half tuck so it didn't totally overwhelm me when I wore it with jeans. But, once tucked in it was great for everyday wear or even a casual day at work. The material isn't itchy but isn't the softest material ever, there are definitely better options if you are looking for a cozy sweater. But I love the print and it looked great with jeans for work or with leggings for the weekend! Wore it several times.

I really love this print and it's super comfy! It's not the most flattering cut but that's not why I ordered it so it doesn't concern me too much! The sleeves are 3/4 and not long like the models photo. Wore it to work on a lazy Monday and around the house a few times, I'd recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Loved this - unique pattern but a neutral, every day top that got compliments every time I wore it!
links_reviews_text: Really adorable - the animal print was subtle and I was able to wear often with jeans, black pants, or leggings even. I'm 5'4" and I found that it came up a little higher on me than the model - not cropped, but I usually wore with high rise pants. I loved the comfy roominess/airiness of it but see how other reviewers said it was boxy - though personally I thought it was more of a style that wound up being really cute on, especially with slim fit pants. Arms were slightly more ballooned than in the photo, but again, given the overall style it was really cute!
Very boxy fit. Not very flattering.

Super comfy-- it is sweatshirt material but the puffed sleeves cropped style elevate the look. I actually wore with black jeans and a belt one day and got a lot of complaints. I was also just as happy the next day to wear with leggings :) in the spring I bet this would look really cute with light wash jeans. Will rent again
Fits true to size.
So cute, very cropped so wear high waisted pants or bare midriff.
An awesome lightweight sweatshirt: the best pattern. Basically lived in it for two weeks. Highly recommend!!
Work, weekend, active date night. You name it, I wore it. I don't want to return this top. Fashion sweatshirt. May just have to buy. Runs a size large.
Wore to my daughters bday party, Got lots of compliments. Cute shirt!
I wore this with jeans and heels on a Friday and I was comfy but still work appropriate. Cute pattern and more crisp than a regular sweatshirt. It's a bit boxy but it's the style so looks nice.

links_reviews_title: Love the balloon sleeves and trapeze cut
links_reviews_text: It is a bit of a trapeze cut, so lots of room but I love the balloon sleeve (web picture shows it down, so you could go that way too) and it's versatility.
great fit

links_reviews_title: I got the total wrong size but I still love it.
links_reviews_text: Such a cute shirt, but was way too big. If I had been able to get the right size I would have bought it.
Wanted to love this sweatshirt...such a comfy go to...just too boxy on a busty frame. Runs big.

I thought this piece was just okay. Fits TTS, a bit cropped but works well with a high waisted pair of jeans or leggings. Super soft interior & the sequins are fun, but it's missing that "it" factor that you get with a super high end piece (this is not) that you usually get from RTR. With that said, it was cute, fun, and I may rent again at some point.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a casual Friday, with a touch of extra sparkle! So comfy and cute
links_reviews_text: This is such a great sweatshirt to dress up or down. Pics don't do it justice. Got tons of compliments and was comfy all day!

Super comfy, and so pretty, but very cropped. I wore this to play pool and was constantly pulling it down and adjusting. At 5'7", raising my arms exposed my entire stomach, and leaning over the pool table exposed my entire lower back.
Great sweatshirt. True to size and you'll get a lot of comments on it!

links_reviews_title: My favorite RTR piece ever! Pretty much perfect for me!
links_reviews_text: I love a sequin and this is perfect amount of shine with no scratchies as it's lined with the softest jersey. I will be purchasing and annoying everyone around me with how much I wear it.
Super soft and comfortable. Sleeves were a bit short but zhuzhed them and it looked just right! Loved it.
So comfortable and flattering. I normally wear a S but wanted to have a looser look. The M is perfect.

Favorite sweater of all time A little cropped wish it wasn't bc it wasn't that warm Fleece in the inside so cozy Sparkles on front and back Very flattering brightens your complexion This sweater is comfortable and I'd rent it again for sure Not too heavy no bulk
So fun! Loved it

Only the XL was free in this size and even though in normally a large I went for it. It was a bit big on me so I suspect the large would have fit true to size. It is very soft and comfy and so much sparkle. The only thing for me was I wish it was longer.

This sweatshirt is cute, but did nothing for me. It just kind of hangs there (similar to the pic in the model) so I don't know what I was exactly expecting that was different but didn't like it or wear it. Bummer.
Perfect casual party top in cold months

links_reviews_title: Cute & comfy but a little short in the torso
links_reviews_text: Loved the comfy/casual feel mixed with the glam of the sequins. Wore it with high-waisted jeans & boots for a concert. Even with high-waisted pants, I needed and undershirt so no skin was showing during normal movements.
The arms ran a little short but other than that I loved everything about this top. I wore it for work and for everyday. Very festive and super comfortable unlike a lot of sequence tops I've worn
I loved this sweatshirt! It was great for a casual holiday gathering. The sequins were fun and the sweatshirt was comfy. I would absolutely rent this again!

i wore this a number of times over the holidays. easy way to be festive and comfortable at the same time! sit in the right light and you're your own disco ball! definitely gets worn very quickly though with all the sequins. but was a fun rental!

links_reviews_title: Love this sweater, wish it fit a tad less baggy
links_reviews_text: Great sweater, super comfortable and I got a ton of compliments. I just wish it wasn't quite as baggy and fit slightly more fitted, but I guess that's the style of the shirt.
Very fun to wear. Can dress up or down
Everyone's going to ask you if the zippers really unzip. They do!

Sorry for the slippers. After a day of negotiations between toddlers and trying to sell art from a closed gallery, I just can't wear heels. But these are chic, and comfortable, and actually sexier than I thought. Rent for a fun change of pace! Helmut Lang? Why the heck not?!?

links_reviews_title: I could not wear the outfit. I was so unhappy!
links_reviews_text: The jacket fit. The pants are very small. It was suppose to be a 10 and it was more like an 8

I've held on to this piece for almost a month now! I would purchase if the price tag was lower. Obsessed with the oversized look of this jacket, great material & it feels great on! I've dressed this up for work & also down with jeans & a tee. Wish I could keep it forever

Love this for work - it's definitely oversized (mostly long) even when sized down but I think it's a cute look! I paired with jeans and a tee but would look great with a dress or skirt too. The fabric is beautiful - the color is great and it's super soft. Feels very luxurious!

LOVED this soooo much!!! Wore it like 6 times - next time I would size down though. I know it’s an oversized fit but it was still too big in the shoulders. You can see in this photo it's too long on my arms and too big in the shoulders. I’m a 4 but I have a narrower torso so I think a 2 would have been perfect. TBH, I will rent this again. Probably next week. I loved it that much! Random people kept stopping me to compliment.

Wish I had sizes even farther down than I did. I wore it once, because it is such a beautiful/well made jacket. But I couldn't bring myself to wear it more than that because of the size. It looked like I had grabbed my dad's jacket, just too big!

Perfect color- feminine, but still neutral enough for matching with anything! Cool, boxier fit. Great for a fashion forward workplace or to have an edgy, casual look. Heavier weight, so could be an outer layer in mild weather, but def would be too heavy for a warm day.
I loved this blazer with pants. It runs a bit large but looks good oversized!
Easy to wear
I actually think this might be one of my favorite things that I rented. I probably wore it upwards of 15 times it was cute for work, day time breweries, out etc.

links_reviews_title: I love the fabric-very soft and worked well with skinny jeans and booties
links_reviews_text: Fit perfecting and very slimming
This is such a cozy and cute sweater. I 100% would have bought it for myself if the price was a touch lower.
Love the style, love the fit. It's the perfect long cardi for everyday wear!
The material has a slimming rows of fabrics going vertical. The pockets are fun, and the fabric is thin so it's not too hot.
Very cute but very long. I am 5'4

links_reviews_title: loved this! great comfy sweater for traveling
links_reviews_text: enjoyed this nice addition to my travel wardrobe...easy to throw on in the cold weather and still light enough that I didn't feel like I had on too many layers. great piece
This duster was well made and very comfortable. I was able to wear it with jeans and a skirt. Nice extra layer that didn't look slouchy.

I got this coat just to try something different. The asymmetrical cut is fun and the coat is warm. The down has fallen into the bottom so it made me feel quite round and a bit like a ninja turtle. But overall, nice coat.

links_reviews_title: Wrapped up in the perfect cocoon!
