links_reviews_text: It's the uniqueness of the puffer that makes it's a win in my book! The high collar, high-lo cocoon shape and side wrap make this jacket fun. Lots of compliments! The only flaw is when the jacket is open, you have to fold the ties into the pockets, otherwise they just hang awkwardly... the sizing is also really weird. I had to size down to an XXS (size 6-8), so keep that in mind when ordering.

links_reviews_title: Saved me from current coat burnout at the end of winter
links_reviews_text: What a great everyday coat!

links_reviews_title: Loved - super cute and warm for MN
links_reviews_text: Almost bought this as it is hard to find a cute puffer coat for MN and hockey games. Tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Super cute and warm. Flattering for a puffer.
links_reviews_text: The tie made it easy to close up easily. Color is very flattering!
Loved the unique look and functional warmth of this jacket but beware of the pockets as they are in an odd place on the side of the jacket and do not run deep enough for most things to stay in them.

links_reviews_title: cute, got come compliments, wouldn't buy it because the pockets are low/without a zipper
links_reviews_text: cute, got come compliments, wouldn't buy it because the pockets are low/without a zipper
I only wore the coat once because the color is hard to match. Also, the front of my thighs were cold because the coat is long in the back and shorter in the front. It was fine but I didn't love it.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it out of the house
links_reviews_text: Nope, not at all. I didn't even wear it once. Made me look fat. Might work if it wasn't cold in NYC and you could wear it open like the models, but to actually keep you warm, its awkward to tie and not at all flattering.

links_reviews_title: Loved this unique take on the seasonal puffer jacket. It was a great switch up to my everyday coat.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and was very warm.

I loveee it!! I was a bit skeptical on sizing. But Glad I went with the Recommend (when does M = size 18)??!? It's fitted on me if I were to get a size up it would fit like the model picture and that's a no for me. It's a soft light weight puffer coat. I'm a curvy bbw and It fits over my butt/hips a little tight ( I have ample of both though). The hem is a elastic ruched like band which I really like.

Who doesn't LOVE a brand new pair of 7for All Mankind jeans? These were simply amazing on all levels. Great quality jean, perfect rise (not too low), and perfect length for heels. I'm 5'7 and needed at a 3" heel but I knew that. There's the perfect amount of stretch for girls with curves but still keep their shape. The pants do give just a little which may have you contemplate going down a size. If I lose 2 more lbs I may consider sizing down next time lol!
Jeans are always to short on me I could wear these with wedges and they fit perfectly
These fit, were even a bit loose around the "waist," but hit too far below my belly-button to be something I'd wear. Definitely for someone with a flatter tummy than I have!
The material was a bit of a surprise but the fit was so cute and I felt great in it! Really easy to style in different ways. Would rent again for sure!

This dress is so cute, but for a curvy lady such as myself, it's a little tight in the hips. While I could physically get the dress on, the snap buttons are ripe to slip if you make a wrong move. The fabric is really nice and I loved the pattern. The cut is a pretty straight cut, so the waist was large and the hips were tight.
These were fabulous. They were incredibly soft and comfortable and the high waist hit just right.

Being from Texas, I couldn't help but think how perfect these would be for a UT game. The pants fit well, the fabric has a little stretch in them, which is always nice. The only thing I didn't love was the lack of pockets in the front. I feel like this put more attention on my midsection and crotch, but could've maybe sized up to avoid that feeling.
Liked it. Cropped pants aren't typically me but they are fun to wear. More flattering and stretchy than typical corduroy. Love the high waist!

I have always wanted to try flared corduroy, but I was scared that it wouldn't look good on someone petite. These culottes hit me at the perfect length and hugged me perfectly. Definitely a statement piece that makes a whole outfit pop! I got so many compliments while wearing them!

links_reviews_title: These pants are SO fun and surprisingly comfy! They weren't as high
links_reviews_text: Love these pants, super flattering too even though I'm a short gal! They weren't as high waisted as I expected, so beware of a slight camel toe, if you are between sizes go up!
True to size. These were a true above the ankle crop pant on me and I'm 5'9. I think they would be a little long as a crop pant for some one shorter. I got lots of compliments on them!
Fit and length were just right. Fabric was soft and comfy! I've been eyeing similar pairs like this for a while - so glad these were available! Would definitely rent again.

I loved the corduroy material of these pants. They felt dressy enough for work but I could still wear them to a casual happy hour after without feeling overdressed. The fit was good, I just wished they were a little longer. I didn't have any high enough boots to keep my ankles covered for winter. They would be great in the early fall.
Cool color & comfy material, a bit tight across the hips but overall would wear true size.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, great length, super comfortable
links_reviews_text: I ordered TTS and these fit perfectly! Waist hits just at my belly button for a high waisted look, and they hit a few inches above my ankles, so they work great with ankle boots. Also super comfortable with a decent amount of stretch.

I love these pants! The color, thickness and stretch were perfect. They're versatile and go well with basics and prints. Easy to dress up and dress down. I rented them as an everyday fit, and was even able to wear them over the month of my RTR unlimited. Ran slightly larger than expected, but worked well to tuck in turtlenecks, tees and long sleeves. Would def rent these again!

Looooooved. I already miss them and will probably rent them again. They fit perfectly and were great for Thanksgiving! The only issue is that a drop of water got on them and it didn't dry quite right and was somewhat noticeable. Not sure if that's the norm with corduroy since I haven't worn them since I was a kid! Otherwise I definitely recommend!
Great relaxed for. Perfect for fall wardrobe. Perfect length for my short frame

The color is gorgeous. The cords are soft outside and inside. I wish that they had front pockets but the smooth front is very attractive. I think I could have sized down, but this size was very comfortable with a tad bit roominess around my waist.
Cute pants in good fall color. They were a little tight but worked ok.

links_reviews_title: Light orange corduroys with a flare.
links_reviews_text: These pants fit well and the length was perfect (I am 5'7".). They did stretch out a bit as I wore them. Didn't do a lot for my shape, but I got a lot of compliments. They were just fun.

The color, cut and material is really great on these. I loved them overall, but they were a little unflattering in the midsection because it was a bit short from waist to crop. Still great pants though!
I love the fit of the pants !!! I could wear these everyday
Fit me great I'm short so fell long on me
Love these! I probably need petite as they are barely above my ankle. Fit and comfort are amazing!
I would've sized down to a 27 due to the stretch factor
Fit well, would have liked them to be a bit more high waist but they were high waist-ish.

links_reviews_title: Loved these cords! Wore them several times over the couple of weeks I had them. Will rent them again
links_reviews_text: On my shorter frame, they were just above my ankles.
Fun pants! They weren't as wide legged as I had hoped but were still comfortable and easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not in my regular color scheme
links_reviews_text: Definitely cute pants. However, I'm wearing a size 10 these days and the 29s were tight. Also I wear a ton of black and it was tough to pick a top to wear with these w/o going a bit Halloween. Which is more of a statement about my lack of creativity than the color.

links_reviews_title: flattering, comfortable, looks good with a thin, glossy, black belt
links_reviews_text: cons: no side or front pockets however, good rear pockets - cuorderoy great for this winter season

links_reviews_title: Amazing pants! I want these in every color possible.
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove, perfect length - obsessed!
These pants fit so well, they do run a little large so it was a little baggy but they still look fit well. Great color and fabric.
Great fit! Soft and comfortable. Love the cropped look.
These were comfortable and flattering my only wish was that they had front pockets
Super cute and comfortable cords. Would rent again!
Versatile, light for Corduroy.
These pants were great! They made my tushie look nice, a nice length for me to wear w booties. Corduroy can sometimes be stiff and uncomfortable, these were soft and easy to wear.
Just ok fit

links_reviews_title: Comfortable but Not for Big Hips
links_reviews_text: PROS: The color is very vibrant. The fit is also really good. I really wanted to wear them, but I couldn't make them look good on me. CONS: They can make a pear-shaped person like me look very boxy on the bottom. Just not flattering at all for me.
Love these but got a size too big. They are super stretchy. These are so fun and loved wearing them.
These are perfection! Fit like a glove and so flattering. Wore a couple times and didn't want to return. Will rent again next fall for sure!

links_reviews_title: These are so comfortable and so cute!
links_reviews_text: These fit really well and are so flattering. I wore them with both ankle dr. martens and high top dr. martens. Both looked great.

I loved everything about these corduroy pants. I'm usually a 26 and got the 25, which fit perfectly. High waisted, a little stretchy, comfortable, gorgeous fall color. Looked cute with a shirt tucked in, with and without a belt. Wore them several times - to work, weekend, and out at night.

links_reviews_title: Loved these - wore them often and felt stylish every time!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great - loved the cropped length - Looked great with booties and could be worn casually to work or weekends.
I had to roll these pants up (I'm 5'6") but I still wore them twice. The pattern was great; subdued but still really fun. At least they didn't look crazy when I rolled them up!

links_reviews_title: Cute but not what I expected
links_reviews_text: Very cute pants and I'm glad I rented them. They had more of a men's trouser fit and were longer than I would like and I'm 5'8. That being said I got lots of compliments on the subtle pattern. I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: So fun! Waist a little big
links_reviews_text: Wore these for Christmas Eve. Waist was a bit big so I wore a belt to keep them high waisted. I'm tall so good ankle length for me. Subtle leopard print was super cool. Would wear again!

links_reviews_title: Black leopard print for statement pants
links_reviews_text: These pants are great for going out or for work. They are subtle enough as a plain black dress not, but the leopard print on the pants make them standout. The pants are a little long for my body, but the waist fit well.
I ordered a 4 and quickly exchanged for a 2. I felt amazing in them and I'll definitely be renting again. Follow me on IG for more reviews - dolceand_banana.
Absolutely loved this. Got the jacket too. Felt like a million bucks. I work in a casual office so I paired w sneakers and a t shirt and looooved it. So many compliments. Also comfy!!
Super cute high waist pants. A little baggie but still perfect fall piece

links_reviews_title: Rented during work from home time and didn't wear since they were far fancier than I expected
links_reviews_text: These pants are really cool...more of a cocktail pant IMO. I would normally wear something like this to work with a more casual sweater to balance it but I decided to just send them back for more comfy WFH gear.
I liked the subtle pattern in black on black, but they were kind of frumpy. Will not be renting them again based in the fit.

links_reviews_title: A lot dressier than they look in the photos
links_reviews_text: These are a lot more festive than the photos reflect. They have a shine to them and they were a bit too "loud" for the conservative place I work at.

I'm just starting to get the hang of mid rise pants, and these ones are very high rise. It was too much on my body. But if you're very slim and love wearing high rise paper bag pants maybe with a crop top, go for it.

links_reviews_title: These pants were huge on me. I normally wear a size 8.
links_reviews_text: Not sure how they are supposed to fit, but they were very large on me.
Super cute and a fun but subtle print. Runs large and would size down next time
I love those! My only complaint is that at 5'1 they were a bit too long.

links_reviews_title: Fun subtle print for work pants!
links_reviews_text: I loved these! I did go with the larger size of the two I normally wear and I am glad, I probably wouldn't have fit the smaller one.

links_reviews_title: I'm 5'1 and these pants were too long on me.
links_reviews_text: The material has a sheen to it, which could look great styled with the right shirt.

links_reviews_title: Strange fit and not for petites
links_reviews_text: These were far less structured than I was expecting and they hung in an unflattering way. They were a little big on the waist while fitting at the hips. The length is too long for petites and hits at a weird spot.
Fit true to size. I am tall and the length was great!

Hey y'all, just dropping a line to say to go with your true size. I think I am an 8, but find with a lot of clothes I am a 10, since styling can be all over the place! These pants definitely run true/large so go with your "normal" size you may be paranoid to get typically.

Classic turtleneck. Great material. You will need thin arms. Torso has a bit of length to it. Zippered collar up the back of the neck may catch the hairs on the nape of your neck. For this reason alone I will not rent again. The only flaw to this wonderful piece.

links_reviews_title: High quality great for work top....
links_reviews_text: Pressed for a green turtleneck I decided to try this high quality top. DVF never disappoints. It's pretty true to size as the L fits fine with a little wiggle room. I personally prefer a more snug fit but a M was unavailable. I call it a work top because it has some stretch but is a lil stiff with a zipper neck perfect for wearing under suits... Also at first glance it looks solid green but it has a print on it. It's a great top I gave it 4 out of 5 stars because I felt it looked ok on me.

links_reviews_title: I wore this twice—once to work and once to church. Everyone loved the color.
links_reviews_text: I work it first to work with jeans and then to church with light blue suit pants. The fabric bunched a lot when I wore it with the dress pants and I felt really self conscious in it. However, it didn’t do that when I wore it with the jeans and looked awesome. The only other downside of the shirt is the the hook to clasp it was at the right angle to keep snagging my hair.

links_reviews_title: So warm! Perfect for work in the winter
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were a bit too long for me. And the arms were a touch tight for medium. But it was super comfortable otherwise and was really warm for the winter
It's a tighter fit piece, the Xs fits just perfectly and I'm usually a small.

Nice top, cute pattern, nice thicker material without being too heavy. It is very tight in the upper arms. I have slim arms and was surprised how tight it was. At first it felt oppressive but I think it stretched a bit during the day and felt fine.

Great print and fabric. Fit is TTS through body, but sleeves are 2" too long and shirt is about 8" too long! Can't wear it unless you tuck it in. It's a shame because I would have bought it otherwise.

links_reviews_title: Versatile piece can be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: This fit true to size and is made from a substantial, flattering fabric. The print is a bit much for me on its own but it layers beautifully under both a blazer and a sweater.

links_reviews_title: This top was way too tight. And it was an x-tra large.
links_reviews_text: Too tight.

links_reviews_title: It was very tight, I really needed two sizes up.
links_reviews_text: Tight.

links_reviews_title: Structured and slimmer fit. flattering for large bossom
Good for work, pretty design, but has a very weird fit.
links_reviews_text: Works well for work. I wore it tucked into a skirt, but it's long enough that it would work fine without tucking in (I'm 5'6 and it hits at the top of my thighs). Pros- form-fitting, stretchy and comfortable material, thick enough for winter Cons- sleeves are really long, sleeves are tight in the upper arms making the fabric bunch up at the shoulders, clasp on the back comes up way too close to hairline (hair is constantly getting caught)

links_reviews_title: The shirt was comfortable and flattering
links_reviews_text: The shirt is a little long but it's really flattering and the material is really good quality.

links_reviews_title: More for casual than work - flattering for tummy
links_reviews_text: The fabric is thick and stretchy/athletic-- I selected it for work but got a lot of wear for it casually- lots of compliments and it's long and structured but flattering for my tummy. Cool pattern and fitted through the arms so not too body. I'm a 34D and the M just fit over my chest/ wouldn't have wanted it any smaller.

I wore this a bazillion times and I loved it. Wore it tucked into work slacks, untucked over jeans, out on a date, out to the office, out to brunch. It's a 'sweater' but it's lightweight, so it was good for moving between the hot-cold-hot-cold spaces of NYC winter. Got a ton of compliments. Warning: sleeves are long and waist length is long, but not in a baggy way.

The top was too long and too tight. I'm normally a large but got an XL. Beautiful print and great fabric though. Wish it worked. I think this is just a garment that runs small. The color was also great. I like printed fabrics in my wardrobe so I'd love to see more garments like these.

links_reviews_title: great color, true emerald green (matches my eyes), felt good on, kept me nice and warm
links_reviews_text: goes w many things, long styling, structured, professional, good alone and as a layering piece
Beautiful too with a hint of a turtle neck and a nice warm fabric.
true to size. thick material.
Torso and sleeves are long enough for a tall person, which I typically have problems with! Great fit! Very warm, I always run cold! Will rent again!
Much higher quality than a normal turtleneck-took it up a notch. Liked the pattern & good fit.
I wore this and loved the color, but there is NO GIVE to the fabric. It is not stretchy, so it was very tight. Also, the sleeves are far too long!
Pros: Nice fabric Beautiful design Cons: Way too long- and I'm 5'6"! I couldn't even tuck it in due to the thick fabric. This would be best for someone who is 5'8" or taller.
Very cute pattern but I could t get it past my shoulders. Rent 1-2 sizes bigger.
Material is thick and heavy. It is flattering and minimizes the bust.
Nice fit, very heavy feeling fabric
Fun pattern but wish there was one more button on the bottom part to be a bit more work appropriate.
Weird fit, it did get Lots of compliments but it wasn't my favorite.

This dress was so comfortable to wear! It had an elastic piece in the back that stretched to allow some give as the front was all buttons. The slit was a nice contrast to the conservative length of the dress. The linen material was light and airy. And I of course, was a huge fan of the cheetah print.

links_reviews_title: Comfy enough to wear ALL DAY
links_reviews_text: Loved the length and the extra bit of sass in the slit. Not too sexy for work and translated perfectly to a girls night out and a show.

Very comfortable, yet classic enough to dress up from a day at work to an evening date. Made of a linen-type fabric that wrinkles a little when you sit for too long. Fitted with elastic in the waist, which has a little give! The slit is work appropriate.

links_reviews_title: Great for a casual day at the office
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress; will def rent again. Got lots of compliments. It runs a little big in the shoulders, but I thought it had a cute, slouchy look. One thing to be aware of is how high the thigh slit is - made sitting in meetings a little risqué. I also had to safety pin between the buttons on the chest, which spread a little, but I'm pretty busty.
Very comfortable & trendy fall work dress! Great lining and material

Loved this dress! It has a classic beauty appeal to it and made me feel confident. The linen fabric is super soft, and while it did wrinkle, it didn't take away from the look and style. Would rent again for sure!

links_reviews_title: Ok dress. Good fabric for warmer weather but ran big
links_reviews_text: Ran a little big. Light fabric which was good for a hot night
Wore to a concert - great fit! Linen so it will wrinkle but comfortable. Day or night attire.

Roomy cut (the waist in the back is elasticized), thick but lightweight fabric (that surprisingly doesn't really wrinkle!), perfect for the office. I was pleasantly surprised by this one and received a lot of compliments!
Cute dress, though it fit big.
This dress did not disappoint! I love the button front, and the leopard print was subtle but fun. I rented this Coach picnic basket purse too and I think it went perfect with it!
This dress was small and I always wear a size 8 dress size. Not flattering with large bust. 34d

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work, interviews and a baby shower. Loved!
links_reviews_text: Super flattering and easy to wear for multiple occasions. From work to dinner, it held up throughout the day despite the linen fabric.
Great quality, fit is perfect
I kept this bad boy for two months (update) and I wore it so much! On two vacations, to work, to dinner, everything and anything. I will definitely rent again and other Joie items too!
It was a really nice dress. Material is pretty wrinkly because its linen but it did not look bad. I did have to fully iron it when I received it. I am 5'4 and it was a bit long.
Wore this dress 2 times and I loved it! It fit perfect and was so fashionable! Will rent again
Comfortable dress, cute print. Got lots of compliments but felt it was too boxy looking overall.

This dress is gorgeous and fit like a glove (perhaps too well, as one of the buttons around the waist undid itself after a good meal). I did order a size down as recommend by others and the fit was perfect - definitely runs large in sizing. I got a ton of compliments and the material was super comfortable and airy for a nice fall day. 100% recommend for work or casual wear.
Simple and classic.
I was surprised at how much I enjoyed this dress. Super super flattering

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! I wish it had fit properly.

links_reviews_text: I'm between a S and M size normally but the small worked great. This dress is a linen fabric so it's definitely a summer/warm weather only dress.
Lots of compliments. Perfect for summer. Loved this dress.
Comfy, flattering, and beautiful. The lighter animal print is on trend with out being overly in your face. Got tons of compliments.

I was the first to wear this brand-new, wonderful dress. It's made of heavy linen that holds its finish well. The asymmetric front buttons and pocket provided a great deal of interest. The big cat print is subtle and office appropriate. Sleeves and a higher v-neck kept the top part of the dress office-appropriate. Watch the slit while sitting, though; I wouldn't recommend wearing this in a professional setting unless your legs are covered! I wore this to a conference and ended up draping my tablecloth over my leg as the slit opening rose past my upper thigh and I didn't want to embarrass my table partners. I wouldn't rent again as I like to try different styles, but overall, I think this is one to put on your list for the summer if you're prepared to deal with the slit issue.

links_reviews_title: Perfect easy summer day dress -- casual office friendly
links_reviews_text: This dress is great! The subtle leopard is really fun -- a less drab way of wearing a safari silhouette. The linen has been especially nice during this heatwave. It's a little too roomy, and definitely runs large, so order down if you want to look more polished. I'd also recommend wearing bike shorts or a slip for more formal offices -- the slit is a little flirty, but not inappropriate. It's a great dress for a casual office!
SO many complements on this one. I'd purchase if it didn't easily wrinkle. Super cute print and flattering cut.
Super flattering fit on my curves, wore it for both summer drinks out and to church for a vow renewal. The fit and asymmetric buttons felt fun and different.
Definitely will rent this one again! The slit may be a little high for some offices but it makes this the perfect dress to go from work to drinks. Nice light fabric for the summer.
Fits perfectly and love the fabric!

A nice summer shirt dress. The length is quite long however if you are short. At 4'11", the dress landed mid calf which was not ideal. It also seemed to run a bit large in the upper back, but was otherwise true to size.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress so much! Perfect for running errands, lunch dates, shopping!
links_reviews_text: Was longer in length on me because I am shorter than the model. I'd rent this again.
I didn't wear because it was a little tighter on me than I would like. But it is a great dress.
Very flattering fit and still work appropriate! Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: I received nonstop compliments; it was the perfect addition to any outfit I had for the season.
links_reviews_text: #TheVibe #TiarraMonique
Looooved this jacket. Completed my western vibe I was going for when I went horseback riding! It was really warm and fit perfectly. I'd definitely rent again.
Liked this! It's a bit bulky but that's the look I guess. I wore it multiple times. Looked a little worn and had a stain on the collar but my hair covered it. Cute style!
The jacket is super cozy but definitely don't expect to fit a big sweater underneath
Loved the furry coat.

I got this jacket to wear over another dress I had gotten from RTR to go to a nice wedding. Overall I thought the jacket was SUPER warm and comfy, but a little too bulky/large on me to be as flattering as I would have preferred.
So warm, fits so well, really well made, I'm very tempted to buy it

links_reviews_title: Didn't love it, big for a petite person.
links_reviews_text: Bulkier than I prefer.

I loved this coat for a winter vacation - I ordered a medium for my long arms, but I could have ordered the small. It was warm enough when it was about 25 degrees, except for covering my butt of course :) I was surprised how much I wore it and would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: My favorite all fall and winter long
links_reviews_text: Perfect for everyday

links_reviews_title: Loved this jacket, super warm and upgraded a basic jeans and tee look.
links_reviews_text: This jacket is on the shorter side, which is great because it is so thick the length keeps it from being too much fabric. Great to throw on over a casual outfit or perfect over a cute dress for a night out.
Want to buy this one
it was a boxy fit and teddy bear of the outside. warm and dressed down my party look. it was more dirty white than a true white

links_reviews_title: Couldn't stop reaching for this jacket. So cozy and cute!
links_reviews_text: Fits TTS
This jacket was so warm and fuzzy! I loved it for a RTR item since I wouldn't normally buy something like this. Wore it for a weekend in Boston and had no complaints. Kept me warm in the wind!
Super cute & comfortable. Wore to work and over the weekend with friends - got lots of compliments both times!
Fit TTS for J Crew. Warm and cozy.
Slim in the shoulders so size up!
Nice for a party when I didn't want to worry about shapewear. Interesting pattern, fabric doesn't wrinkle. A little short but actually spices it up because otherwise could be frumpy.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! So comfy & cute!
links_reviews_text: What a great, versatile dress. I love it! I wore it with stiletto booties to dress it up… And then with tights and combat boots for a more casual look. Very comfortable. It runs a little big on top. the waist was a little big too.. but it just made it that much more comfortable. So cute… Might be a little short for taller women. I'm 5'2" and it was fine. I'll rent this again!
Cute , flows nicely. Pairs best with a belt to show you have a waist.
Very flowy and easy to wear dress with fun sleeves. It is a little short so I wore it to work with tights and tall boots. Love the cute print!

This dress got so much wear over the month. So comfortable yet flattering and very useful. Dressed down it was cute for school, but I also wore it out to dinner , to a thanksgiving potluck, and to a more dressy family event with black pumps. The sleeves are batwing but I didn't find it unflattering. This dress is really well made- 10/10 would recommend

This dress is such a great "throw on and go" option for work, wedding, church, etc. It is really comfortable and stretchy. I paired it with black tights and over-the-knee boots for my business casual office and got a compliment within an hour of being there!

Outfit was super cute, nicely lined and the sleeves are charming and look great under a blazer or also on their own. Only downside is an elastic waist that rides up over your pooch if you have one so I was constantly talking it down so I didn't look frumpy. But overall, a nice little rental that went from work to dinner to church the following day.
Really nice quality and thick material. Wish i could own it!

This dress was perfect for length. It wasn't too short or too long. The dress is very flowy but cinchesat the waist to help give you shape. The dress is true to size. Would recommend for work! I will definitely be renting this dress again!!
This dress was fine, but not very interesting. I probably wouldn't rent it again. The 38 fit well, I typically wear a 4 in most brands, occasionally a 6.
I have a smaller frame so I was not able to wear this dress, but I really liked the pattern. Good for tall girls!
This was an amazing dress that fit just right!

The dress definitely runs a little large but I wore it anyways. I paired this with black tights and booties and it was perfect for work. It might be a little too short for work without tights. The sleeves are a little big but overall this was a very cute dress if you size down.
I loved that this dress stretches at the waist to complement my figure even if I gain or lose a little weight it still looks good!
The dress is really easy to wear and I got some compliments from colleagues

links_reviews_title: wore to dinner and to work
links_reviews_text: really cute but runs large, the sleeves are larger than they appear
Super cute for a date night, would be flattering with a belt.
A little short for work but I got lots of compliments. Really comfortable!
Such a cute dress but was absolutely enormous on me.

links_reviews_title: Meh. Sleeves are not as appear
links_reviews_text: I did not wear this because the fit was odd and added about 50 lbs. to me. Maybe it was my short arms, but the sleeve hole is really from the shoulder to the waist making bizarre "bat wings" that do not show in the picture, and made me feel like I looked like I weight 200 lbs. I really wanted to like this and tried it on two times, but it was extremely unflattering. Maybe on the right body, but not mine.
I enjoyed wearing these lounge pants. I kept trying to get them together with the matching top but gave up and just got the pants. They're getting a bit worn but otherwise nice.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, nice material, and form fitting
links_reviews_text: Great loungewear! Quality material - very comfortable and you still look put together for just being in sweat pants. Rainbow cuff landed right at my ankle, they're form fitting in hips and butt - perfect fit on petite frame.

I love the rainbow cuffs at the bottom. The material is on the thinner side and it is more form-fitting than most sweatpants but I like them. They're more like joggers. The price was still too expensive through RTR being a used product, but I was able to find these at Bloomingdale's for only $31 with the holiday deals! LOVE these. I will probably wear them around the house as PJs for the most part but would wear t them out to run errands.

I didn't wear this and should have gotten an XL as a large was too short and tight. The V in the front is a nice sporty accent but I didn't like that it drew the eyes right to the chest. Also it is a navy and beige sweater, I thought it was black from the website. I might try to order again in a bigger size
This sweater was fine, but I think I would've liked it better if I had sized up for a more oversized look. It was comfortable, but i think it would look better if it was slouchier.
Got a lot of compliments on this sweater but it does run a bit bigger/ longer in the sleeves than I'm use to
Cute, solid staple for work!
This sweater is pretty. The Navy is nice and vibrant. I really liked this sweater. I would rent again

links_reviews_title: RTR Employee Review - Comfy & Warm Statement Sweater!
links_reviews_text: I rented this sweater for a weekend trip to Boston. It is really cozy and comfortable - the material is warm and not scratchy, and the knit is pretty heavy. I rented an XS (I usually rent XS, or S for an oversized look) and could easily wear a long sleeve shirt underneath if needed. I paired this with jeans or leggings. The sweater hit me at around the hips, so I tucked it into my jeans. The sleeve length was perfect on me - so may run a little long on others as I have longer arms. It fit well in the shoulders, and I thought the pattern made it flexible to look fitted or oversized, depending on the person.

Great winter sweater. Comfortable and very warm. It's a little short, it shows my stomach if i raise my hands ups but otherwise it's fine with my just mid rise jeans. Very flattering, got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Just OK -- Not a Flattering Fit
links_reviews_text: This sweater fit TTS but it was not very flattering on. It has a very boxy fit and was pretty short in length. I still wore it for day but I didn't love it.

Super comfy sweater that's just right for a NorCal fall. Wore this to work and got lots of compliments, then to a casual dinner date - boyfriend loved it. Trendy, flattering, and unexpected. It was new when I got it (still had the tags on), but after a day of wear it has a little frizzing, and I imagine the pilling will get worse quickly. For that reason I wouldn't buy it, but I love it as a change of pace - exactly why I like RTR!

links_reviews_title: Very cute, not itchy, slightly small, not oversized
links_reviews_text: Very cute, not itchy, slightly small, not oversized

links_reviews_title: Not baggy and it is navy
links_reviews_text: Not sure if I'm blind but I thought the bottom and stripes looked black in the picture. In real life it looks kinda like a bright navy. Also if you're going for more of a baggy look size up, I ordered XS and although it did fit it didn't look at all like the pictures.

links_reviews_title: Everyday sweater - super cute & will definitely rent again
links_reviews_text: Got tons of compliments and loved this! It was not too heavy or hot, but was great for casual wear in the winter! Did not fit me as baggy/oversized as it looks on the model but I liked the fit better that way (I wore a lot with high rise pants and it looked great)
Fits tighter for a sweater and is definitely a colder weather sweater since it is on the thicker side. Overall love the design and looks great on

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite recent rentals
links_reviews_text: This sweater is slightly cropped but it fit perfect. I received so many compliments on it and it was easy to transition between work to happy hour to errands on the weekend. I think I could have worn a size down but liked that it was bit oversized.
Great for wearing everyday and love the v detail on it.
Loved this sweater, I am broad shouldered and the pattern was very flattering! The Large fit will but will likely size up next time I rent since I like sweaters to fit a little loser.
Fits very small - size up two sizes if you want a looser fit!
Nice sweater, nothing special
#sweatergamestrong
Hot
Great fit and comfortable, but note the bottom is navy not black like it looks in the photo.
Perfect length for me (I'm 5'6). I was surprised by how thick the sweater was. Good for winter months. Ended up wearing a couple of times before returning.
So soft & comfy. I really liked this sweater. Got was great, a little relaxed but if still looked great.
goes with all bottoms
Was too short for me, returned without wearing

links_reviews_title: Paired it up for work and it worked well for some variety in my work wardrobe
links_reviews_text: I was worried the large would be too bulky but actually it fit more like a medium. If I would have rented a Medium, the length would have been too short for my conservative taste in work wardrobe. I'm going to add this to my everyday favorite list too.
The white lines made my shoulders look broad, so I didn't wear it. In general, it is a quality sweater and it fits true to size
Pros: Soft, high quality material. Cons: Honestly, I didn't pay attention and thought the bottom was black, but its blue. Still nice with pair of jeans and boots.
honestly perfect - never wanted to give it up!
Great fit and color-block pattern that frames your face. Paired well with dress slacks and jeans. Will definitely rent again.

I thought this was black LOL and wish it was because that's what I was planning to wear it with. Overall super cute, a little bit in the shoulder/armpit area but the rest fit perfectly. Great length and thickness.

links_reviews_title: Super warm cozy chunky, makes your outfit
links_reviews_text: all good
Very comfy, shorter than expected. Bigger surprise is that this is navy, not black.

links_reviews_title: Casual, cozy and a little sporty
links_reviews_text: Nice sweater, easy fit, liked the neutral colors and simple pattern made it feel a little special/trendy. This was perfect for a casual work day with black skinny jeans and white sneakers.

links_reviews_title: I love this sweater...so cozy. Would have bought, but the price is too high.
links_reviews_text: True to size, but still a relaxed fit. I could've done a Small, but with leggings and boots the M worked perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear for casual Christmas.
links_reviews_text: Cozy but flattering. Shorter than expected.
Super cute sweater. Warm and cozy and fits true to size. Loved the design and got lots of compliments. The photos make the coloring appear to be more black, but it's navy blue.
Super warm and cozy. Looks chic and fit great
Love everything about this sweater. Sooo comfortable, so warm, I hate to have to even return it!

links_reviews_title: Thick material and large long sleeves
links_reviews_text: Too bulky for me

I rented this dress thinking it would be an average-fitting dress that would be slightly too long for me, and I was wrong. This dress was a knockout, fit me perfectly, and me feel amazing. I will definitely be renting again!

links_reviews_title: The slit is a bit much for work and the item is pretty worn out. Not the best RTR experience.

links_reviews_text: Perfect for, very professional
Crossover skirt doesn't lay right inside so there is a very noticeable crease going up towards the hip.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress but too short for me
links_reviews_text: Nice material. Neck flattering. Fit well, but the waist seam hit me just below rib cage so it might fit less tall women better. More important to know- the front slit is not ideal when sitting down. I'm glad I was wearing tights and my legs were tucked under desks and tables all day.
Great fit, unique and flattering neckline. Caution with the front slit.
This dress was flattering and extremely comfortable with just the right amount of stretch. The slit went up a bit high when sitting down but otherwise it was great.

This blazer is so bright pink, it seems neon. I liked the relaxed fit and the material (more stretchy than the average work blazer), so this was very easy to move in. If you want something fitted, go at least one size down. My only complaint is that I found myself constantly messing with this blazer for it to sit right throughout the day. The lapels do not stay put and the jacket moved around under the tie waist. Flattering and fun but sort of high maintenance.

links_reviews_title: Loved, but I ditched the belt
links_reviews_text: Love the color!! I got so many compliments. Rachel Roy always runs large so if you're in between sizes, size down. The belt doesn't tie nicely. The belt loops are very subtle, so it didn't matter.
Very much hot pink! The belt was very wrinkled upon arrival, so I wore this to work sans belt, and the waist was not cinched at all. Had fun wearing it once, wouldn't buy.

links_reviews_title: Love it for work or play

links_reviews_text: Didn't come to belt which was disappointing. Otherwise cute/standard long lightweight blazer.
I got SO many compliments on this blazer around the office. It's thicker so great for the winter months. Love the added belt too, kicks it up a notch.
Cute blazer and awesome color, but be ware there is no cute that wraps around the waist. I tried the XL because they were out of the L but it was a bit big.. still made it work

links_reviews_title: This was such a fun blazer for an ordinary work day - you will definitely stand out!
links_reviews_text: This blazer runs slightly large but is concerned at the waist by the belt so overall fits fine! Very cute office Barbie vibes!
This blazer is more neon pink than it appears in the pictures. It is a nice crepe material and really is a stand-out piece for work that transitioned well to nighttime.

This romper was perfect for vacation. I paired this with a silver chain belt for a more hourglass shape. Runs big. I am usually a size small and rented a size XS. I loved it so much that I purchased this item.
Wore this on spring break in jamaica and loved it! Very fun but also super easy and comfy!
Such a great romper for a day full of fun at Epcot! So Comfortable, easy to walk around in, go on rides & plenty of room to eat & drink while still maintaining a nice figure ;)

Was super cute and comfy to wear on vacation. It was a little short so had to be mindful bending down! Top stayed up comfortably for me even being small chested. If you have broad shoulders like me it really looks good.

Really enjoyed this little jumper. Looks exactly like the stock photo, colors are bright but subtle. Linen like fabric that steams really easy. Bonus, no bra needed thanks to the extra layer of fabric on the top! Easy to wear, definitely would rewear or purchase!
This romper was so comfortable. The colors are bright but not obnoxious. I'm tall and more curvy so it's hard to find a romper that fits but this one was perfect.
True to size romper, very comfortable for a Florida vaca. Bra optional and the colors are so fun!
This outfit was so comfortable while being colorful and stylish!
Loved this! Fit perfectly and such a great style for Jamaica.

I loved this romper! It was so comfortable and easy. Strapless bra is optional but I need one so I wore it and was very comfortable. I was worried that it would do the creep crotch thing because I don't have the thinnest thighs but the length was perfect. Received 3 compliments in the first hour I wore it. The only thing that would make it better is pockets!
This romper is super cute for weekends and beach weekends! Very flattering

links_reviews_title: Perfectly colorful for 50th Anniversary of Sesame Street event
links_reviews_text: I never normally fit in an XS but the reviews were spot on and this runs large so the XS fit perfectly. It was quite comfortable and I wore it for professional family photos taken after the event so it'll probably be on our Christmas card, too.
Loved the colors, but beware runs really big!

I refreshed this romper for WEEKS and snagged it as soon as it became available! So glad I did. It was super comfortable and really cute. I wore it on vacation and walked for hours in 95-degree weather and this was perfect. Recommend 100%!

I thought this was going to be too boxy on me, but I was wrong. This was a great fit across the chest area that left just a hint of cleavage. I wore a half bra underneath and the fabric was perfect for my island vacation, and a summer night out for a friend's birthday, where I dressed it up with tall wedges. I wished that the shorts were more fitted on me. But that may have taken away from the comfort of this piece. I liked that I won't go unnoticed or look like I'm trying too hard in this. It photographs well. I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Fun colors and a great material for heat!
links_reviews_text: I live in Key west and was worried this material was going to wrinkle right away bc it's a linen blend. It still wrinkled slightly but was super light weight and was really comfortable in the heat!! The colors were bright and fun and I loved the top ruffle layer. It arrived a bit wrinkled but steaming worked like a charm and also helped lengthen the romper properly. It ran small around the top so if you're large chested definitely size up!!

I wore this dress during the day in Miami for a bachelorette trip. It was extremely comfortable and I loved the bright colors. I didn't have to wear a bra which is always a plus. As other reviews mentioned, it does wrinkle easily, but that didn't bother me. Great romper!
Literally the best romper I have ever worn. I loved it and received so so so many compliments. Super comfortable, breathable, and easy. Highly recommend.

Hard to find rompers that fit at my height but I love this one! I would definitely size down. No zipper so a little tight pulling up but then fit great and was super flattering for me! So fun to wear and comfortable!!

I LOVED this romper. Might consider buying. Loved the bright colors and strapless look. Wore it for a night out in the city and a low key breakfast date, and it was great for both. Sturdy material and flattering.
Great for the summer! Stays up very well! Loved the fit.

links_reviews_title: Fun, bright colors and super cute, comfortable romper! Received compliments all day long!
links_reviews_text: I originally rented this for a gender reveal bbq but it didn't show off my bump like I wanted it to so I ended up wearing it for a casual lunch and then walking around town shopping. This romper is adorable and comfortable. I am 5'9 and about 185 and usually wear a L but I am 5 months pregnant so I wore the XL for a little extra room in my belly! Bright colors, light material and fun! I received compliments all day long!

I almost didn't rent this because all of the reviews said it ran large and only the L was available (I'm usually an M, sometimes an L). I am so glad I did because I loved it! The shorts are just the right length and I had no issues with the elastic bands at the waist and chest. Wore it to a rooftop party and then wore it around the house as loungewear a couple more times -- super comfortable!!

Was the perfect romper for a day of travel and wine tasting in the summer! Very comfortable, fit TTS for Show me your Mimi (I'm usually an XS in this brand). Bc it's linen it did wrinkle easily (as you can tell in the photo). But I'm happy with it and will absolutely rent again!
Great for summer! Easy to throw on and super cute

links_reviews_title: Fun romper but definitely runs big
links_reviews_text: This romper is cute and the colors are so fun, but it definitely runs large- both in length AND width. I haven't yet found the right occasion to wear it, but with the right shoes (it needs heels or will look very frumpy) and some big fun earrings, it could be a cute summer outfit! I thought my husband was going to hate it when I tried it on, but he actually liked it. I will prob send it back for an XS though. This S came NWT.
Perfect for hot weather. Many compliments!
Super cute to wear over a swimsuit or out!
I'm tall, so I always size up for rompers. This was so cute. I will be renting it again.

Loved this, being short I worry about rompers looking dumpy on me but this one was super cute both on its own and with a jean jacket over it when the evening cooled off. Ruffle was perfect, didn't have to wear a bra :)

links_reviews_title: I loved it so I bought it.
links_reviews_text: Fits great as an xs - I am 125 lbs. I will also mention that I have a short torso - so things don't hang out.

Romper was more casual than I expected. The material is a little rough. I didn't feel like it was the most flattering cut for someone with a larger chest. Overall I real liked it though for an easy daytime outfit!
Cute, easy to wear but decided the colors just weren't my style in the end

links_reviews_title: Dress it up or dress it down!
links_reviews_text: Adorable rental for a beach/warm weather vacation! Really great colors and pattern make this easy and fun for the beach. I wore this out in the evening with jack rogers and cute accessories and then later in the week over my swimsuit. Adorable, comfortable - one of my favorite rentals!

This is suppose to fit loose but i think i could have gotten away with the medium, i am five months post patrum so i have been sizing up to be safe, perfect for vacation it could easily be worn to dinner or casual during the day!

links_reviews_title: It looked so great on a desert vacation! Very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Had to iron after traveling in suitcase. Very comfortable and great colors!
I received lots of compliments wearing this romper. My daughter even loved it on me. Fabric is light weight and very comfortable. I would consider renting this again.
Easy and felt comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Loved this romper! So comfortable and received lots of compliments. Great for a Florida day!
links_reviews_text: Comfortable not too short
This romper was so comfortable and adorable. I wore it as I traveled home from my summer vacation. Perfect for driving. I also wore it to work. loved it!
I didn't love these, they weren't enough of one style and more just high water and high waisted

links_reviews_title: Great jean, even for short legs
links_reviews_text: These fit so well. They do stretch a bit like all J Brands but such a good fit and not too long for short girls like me!
True vintage Jean with no stretch but great causal Jean that goes with anything! I wore my normal size but was a little loose through the legs.
I was looking for high waisted jeans and these were super cute and comfy. They just felt a little short in the inseam when I sit down. The fabric is soft and comfortable with just enough stretch.
I ordered a size up and still wasn't able to even button them. Love the color but wish I'd gotten the maybe two sizes up - very little give.
I want to buy these jeans, they fit so well! The size I had was just a bit too big for me but they make the butt really pop and have great length. The fabric is soft.
These are cool jeans, would not categorize them as sexy, but a fit I've been looking for. They fit very true to size.
High waist was great. I am tall and these were cropped at just the right spot on the calf. Cute with sneakers, but I wore them with ballet flats.

links_reviews_title: Wear them around for an hour before you decide
links_reviews_text: When I first tried them on, I thought they ran a size too small. After about an hour, they stretched to be comfortable enough for all day wear. Miraculously, they didn't stretch to look baggy. It really just stretched to fit my curves better. I wanted to hate these jeans at first, but I actually really like them!

links_reviews_title: Super cute jeans! I'm 5'10 so these were great ankle jeans and perfect with sneakers.
links_reviews_text: These don't have a ton of stretch, but did have a little more give throughout the day. I went with my usual size and don't think I would need to size up.

links_reviews_title: A bit loose all over but nice basic
links_reviews_text: It's always hard to estimate waist size with high-waisted jeans. I would've gone with my usual 29 but it wasn't available so these were pretty big all over for me, but at least that meant plenty of room in the hips, thighs, and calves for that "relaxed" boyfriend type look. I liked the neutral, medium finish and just-below-the-ankle length. I'd probably rent again, but get my usual size.
Normally I wear a 26, but couldn't get my whole thigh in these. Returning them to swap out for something else.
Jeans fit and look great. They have little to no stretch and fit TTS

links_reviews_title: A little on the mom Jean look.
links_reviews_text: I love J Brand and am a 26, but these were exceptionally small. Not thin denim, more stiff.

I ordered these in a size too large so they were a bit baggy on me. If I had gotten a 28 (I'm usually between a 6 and an 8) it would have been perfect! They do stretch a little throughout the day but they are very comfortable.
Terrible mom jeans - zero stretch and they are super unflattering especially for short girls
I really liked these but I am 5'4" and they were much longer on me than on the model shown. Basically down to my feet. Still very cute but we're not cropped on me.

links_reviews_title: Straight leg and stretched throughout the day
links_reviews_text: Nice mom jean but didn't provide any shape and stretched a bit throughout the day. Really long too.
I figured I would try these pants, but they were really unflattering. They were all around baggy and the waist was too high for my liking. Even in a smaller size, I don't think I would like them.

links_reviews_title: I don't want to give these jeans back!
links_reviews_text: I love them so much. I'm really tall and they're still the perfect length for me to pull of that cool ankle-showing length without looking like floods.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and I could dance in them!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4" and the pants weren't as cropped as they are in the picture but with heels they still looked really cute!
I wear a 26/27 in most denim... I rented a size 27 and couldn't even get them over my hips! They look like they could be cute though, so I may try again going a few sizes up!
My daughter loved these. I did too, although they'd stretch out in the waist after wearing them for a couple of hours.
Definitely on the casual side and not for night time. They are cute with a T-shirt or sweatshirt for casual day. Not super flattering but still cute!

links_reviews_title: Comfy, great for work, stretched out some
links_reviews_text: Wore these to work - so comfy! I was able to sit in the high waist at work all day without having to sneak some unbottoning from tightness but they definitely stretched out some by the end of the day. Pretty soft denim. Hit at my ankle. True to size.
It's a little tight on the arms, but overall truly sliming
Comfortable and functional! Got the set for a 13 mile hike in big bend national park!

links_reviews_title: So cute! Built in bra is terrible
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7" 34D The built in bra does not work for larger breasts. There is no back to it and they kept falling out

Wore for a bike ride and some errands and it was great athleisure while feeling a little sexy with the crop. Didn't have to wear a bra - it has cups! It also was very warm for a windy day in Georgia in February, loved it.
I loved this top, but the built-in cups were frustrating. They were way too big for me, I wish they could be removed.
fit was nice. sleeves on long side. for me the wrap was not too revealing and no pins needed
I loved this easy and interesting wrap dress! It was great for work and a date, with and without tights. I did find it ran large for DVF and was glad I didn't size up like I normally would.
Fit much better than the small. Love the skirting. Still a little gaping at top. Probably better for very small busted women. But very cute.

This dress is a show stopper. Usually wrap dresses are cut too low for work but this fit nicely. Felt great on. I did wear a spanx type slip underneath because I get self conscious with this type of dress. But it would be flattering on most body types. You can stand out from the crowd and feel like a model
Great fit, easy to secure. This dress has a fun print and flirty bottom. The sleeves were a little long and the next line way too low for work but easily fixed with a cami.

links_reviews_title: Great color palette and very flattering
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. Wore twice to work. It was a tad short but fine w tights. My fav DVF I've rented. The cut and flounce made it very flattering
I liked the colors of the dress. The ruffle at the bottom was cute. I pinned the top so it wouldn't show cleavage. It was a little on the short side for me (and I am short!)
Loved the fabric, the fit and the details!
Beautiful print, fun ruffle. It runs a bit big but I usually have no luck with wraps being larger chested so this was nice to be able to wear.
So feminine and soft. Drapes beautifully. A winner.

links_reviews_title: Flattering & versatile - work, date, party, brunch!
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this dress. The photo doesn't do justice - it's super cute on and you can adjust the cleavage based on time of day. I wore it to work with tights and boots, to a party with heels and to brunch with flats. My 2nd favorite RTR find.

I rented this for work. A little low cut but generally stayed closed when I sat up straight. It's also shorter than some other wrap dresses but the ruffle makes it look looser. I marked this as running "big" but I think that's just relative to how RTR has mapped the sizes. I am pretty consistently a 4 and XS in DVF (2 or 4 in other brands). RTR may be off because they don't carry XXS. IMO, should be more like XXS 00-0, XS 2-4, S 4-6 (admittedly that's not how DVFs own website shows it)
Everyday wear and it was so adorable...lots of compliments!
Fits beautifully. Not too low cut. Perfect wrap dress.
Very cute and flattering dress. Showed a little cleavage so I had to pin it, but otherwise perfect length and style!
It was very flattering, but was a little tight in the bust, so it seemed a little more revealing.

I layered this dress with a low-cut bodysuit, tights and boots for a mid-week dinner. I was warm but still felt dressed up/feminine - an ongoing winter challenge lol. The print and fabric makes this more of a winter floral for me.
Most of the dress is jersey, but it's trimmed with silk which adds a nice flair! Flattering for curves and doesn't gape open like some wrap dresses. I wore with tights and boots.
This dress was flattering and comfortable. Just stretchy enough and the perfect length for long legs
Fun print. Cute wrap style for work. The XL fit well and I am usually a 14-18 depending on designer. The dress was a little baggy on the top but doable and still a very comfortable fun fit!
Comfortable and I got a lot of compliments!
I needed to wear a tank underneath to cover the cleavage.
Very high quality and I loved how warm it was without being itchy. Perfect for work and for networking events. Fit was a little large for me, but overall it was excellent for everyday use.

links_reviews_title: Fit TTS, very casual and plain
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and I like the slight crop but the sweater just doesn't seem that special. The colorblocking with the light blue is nice. It just looks plain. Not itchy and quite soft and warm.
Nice fit through the body and length. Arms are a little large and long but I just push them up. Easy to wear with lots of different black bottoms.
It's thick and warm and holds it shape very well. The blue band stays straight and doesn't hug your tummy like a sweater with no form. I'd purchase if it's weren't so pricey.
Fit was perfect, textured dark knit with lovely blue edge. Not too heavy.
Fit well. Loved the color at the bottom, although the bottom material was much stiffer than the rest of the sweater. Otherwise very comfy, but still polished.
This was a great sweater to wear when it got chilly again, it does fit pretty large it is not a snug fit but very good quality.
It's a beautifully made sweater and a little understated, but i didn't love it. It wasn't overly flattering and a little boxy. Not my fave RTR rental.

This is a snug cropped fit. I am tall with a very thin frame and teeny boobs and it was still quite snug. I absolutely love this sweater! I wore it with mid/high rise jeans and it just grazed the top so no belly showed, but there was a little skin from the side slits which I thought kept it fun. I wore it so many times and got compliments. I loved it! Will definitely be renting again next winter!

links_reviews_title: Loved it. Kept it for a while. I wore it to many events where I had to look polished but casual.
links_reviews_text: I liked the snug, cropped fit. Great with high waisted jeans.
Very heavy sweater! Loved it on a chilly day.

Runs a bit large, making the fit look a bit boxier than on the model. The sleeves are a bit wide/bulky. This sweater is soft and really warm...really, really warm. It's nice and cute, but doesn't feel as luxe as the price would imply
The waistline of this sweater fits strangely.
Great quality, interesting sweater. Best for shorter ladies

links_reviews_title: I loved the material, the design, the fit, everything about this sweater.
links_reviews_text: Out of everything I've ever gotten on RTR, i love this the most. Its the best fitting sweater that I've worn in my life (I'm short and I have a short torso and I've got a bust that is too big for a lot of fashionable sweaters that aren't a loose fit); it's comfortable, and it's stylish. If I was able to afford this (it's marni, so of course I dont have that ability), I'd buy it in a heartbeat.
material is heavy
